name: Wooden Arrow
description: An arrow made of wood. It is an arrow used for a no grade bow.

name: (Not In Use)
description: Vitamin item pack\nA wrapped pack containing a Sudden Agathion Bracelet (30 days). Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: (Not In Use)
description: Vitamin item pack\nA wrapped pack containing a Shiny Agathion Bracelet (30 days). Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Shiny Agathion 7-Day Pack (Event)
description: Vitamin item pack\nA wrapped pack containing a Shiny Agathion Bracelet (7 days). Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Sobbing Agathion 7-Day Pack (Event)
description: Vitamin item pack\nA wrapped pack containing a Sobbing Agathion Bracelet (7 days). Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

description: Vitamin item pack\nA wrapped pack containing a Sudden Agathion Bracelet (30 days). Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

description: Vitamin item pack\nA wrapped pack containing a Shiny Agathion Bracelet (30 days). Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

description: Vitamin item pack\nA wrapped pack containing a Sobbing Agathion Bracelet (30 days). Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Sudden Agathion 7-Day Pack
description: Vitamin item pack\nA wrapped pack containing a Sudden Agathion Bracelet (7 days). Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Shiny Agathion 7-Day Pack
description: Vitamin item pack\nA wrapped pack containing a Shiny Agathion Bracelet (7 days). Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Sobbing Agathion 7-Day Pack
description: Vitamin item pack\nA wrapped pack containing a Sobbing Agathion Bracelet (7 days). Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: (Not In Use)
description: Vitamin item pack\nA wrapped pack containing a Sobbing Agathion Bracelet (30 days). Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Sudden Agathion 7-Day Pack (Event)
description: Vitamin item pack\nA wrapped pack containing a Sudden Agathion Bracelet (7 days). Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Chair
description: Chair

name: Darin's Letter
description: The love letter that Darin has written to Roxxy. Darin has asked you to deliver this letter to Gatekeeper Roxxy.

name: Roxxy's Kerchief
description: Roxxy's handkerchief. This is the reply that Roxxy has given to Darin's letter, and must be delivered to Darin.

name: Poetry Book
description: A poetry book treasured by Arujien. The book contains poems that he has written. Take this to Greenis.

name: Lyrics Book
description: The lyrics book of Herbien

name: Romance Novel
description: A romance novel

name: Arujien's Letter
description: Arujien's letter

name: Greenis's Letter
description: Greenis's letter, refusing Arujien's love. Take this to Arujien.

name: Ingredient List
description: A list of ingredients: 3 omen beast bloods, 2 mana seeker husks, 2 gargoyle horns

name: Omen Beast's Blood
description: The blood of an omen beast.

name: Mana Seeker's Husk
description: The husk of a mana seeker.

name: Gargoyle's Horn
description: The horn of a gargoyle.

name: Gilbert's List
description: A list of things to eliminate: orcs, hobgoblins, walking fungus

name: Orc's Nose
description: The nose of an orc.
Description of the hobgoblin amulet

name: Fungus Juice
description: The juice of a fungus.

name: Wolf Pelt
description: Gather forty wolf pelts and take them to Trader Lector of the weapons and armor shop.

name: Giant Spider's Poison Sac
description: Giant Spider's Poison Sacs obtained from the dead giant spider. Take this to Priest Yohanes.

name: Fever Medicine
description: A medicine concocted by Priest Yohanes for the students who are ill with fever. Take this to Elias.
Description of an Orc feather amulet.

name: Basilisk's Claw
description: A basilisk's claw.

name: Spore Sac
description: A sac obtained from the spore fungus. Gather 10 of these and take them to Trader Vollodos.

name: Sylph Headband
description: A Sylph Headband

name: Healing Drug
description: A magical, liquid medicine that restores HP for a certain amount of time.

name: Mana Drug
description: A magical, liquid medicine that restores MP for a certain amount of time.

name: Healing Potion
description: A magical, liquid medicine that restores HP for a certain amount of time.

name: Mana Potion
description: A magical, liquid medicine that restores MP for a certain amount of time.

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-Grade)
description: When enchanted, increases P. Atk. of  A-Grade weapons such as sword/one-handed, blunt weapon/one-handed, dagger, spear, etc. by 4. Increases P. Atk. of  sword/two-handed, blunt weapon/two-handed, dualsword, and fist-fighting weapon/two-handed by 5. Increases P. Atk. of bow weapons by 8. Increaes M. Atk. of all weapons by 3. From +4, doulbes P. Atk. and M. Atk. bonus for all weapon types. It can be safely enchanted up to +3.

name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. of A-Grade armor or accessory. Can be safely enchanted up to +3, although 1-piece armor can be enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP when armor is enchanted above +4.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-Grade)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers an A-Grade weapon.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-Grade)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers an A-Grade armor.

name: Endeavor Potion
description: A magical, liquid medicine that increases willpower.

name: Haste Potion
description: A magical potion that increases movement speed

name: Alacrity Potion
description: A magical potion that increases Atk. Spd.

name: Scroll of Escape
description: A scroll of enchantment that relocates you to the nearest village.

name: Scroll of Resurrection
description: A scroll of enchantment that resuscitates a dead person.

name: Broken Sword Handle
description: The handle portion of the sword of solidarity. Take this to Blacksmith Altran.

name: Broken Blade Bottom
description: Take this, and the upper portion of the blade to Blacksmith Altran.

name: Broken Blade Top
description: Take this, and the lower portion of the blade to Blacksmith Altran.

name: Altran's Note
description: A letter requesting the handle of the sword from Roien. Take this to Grand Master Roien of Cedric's Training Hall.

name: Alberius's List
description: Deliver the medicine to Sentinel Berros, Sentinel Veltress, Sentinel Rayen, and Sentinel Gartrandell.

name: Orc Amulet
description: An amulet that the Orcs carry for magical purposes. Take this to Captain Gilbert.

name: Roien's Letter
description: A letter on which Roien summarized the historical information related to the sword of solidarity. Take this to Blacksmith Altran.

name: Bone Fragment
description: Bone fragments obtained from the undead skeletons. Collect ten of these and take to Tetrarch Kaitar.

name: Directions to Ruins
description: Follow the northwestern path from the village, and head west when you meet the Obelisk of Victory. The entrance to the ruins lies at the slope of the mountain.

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-Grade)
description: When enchanted, P. Atk. of B-Grade weapons such as one-handed swords and blunt weapons, daggers and spears increases by 3. P. Atk. of two-handed swords and blunt weapons, dualswords, and two-handed fist-fighting weapons increases by 4. P. Atk. of bow weapons increases by 6. M. Atk. of all weapons increases by 3. From +4, P. Atk. and M. Atk. bonus will double for all weapon types. It can be safely enchanted up to +3.

name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (B-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. of B-Grade armor or accessory. Can be safely enchanted up to +3, although 1-piece armor can be enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP when armor is enchanted above +4.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-Grade)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a B-Grade weapon.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Armor (B-Grade)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a B-Grade armor.

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-Grade)
description: When enchanted, P. Atk. of C-Grade weapons such as one-handed swords and blunt weapons, daggers and spears increases by 3. P. Atk. of two-handed swords and blunt weapons, dualswords, and two-handed fist-fighting weapons increases by 4. P. Atk. of bow weapons increases by 6. M. Atk. of all weapons increases by 3. From +4, P. Atk. and M. Atk. bonus will double for all weapon types. It can be safely enchanted up to +3.

name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. of C-Grade armor or accessory. Can be safely enchanted up to +3, although 1-piece armor can be enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP when armor is enchanted above +4.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-Grade)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a C-Grade weapon.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-Grade)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a C-Grade armor.

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-Grade)
description: When enchanted P. Atk. of all D-Grade weapons will increase by 2 with the exception of bows, which will increase by 4. M. Atk. of all weapons increases by 2. From +4, P. Atk. and M. Atk. bonus will double for all weapon types. It can be safely enchanted up to +3.

name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (D-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. of D-Grade armor or accessory. Can be safely enchanted up to +3, although 1-piece armor can be enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP when armor is enchanted above +4.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-Grade)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a D-Grade weapon.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Armor (D-Grade)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a D-Grade armor.

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-Grade)
description: When enchanted, P. Atk. of S-Grade weapons such as one-handed swords and blunt weapons, daggers and spears increases by 5. P. Atk. of two-handed swords and blunt weapons, dualswords, and two-handed fist-fighting weapons increases by 6. P. Atk. of bow weapons increases by 10. M. Atk. of all weapons increases by 4. From +4, P. Atk. and M. Atk. bonus will double for all weapon types. It can be safely enchanted up to +3.

name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. of S-Grade armor or accessory. Can be safely enchanted up to +3, although 1-piece armor can be enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP when armor is enchanted above +4.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-Grade)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a S-Grade weapon.

name: Crystal Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-Grade)
description: A scroll of enchantment that empowers a S-Grade armor

name: Orcish Arrowhead
description: An arrowhead that Turath orc marksmen use on Talking Island. Collect these and take to Master Minia.

name: Alberius's Letter
description: A letter from Alberius. Take this to Master Cobendell.

name: Evergreen Amulet
description: A necklace set with a green elemental stone. You must possess this to slay the dryad and obtain the dryad's tears.

name: Dryad's Tears
description: A jewel that contains the essence of a dryad's soul. Gather ten of these and take them to Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell Medicine
description: Cobendell's medicine

name: Karrod's Letter
description: A letter written by Blacksmith Karrod. Take this to the Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon in the Shilen Temple.

name: Cecktinon's First Voucher
description: An introduction letter from the Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon. Take this and seek Magister Harne in the village.

name: Cecktinon's Second Voucher
description: An introduction letter from the Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon. Go to the School of Dark Arts, hunt skeletons, and gather 10 bone fragments.

name: Soul Catcher
description: An item used during the exorcism ritual to call upon a spirit of the dead. Take this to the Abyssal Celebrant Cecktinon.

name: Preserving Oil
description: An oil that when used, prevents the rotting of corpses. Take this and go hunt zombies in the swamps.

name: Zombie Head
description: The head of tree Elf zombies that have been cut after they are defeated. Take this to the abyssal celebrant Cecktinon.

name: Steelbender Head
description: Please, I beg of you!  Don't take me to that brutal blacksmith!

name: 1st Mark of Sentinel
description: A mark that certifies that its bearer is an Elven Sentinel. Destroy an orc Tanuki skullcrusher and report to Sentinel Kendell.

name: 2nd Mark of Sentinel
description: A mark that certifies that its bearer is an Elven Sentinel. Destroy an orc Bhato bloodspear and report to Sentinel Kendell.

name: Skullcrusher Amulet
description: The amulet that represents the Skullcrusher Orc tribe. Take this to Sentinel Kendell.

name: Bloodspear Amulet
description: The amulet that represents the Bloodspear Orc tribe. Take this to Sentinel Kendell.

name: Esrandell's Letter
description: Esrandell's introduction

name: Kendell's Letter
description: Kendell's letter

name: 1st Onyx Talisman
description: A necklace crafted of onyx. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

name: 2nd Onyx Talisman
description: A necklace crafted of onyx. Recover the original scrolls from the blackskull Orcs and bring them to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

name: Ancient Scroll
description: An ancient scroll called Kaysha's Revelation. Take it along with the clay tablet to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

name: Ancient Clay Tablet
description: An ancient clay tablet engraved with text. Take it along with the ancient scroll to Abyssal Celebrant Kartia.

name: Kartia's Translation
description: Kartia's translation of Kaysha's Revelations. Take it to Tetrarch Thifiell.

name: Harrys's 1st Receipt
description: A receipt Harrys received after ordering tools. Take this and go to Blacksmith Altran.

name: Harrys's 2nd Receipt
description: The receipt that Harrys has received after placing an order for his tools. Go and gather golem shards needed for creating the tool.

name: Golem Shard
description: Shards of rock that have fallen from the Golem's body. Gather 5 and take them to Blacksmith Altran.

name: Tool Box
description: A toolbox containing the tools that Blacksmith Altran has forged. Take this to Magister Harrys at the temple.

name: Delivery List
description: Take the heavy wooden box to Trader Jackson. The bolts of cloth to Trader Silvia. Take the clay pot to the warehouse keeper Rant.

name: Heavy Wood Box
description: The wooden box to be delivered to Trader Jackson of the weapons shop.

name: Cloth Bundle
description: Bolts of cloth that need to be delivered to Trader Silvia of the grocery store.

name: Clay Pot
description: The clay pot that must be delivered to the warehouse keeper Rant.

name: Jackson's Receipt
description: The receipt that Jackson has issued upon receiving his wooden box. Take this to Guard Arnold.

name: Silvia's Receipt
description: The receipt that Silvia has issued upon receiving her bolts of cloth. Take this to Guard Arnold.

name: Rant's Receipt
description: The receipt issued by Rant upon his receiving of the clay pot. Take this to Guard Arnold.

name: Official Letter
description: An official letter that the Lord of Gludio has sent to Sir Colin Windawood, calling a meeting. Deliver this to Sir Windawood.

name: Flame Shard
description: A fragment of soul ore of fire. Can be taken from the fire spirit salamander. Give it to Trader Katerina.

name: Ice Shard
description: A fragment of elemental stone of water. Can be taken from the water spirit undine. Give to Trader Katerina.

name: Lilith's Letter
description: A letter written by Lilith in longing for her lover, separated a thousand years ago. Find out news about her lover for her.

name: Theon's Diary
description: A diary written by Theon in longing for his lover, separated a thousand years ago. Take this to Lilith.

name: Adamantite Ore
description: Adamantite ore. All of it is imported from Gracia. Gather 20 of these and take them to Warehouse Keeper Wilford.

name: Clay Tablet
description: A tablet praising Beleth that the devil Nerkas possessed. Deliver this to High Priest Biotin.

name: Silvery Spidersilk
description: The spider silk of the silver spider. Take this to Trader Unoren of the weapons shop.

name: Unoren's Receipt
description: The receipt issued by the magic shop. Take this and go to Trader Creamees.

name: Creamees's Ticket
description: A ticket issued by the warehouse. Take this and go to Warehouse Keeper Julia.

name: Nightshade Leaf
description: The leaf of the nightshade plant. Take this to Nerupa.

name: Cracked Skull
description: The cracked skull of the Dark Horror. Take this to Magister Vlasty.

name: Perfect Skull
description: Skull of the dark horror. Take this to Magister Vlasty.

name: Fox Fur
description: A mane of keltirs. It is soft and luxurious, and used to spin thread and yarn. Take this to Cristel.

name: Fox Fur Yarn
description: Yarn spun out of the fur of keltirs. Take this to the former tailor Warehouse Keeper Rolfe, and he will make it into the doll's hair.

name: Maiden Doll
description: A doll resembling a Human maiden. Take this to Lighthouse Keeper Rockswell.

name: Plague Dust
description: A powder obtained from the plague zombie. Take this to Hierarch Asterios.

name: Andellia's Letter
description: A letter from Andellia asking her sister Thalia to send her the fruit of the Mother Tree.

name: Fruit of the Mother Tree
description: Fruit that the Mother Tree bears once every few years. Take this to Andellia.

name: Rumiel's 1st Poem
description: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's first poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Starden.

name: Rumiel's 2nd Poem
description: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's second poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Starden.

name: Rumiel's 3rd Poem
description: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's third poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Starden.

name: Rumiel's 4th Poem
description: The scroll containing Rumiel Moonshine's fourth poem. Gather all four and take them to Sentinel Starden.

name: Wererat's Fang
description: The fang of a dead ratman. Collect these to take to Master Ellenia.

name: Varool Foulclaw's Fang
description: The fang of Varool Foulclaw, leader of the ratmen. Take this to Master Ellenia.

name: Kirunak Skull
description: Kirunak's skull obtained after killing Kirunak, the leader of the drevanuls. Take this to Trader Creamees.

name: Zombie's Skin
description: A skin obtained from marshland zombies. Collect five and go to Trader Minaless.

name: Nightmare Crystal
description: A crystal used by the succubus Merkenis to cast nightmares. Take this to Tetrarch Vellior.

name: Spellbook: Light
description: Spellbook needed to learn Light.

name: Spellbook: Might
description: Spellbook needed to learn Might. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

name: Spellbook: Ice Bolt
description: Spellbook needed to learn Ice Bolt. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

name: Spellbook: Battle Heal
description: Spellbook needed to learn Battle Heal. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 14

name: Spellbook: Vampiric Touch
description: Spellbook needed to learn Vampiric Touch. Used by Human Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 14

name: Spellbook: Flame Strike
description: Spellbook needed to learn Flame Strike. Used by Human Wizards, Elven Wizards and Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

name: Spellbook: Cure Poison
description: Spellbook needed to learn Cure Poison. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

name: Spellbook: Group Heal
description: Spellbook needed to learn Group Heal. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 14

name: Spellbook: Curse: Poison
description: Spellbook needed to learn Curse: Poison. Used by Human Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

name: Spellbook: Curse: Weakness
description: Spellbook needed to learn Curse: Weakness. Used by Human Mystics and Elven Mystics.\nRequired level: 14

name: Spellbook: Summon Meal
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Meal. Used by Human Mystics and Elven Mystics.

name: Spellbook: Shield
description: Spellbook needed to learn Shield. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

name: Spellbook: Know Enemy
description: Spellbook needed to learn Know Enemy.

name: Lesser Healing Potion
description: A magical potion that slowly restores HP. Low endurance.

name: Greater Healing Potion
description: A magical potion that slowly restores HP. High endurance.

name: Haste Potion
description: A magical potion that increases speed.

name: Tutorial Parchment
description: Take the tutorial parchment to Grand Master Roien.

name: Tutorial Parchment
description: Take the tutorial parchment to Grand Master Roien.

name: Tutorial Parchment
description: Take the tutorial parchment to Nerupa.

name: Tutorial Parchment
description: Take the tutorial parchment to Mitraell, the chief of Dark Elves.

name: Recommendation
description: Take the recommendation to Grand Master Roien.

name: Recommendation
description: Take the recommendation to Grand Magister Gallint.

name: Leaf of the Mother Tree
description: Take the leaf of the Mother Tree to Nerupa.

name: Blood of Mitraell
description: Take the blood of Mitraell to Hierarch Mitraell.

name: Hyacinth Charm
description: A charm given by Hierarch Asterios. Go to the water source to seek those who pollute the waters of the elven village.

name: Hyacinth Charm
description: A charm given by Hierarch Asterios. Go to the water source and obtain five handfuls of plague dust from the zombies.

name: Beginner's Potion
description: A magical potion that slowly restores HP. Low endurance.

name: Boat Ticket: Talking Island to Gludin
description: Boat Ticket: Depart Talking Island - Arrive Gludin Harbor

name: Boat Ticket: Gludin to Talking Island
description: Boat Ticket: Depart Gludin Harbor - Arrive Talking Island

name: Carlon's Letter
description: First half year financial summary of the Iron Gate Guild: balance sheet and profit and loss statement of the Dark Elven Village guild.

name: Venom Sac
description: A Giant Spider's Poison Sac of poisonous spider. Gather ten of these and take to Astaron.

name: Wind Shard
description: A fragment of the elemental stone of wind. You can get them from Lirein, the wind spirits. Collect these to take to Rizraell.

name: Darin's Receipt
description: A receipt for a magical potion Darin received after paying Baulro. This must be handed to Baulro.

name: Baulro's Potion
description: A potion of courage that Baulro has created for the shy Darin, but its effects are unknown. This must be delivered to Darin.

name: Omen Beast's Eye
description: The first of three materials Tetrarch Talloth asked you to collect.

name: Taint Stone
description: The second of three materials Tetrarch Talloth asked you to collect.

name: Succubus Blood
description: The third of three materials Tetrarch Talloth asked you to collect.

name: Gludio Lord's Mark
description: A mark indicating that the bearer is carrying out the orders of the lord. Keep this in your possession and hunt Orcs or werewolves.

name: Orc's Necklace
description: A bone necklace that Orc fighters possess on their bodies for magic purposes. Take this to Captain Gilbert.

name: Werewolf's Fang
description: Fangs from a dead werewolf. Take this to Captain Gilbert.

name: Giant Spider's Leg
description: The legs cut off from a giant spider. Collect 8 of these and take them to Alshupes.

name: Undrias's Letter
description: Abyssal Celebrant Undrias's letter. Take this letter to Trader Iria, Warehouse Keeper Dorankus, and Master Trudy.

name: Ceremonial Dagger
description: A ceremonial dagger used during the mass of darkness. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Undrias.

name: Dreviant Wine
description: Holy wine used in the mass of darkness. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Undrias.

name: Garmiel's Scripture
description: The scripture used during the mass of darkness. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Undrias.

name: Arujien's Letter
description: The letter that Arujien has written in longing for Greenis. Show this to Gatekeeper Mirabel.

name: Arujien's Letter
description: The letter that Arujien has written in longing for Greenis. Show this to Trader Herbiel.

name: Arujien's Letter
description: Arujien's love letter. Since you have shown this to Mirabel and Herbiel, you must go back to Arujien.

name: Spellbook: Attack Aura
description: Spellbook needed to learn Attack Aura. Used by Elven Fighters and Dark Fighters.\nRequired level: 10

name: Spellbook: Elemental Heal
description: Spellbook needed to learn Elemental Heal. Used by Elven Fighters.\nRequired level: 15

name: Spellbook: Drain Health
description: Spellbook needed to learn Drain Health. Used by Knights and Dark Fighters.\nRequired level: Dark Fighter - 15, Knight - 20

name: Spellbook: Wind Walk
description: Spellbook needed to learn Wind Walk. Used by Clerics, Elven Oracles and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 20

name: Spellbook: Wind Shackle
description: Spellbook needed to learn Wind Shackle. Used by Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 14

name: Norman's Letter
description: First half year financial summary of the Iron Gate guild: balance sheet and profit and loss statement of the Gludio region guild.

name: Bone Fragment
description: Bone fragments of the undead skeletons. Collect ten of these and go back to Magister Harne.

name: Orc Amulet
description: An amulet possessed by Kaboo Orcs for magic purposes. Take it to Sentinel Rayen.

name: Orc's Necklace
description: A bone necklace possessed by Kaboo Orc fighters for magic purposes. Take it to Sentinel Rayen.

name: Orc Amulet
description: An amulet that the balor Orcs possess for magical purposes. Take this to Sentry Kayleen.

name: Orc's Necklace
description: A bone necklace that the balor Orc fighters carry for magical purposes. Take this to Sentry Kayleen.

name: Spore Sac
description: A sac containing spore pollen. Give 10 spore sacs to Herbiel.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Cobendell's Medicine
description: A fever medicine concocted by Master Cobendell.

name: Spiritbound Wand
description: The wand where the spirit of mirrors is bound to. Trap all three spirits of mirrors into the wand and take it to Grand Magister Gallint.

name: Spiritbound Wand
description: The wand where the spirit of mirrors is bound to. Trap all three spirits of mirrors into the wand and take it to Grand Magister Gallint.

name: Spiritbound Wand
description: The wand where the spirit of mirrors is bound to. Trap all three spirits of mirrors into the wand and take it to Grand Magister Gallint.

name: Auron's Letter
description: A letter written by Master Auron. Take this to Trader Simplon in the Town of Gludio.

name: Warrior Guild Mark
description: A mark that shows that player is a member of the Warrior Guild. Take this to the Ruins of Agony and kill tracker skeletons.

name: Rusted Bronze Sword
description: An old bronze sword used by tracker skeletons. Collect ten and give them to Trader Simplon.

name: Rusted Bronze Sword
description: An old and rusted bronze sword given by Trader Simplon, who said it was a 'Sword of Trial'. Take this to Master Auron.

name: Simplon's Letter
description: A letter written by Trader Simplon. Take this to Master Auron.

name: Venomous Spider's Leg
description: A cut leg of a dead Venomous Spider or an Arachnid Tracker. Collect twenty of these and take to Master Auron.

name: Medallion of Warrior
description: Take this medallion and go to the Grand Master of the Warrior's Guild to change your occupation to a Warrior.

name: Spellbook: Wind Strike
description: Spellbook needed to learn Wind Strike.

name: Spellbook: Self Heal
description: Spellbook needed to learn Self Heal.

name: Spellbook: Heal
description: Spellbook needed to learn Heal. Used by Human Mystics, Elven Mystics and Dark Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

name: Jenna's Letter
description: A letter from Sentry Jenna to Master Harant.

name: Sentry Blade
description: An adamantite sword newly issued to sentries.

name: Sentry Blade
description: An adamantite sword newly issued to sentries.

name: Sentry Blade
description: An adamantite sword newly issued to sentries.

name: Old Bronze Sword
description: A bronze sword used in the past by sentries. Recover this and take it to Sentry Jenna.

name: Bone Fragment
description: A bone fragment obtained from the undead skeletons. Gather 10 bone fragments and 3 Elf skulls, and take them to Unoren.

name: Elf Skull
description: The skull of an undead Elf. Gather 10 bone fragments and 3 Elf skulls, and take them to Unoren.

name: Dark Bezoar
description: Gather 13 dark bezoars and take them to Sentry Nelsya.

name: Sword of Ritual
description: Take this sword to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to a Knight.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end Trial of the Esquire.

name: Coin of Lords
description: A gold coin engraved with the mark of the lord of Gludio. Gather three or more of these to end the Trial of the Esquire.

name: Gludio Guard's 1st Badge
description: A mark that proves guard membership. As Captain Bathis requested, hunt Bugbear Raiders.

name: Bugbear Necklace
description: A necklace worn by Bugbears for incantation purposes. Collect ten of these and visit Captain Bathis.

name: Einhasad's 1st Temple Badge
description: As High Priest Raymond requested, go to the Ruins of Despair, defeat the departed spirits of priests, and collect 12 Einhasad crucifixes.

name: Einhasad's Crucifix
description: A holy symbol of Einhasad, the goddess of light. Collect 12 of these and go to High Priest Raymond.

name: Gludio Guard's 2nd Badge
description: The mark that distinguishes guard membership. As Captain Bezique requested, hunt giant spiders.

name: Venomous Spider's Leg
description: A severed leg of a dead Venomous Spider. Collect twenty of these and go to Captain Bezique.

name: Einhasad's 2nd Temple Badge
description: As High Priest Levian requested, kill Langk lizardmen and collect the proof.

name: Lizardman's Totem
description: A small sculpture Langk lizardmen carry with them. Collect twenty of these and take them to High Priestess Levian.

name: Gludio Guard's 3rd Badge
description: A mark that proves guard membership. As Captain Gilbert requested, hunt giant spiders.

name: Giant Spider's Husk
description: The husk of a giant spider that you peeled off. Collect twenty of these and take them to Captain Gilbert.

name: Einhasad's 3rd Temple Badge
description: As High Priest Biotin requested, hunt silent horrors in the Elven Ruins.

name: Skull of Silent Horror
description: The skull of a long-dead Elf. Collect 10 and take them to High Priest Biotin.

name: Bezique's Letter
description: Captain Bezique's letter to Neti. Find Neti in the Village of Gludin and give her the letter.

name: Spartoi's Bones
description: Undead bone pieces. Collect 10 and take them to Neti.

name: Horseshoe of Light
description: A proof you received after passing Neti's test. You must take it to Captain Bezique.

name: Most Wanted List
description: It is written that whoever does away with the Cat's Eye bandits and recovers the stolen goods will be rewarded.

name: Stolen Jewelry
description: A fair amount of jewelry the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take them to Captain Bezique.

name: Stolen Tomes
description: A rare tome the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take it to Captain Bezique.

name: Stolen Ring
description: An expensive necklace that the Cat's Eye bandits have stolen. You must take it back to Captain Bezique.

name: Stolen Necklace
description: An expensive necklace the Cat's Eye bandits stole. You must take it to Captain Bezique.

name: Bezique's Recommendation
description: Take this medallion to the Grand Masters of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to a Rogue.

name: 1st Letter of Order
description: A certificate of forbidden book collection given by Priest Zigaunt. Carry this around and collect all the forbidden books.

name: 2nd Letter of Order
description: A certificate that proves that you represent the religious body. This certificate is given by Priest Zigaunt. Take this to Lionel for covenant.

name: Lionel's Book
description: The last book of Lioniel. Hand this book to Grand Magister Gallint in the Einhovant School of Magic.

name: Book of Vivyan
description: A forbidden book Simplon sold to Vivyan. Collect five forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt.

name: Book of Simplon
description: The rest of Simplon's forbidden books. Collect 5 forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt.

name: Book of Praga
description: A forbidden book Simplon sold to Praga. Collect 5 forbidden books and take them to Priest Zigaunt.

name: Certificate of Gallint
description: A certificate that Gallint gives for safekeeping of forbidden books. Give to Lionel and receive covenant.

name: Pendant of Mother
description: The pendant of his mother that Guard Praga lost in the ruins. Take this to Guard Praga and receive a forbidden book.

name: Necklace of Mother
description: A necklace chain where a pendant used to hang. Recover the pendant from the zombies in the Ruins of Agony to make it complete.

name: Lionel's Covenant
description: Lionel's pledge not to use the forbidden book again. Give it to Priest Zigaunt and receive the mark of faith.

name: Mark of Faith
description: Take this token to the high priest of the temple to change your occupation to a Cleric.

name: Sorius's Letter
description: A letter received from Master Sorius to be given to Blacksmith Kluto in the Village of Gludin.

name: Kluto Box
description: A box that Kluto asked to give to Master Sorius.

name: Elven Knight Brooch
description: Take this brooch to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild and he will change your occupation to a Knight.

name: Topaz Piece
description: A piece of topaz obtained from the undead in the ruins. Collect 20 to take to Master Sorius.

name: Emerald Piece
description: A piece of emerald obtained from the Ol Mahum Novices. Collect 20 of these to take to Blacksmith Kluto.

name: Reisa's Letter
description: Master Reisa's letter to Guard Moretti. Find Guard Moretti and give him the letter.

name: Prias's 1st Torn Letter
description: A torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

name: Prias's 2nd Torn Letter
description: A torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

name: Prias's 3rd Torn Letter
description: A torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

name: Prias's 4th Torn Letter
description: A torn piece of letter written by Prias and is not legible. Collect all four torn pieces and take them to Guard Moretti.

name: Moretti's Herb
description: An herb that Guard Moretti asked to give to Prias.

name: Moretti's Letter
description: An urgent letter from Guard Moretti to Prias.

name: Prias's Letter
description: A reply of Prias to the letter from Guard Moretti. Hand this to Moretti.

name: Honorary Guard
description: A letter written by Guard Moretti to Master Reisa. Take it to Master Reisa.

name: Reisa's Recommendation
description: Take this recommendation to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to an Elven Scout.

name: Rosella's Letter
description: A letter from Rosella to Elven Magister Greenis. Related to ruby, the symbol of fire.

name: Red Down
description: Material needed to make ruby of magical powers. Collect 5 and take them to Magister Greenis for the magical power ruby.

name: Magical Powers Ruby
description: Ruby that symbolizes fire. Gather 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations.

name: Pure Aquamarine
description: Aquamarine that symbolizes water. Gather the 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations.

name: Appetizing Apple
description: A very ripe apple. Give it to Thalia for information on the aquamarine of water.

name: Gold Leaves
description: Leaves used as fertilizer for the Mother Tree. Collect five leaves and give them to Thalia for an aquamarine.

name: Immortal Love
description: A book Northwind wanted to borrow. If you give this book to Northwind, you can obtain information on the amethyst.

name: Amethyst
description: An amethyst obtained by killing sukar wererat. Give two to Northwind for nobility amethyst.

name: Nobility Amethyst
description: Amethyst that symbolizes wind. Gather 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations.

name: Rosella's Recommendation
description: Rosella's recommendation. If you show this to Varsak, you can get information on the fertility peridot.

name: Peridot
description: A peridot you can get if you kill a sniper skeleton. If you collect 3 and show them to Varsak, you can get the fertility peridot.

name: Fertility Peridot
description: A peridot that symbolizes the earth. Gather 4 jewels that symbolize nature and take them to Rosella for a token to change occupations.

name: Eternity Diamond
description: Take this token to the Grand Master of the Magician Guild to change your occupation to an Elven Wizard.

name: Crystal Medallion
description: A necklace given by Priest Manuel. Take this and go to the port Gludin to find the girl who works miracles.

name: Swindler's Money
description: Money from Perrin's swindling. Give it to Allana.

name: Allana's Diary
description: A diary with records of fraud miracle. Show this to Priest Manuel as proof.

name: Lizard Captain Order
description: An order of lizard captain to kidnap the sacred flame of prophecy.

name: Leaf of Oracle
description: Take this to the high priest to change your occupation to an Oracle.

name: Half of Diary
description: Half of the diary given by Allana. You must get money from Perrin and find the other half of the diary.

name: Palus Talisman
description: A talisman inscribed with palus runes that symbolize a deep lake. Carry this and hunt lycanthrope in the Neutral Zone.

name: Lycanthrope Skull
description: A skull obtained after killing lycanthrope. Collect thirteen and take them to Master Virgil.

name: Virgil's Letter
description: A letter written by Master Virgil. Take this to Abyssal Celebrant Kalinta of the village of Gludin.

name: Morte Talisman
description: A talisman with inscription of rune of Morte, symbol of death. Carry this and find materials needed for coffin.

name: Venomous Spider's Carapace
description: The hard carapace of a Venomous Spider. Take this and five Arachnid Tracker Silk threads to Abyssal Celebrant Kalinta.

name: Arachnid Tracker Silk
description: Arachnid Tracker web threads. Take five of these and a giant Venomous Spider carapace to Abyssal Celebrant Kalinta.

name: Coffin of Eternal Rest
description: A coffin used in funeral of Dark Elven Knight. Take this to Master Virgil.

name: Gaze of Abyss
description: Take this token to the Grand Master of the Fighter Guild to change your occupation to a Knight.

name: Shilen's Call
description: A letter received from Triskel. Go to Witch Arkenia of the Altar of Rites.

name: Arkenia's Letter
description: A letter received from Arkenia. Take this to Guard Leikan to obtain information about the thief.

name: Leikan's Note
description: A simple contract given by Guard Leikan. Must hunt moonstone beasts and collect their molars.

name: Moonstone Beast's Molar
description: A molar obtained after killing a moonstone beast. Collect 10 of these to take to Guard Leikan.

name: Leikan's Knife
description: A knife received as present from Leikan. They say it works well against the Calpicos.

name: Shilen's Tears
description: Magic liquid stolen from the Altar of Rites. Give this to Witch Arkenia.

name: Arkenia's Recommendation
description: A token of thanks received from Arkenia. Take this to Triskel.

name: Iron Heart
description: Take this to the Grand Master of the Dark Elf Guild to change your occupation to an Assassin.

name: Seed of Anger
description: A seed obtained from Charkeren, who is full of anger. Take this to Witch Varika.

name: Seed of Despair
description: A seed obtained from Witch Varika. You must obtain all four seeds to earn the Dark Jewel.

name: Seed of Horror
description: A seed obtained from Annika, who is full of horror. Take this to Witch Varika.

name: Seed of Lunacy
description: A seed obtained from a lunatic. Take this to Witch Varika.

name: Family's Remains
description: Remains of Charkeren's slain family. Find 3 and return to Charkeren.

name: Varika's Liquor
description: A medicine Varika made for the son of Duchess Dwell. If you give it to Duchess, you can obtain the Seed of Despair.

name: Knee Bone
description: The knee bone of undead that Annika was looking for. Give this to Annika to obtain the Seed of Horror.

name: Heart of Lunacy
description: The hearts of those who have been turned into skeletons by a sorcerer of lunacy. Collect 3 Hearts of Lunacy and take them to Arkenia.

name: Dark Jewel
description: Take this token to the Grand Master of the Dark Elf guild to change your occupation to a Dark Wizard.

name: Sidra's Letter
description: The letter of introduction written by Magister Sidra. Take this to Magister Talbot.

name: Blank Sheet
description: A blank scroll. Take this and hunt dark succubus to obtain bloody runes.

name: Bloody Rune
description: Runes written with the blood of dark succubus. Collect 5 and take to Magister Talbot.

name: Garmiel's Book
description: The sacred book of Gran Kain, god of darkness, written in elven language. One of two books Sidra told you to find.

name: Prayer of Adonius
description: The widely beloved prayer book. Take this to Priest Adonius in the village of Gludin.

name: Penitent's Mark
description: The mark that shows one is in the course of repenting one's sins. Carry this and hunt skeletons and zombies in the Ruins of Despair.

name: Ashen Bones
description: Bones from the skeletons and zombies in the Ruins of Despair. Gather 10 and take them to Priest Adonius.

name: Andariel Book
description: The sacred book of Einhasad, goddess of light, written in the Elven language. One of two books Sidra told you to find.

name: Orb of Abyss
description: Take this token to a Grand Master of a Dark Elf Guild in any major city to change your occupation to a Shillien Oracle.

name: Squire's Mark
description: A mark that indicates an esquire. Wander around the villages in Gludio and meet with guard captains and high priests.

name: Greenis's Charm
description: Greenis's good luck charm. Kill pincer spiders and give 5 red down to Greenis.

name: Sap of the Mother Tree
description: Sap of Mother Tree that dryad elders like. Find 5 gold leaves and give them to Thalia.

name: Lucky Potpourri
description: Northwind's lucky potpourri. Give Northwind 2 amethysts obtained from killing sukar wererats.

name: Tamil's Necklace
description: Tamil's necklace. Show it to Perrin.

name: Kluto's Memo
description: A memo from Blacksmith Kluto asking to defeat the Ol Mahum Novices.

name: Lucky Key
description: A bronze key. Hunt zombies in the swamp area, collect 3 remains, and take them to Charkeren.

name: Candle
description: A candle that lights up the dark. Collect 2 knee bones from the undead and give them to Annika for the Seed of Horror.

name: Hub Scent
description: Fragrant herb potpourri. Obtain 3 Hearts of Lunacy from a skeleton scout and take them to Arkenia.

name: Map of Luster
description: A map given by the Flame Salamander. Kill ratman fighters and give the key of flame to the salamander in exchange for the token of fire.

name: Key of Flame
description: The key that can be obtained by killing a ratman fighter. When you give it to a salamander, he will give you the token of fire.

name: Flame Earring
description: The token of fire given by fire spirit salamander. Collect four tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations.

name: Broken Bronze Mirror
description: The mirror given by the Wind Sylph. Go to the lizardmen of the Wastelands and obtain the Wind Feather and return it to the Wind Sylph.

name: Wind Feather
description: The feather hidden by the Wind Sylph near the Wastelands. Return this to the Wind Sylph to receive a Wind Token.

name: Wind Bangle
description: The Wind Token given to you by the Wind Spirit Sylph. Collect all four tokens and give them to Parina to receive a special token that will enable you to change occupations.

name: Rama's Diary
description: Kill water seer and take two sparkle pebbles to water Undine for the token of water.

name: Sparkle Pebble
description: Kill water seer in Lake Fellmere for stones. If you give this to Water Undine, she will give you the token of water.

name: Water Necklace
description: The token of water given by water spirit Undine. Collect four tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations.

name: Rusty Coin
description: The coin given by earth snake. Kill red bear and give red soil to earth snake for Token of Earth.

name: Red Soil
description: The soil obtained from killing red bear. Give to the earth snake for the token of earth.

name: Earth Ring
description: Token of Earth given by earth snake. Collect 4 tokens and give them to Parina to receive the token that enables changing occupations.

name: Bead of Season
description: Take this bead to the high priest of the temple to change your occupation to a Wizard.

name: Rusted Key
description: The key that unlocks Prias's shackles. Take this and go to Prias.

name: Spellbook: Defense Aura
description: Spellbook needed to learn Defense Aura. Used by Elven Fighters and Dark Fighters.\nRequired level: 5

name: Predator's Fang
description: Collect 100 predator's fangs and take them to Pixy Murika.

name: Goblin Club
description: A sturdy club made from thick tree branches and carried by goblins. Take this to Treant Bremac.

name: Glass Shard
description: A broken glass piece. Can be sold in any shop for a low price.

name: Emerald
description: Can be sold in any shop for a high price.

name: Blue Onyx
description: A blue jewel. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Onyx
description: A black jewel. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Silvery Leaf
description: The leaf of a silvery mistletoe. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Bone Arrow
description: An arrow made from a piece of sharpened bone. It is used as an arrow for a D-Grade bow.

name: Steel Arrow
description: A powerful arrow made of steel. It is used as an arrow for a C-Grade bow.

name: Silver Arrow
description: A steel arrow plated with silver.

name: Mithril Arrow
description: A steel arrow plated with mithril.

name: Shining Arrow
description: The most powerful arrow. Unknown material.

name: Golem's Stoneheart
description: A stone found within the remains of a destroyed golem. Take this to Trader Rorento.

name: Monster Eye Meat
description: The carcass of monster eye. Take this to Trader Sarien.

name: Basilisk's Gizzard
description: The digestive organ of a basilisk. Take this to Trader Sarien.

name: Anatomy Diagram
description: A diagram designed by Avella physicians for human anatomy. Use this to perform Samed's request.

name: Zombie Head
description: A head of zombie from ruins. Take this to Samed of the town of Gludio.

name: Zombie Heart
description: A heart of zombie from ruins. Take this to Samed in the Town of Gludio.

name: Zombie Liver
description: A liver of zombie from ruins. Take this to Samed in the town of Gludio.

name: Skull
description: A skull of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the town of Gludio.

name: Rib Bone
description: A rib of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the town of Gludio.

name: Spine
description: A spine of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the town of Gludio.

name: Arm Bone
description: An arm bone of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the town of Gludio.

name: Thigh Bone
description: A thigh bone of skeleton from ruins. Take this to Samed in the town of Gludio.

name: Complete Skeleton
description: A complete skeleton put together with bone pieces by undertaker Varsak. Take this to Samed in the town of Gludio.

name: Red Cross Badge
description: A soldier badge of foreign troops. Take this to Leopold in Gludin.

name: Blue Cross Badge
description: A badge of high ranking of Gracian foreign troops. Take this to Leopold in Gludin.

name: Black Cross Badge
description: A badge of captain ranking of Gracian foreign troops. Take this to Leopold in Gludin.

name: Spider's Carapace
description: The hard carapace of a spider. Often used to coat a shield or a helmet. Take this to Trader Arodin.

name: Spider Silk
description: Tough, stretchy spider web. Used to make bowstrings. Take this to Trader Arodin.

name: Spider's Poison Sac
description: A sac with a spider's deadly poison in it. Can be sold to Trader Cullinas in Gludin.

name: Broken Stoneheart
description: A small pieces of stone found within the remains of a destroyed golem. Take this to Trader Rorento.

name: Monster Eye's Lens
description: The transparent part of monster eye. Take this to Trader Sarien.

name: Wolf Claw
description: Collect 50 wolf claws and take them to Trader Payne of the weapons and armor shop.

name: Imp Shackles
description: The metal shackles attached around the neck of the imp race. Take this to Sentry Kristin.

name: Black Lion Mark
description: The mark that indicates one is a member of the Black Lion troop.

name: Spellbook: Aqua Swirl
description: Spellbook needed to learn Aqua Swirl. Used by Elven Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

name: Spellbook: Twister
description: Spellbook needed to learn Twister. Used by Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

name: Spellbook: Blaze
description: Spellbook needed to learn Blaze. Used by Human Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

name: Magic Gem
description: An ingredient needed for certain magic.

name: Greater Haste Potion
description: A magical potion that increases movement speed dramatically

name: Greater Swift Attack Potion
description: A magical potion that increases Atk. Spd. dramatically

name: Spellbook: Poison Recovery
description: Spellbook needed to learn Poison Recovery. Used by Elven Knights and Elven Scouts.\nRequired level: Elven Knight - 20, Elven Scout - 24

name: Spellbook: Divine Heal
description: Spellbook needed to learn Divine Heal. Used by Human Knights.\nRequired level: 28

name: Spellbook: Cure Bleeding
description: Spellbook needed to learn Cure Bleeding. Used by Elven Knights and Elven Scouts.\nRequired level: 24

name: Spellbook: Entangle
description: Spellbook needed to learn Entangle. Used by Elven Knights and Elven Scouts.\nRequired level: 36

name: Spellbook: Freezing Strike
description: Spellbook needed to learn Freezing Strike. Used by Palus Knights and Assassins.\nRequired level: 36

name: Spellbook: Power Break
description: Spellbook needed to learn Power Break. Used by Palus Knights and Assassins.\nRequired level: 32

name: Spellbook: Poison
description: Spellbook needed to learn Poison. Used by Palus Knights and Assassins.\nRequired level: 20

name: Spellbook: Sprint
description: Spellbook needed to learn Sprint. Used by Elven Knights and Elven Scouts.\nRequired level: 32

name: Spellbook: Recharge
description: Spellbook needed to learn Recharge. Used by Elven Oracles and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 30

name: Spellbook: Disrupt Undead
description: Spellbook needed to learn Disrupt Undead. Used by Clerics, Elven Oracles and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 20

name: Spellbook: Resist Poison
description: Spellbook needed to learn Resist Poison. Used by Oracles and Prophets.\nRequired level: Oracle - 35, Prophet - 60

name: Spellbook: Mental Shield
description: Spellbook needed to learn Mental Shield. Used by Clerics, Elven Oracles and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 25

name: Spellbook: Holy Weapon
description: Spellbook needed to learn Holy Weapon. Used by Clerics and Elven Oracles.\nRequired level: 25

name: Spellbook: Regeneration
description: Spellbook needed to learn Regeneration. Used by Clerics and Elven Oracles.\nRequired level: 35

name: Spellbook: Empower
description: Spellbook needed to learn Empower. Used by Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 25

name: Spellbook: Berserker Spirit
description: Spellbook needed to learn Berserker Spirit. Used by Clerics.\nRequired level: 35

name: Spellbook: Quickness
description: Spellbook needed to learn Quickness.

name: Spellbook: Sleep
description: Spellbook needed to learn Sleep. Used by Human Wizards, Clerics, Elven Wizards, Elven Oracles, Dark Wizards, and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 25

name: Spellbook: Surrender to Water
description: Spellbook needed to learn Surrender to Water.

name: Spellbook: Surrender to Wind
description: Spellbook needed to learn Surrender to Water

name: Spellbook: Peace
description: Spellbook needed to learn Peace. Used by Clerics.\nRequired level: 35

name: Spellbook: Focus
description: Spellbook needed to learn Focus. Used by Clerics and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 25

name: Spellbook: Concentration
description: Spellbook needed to learn Concentration. Used by Human Wizards, Clerics, Elven Wizards, Elven Oracles, Dark Wizards, and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 20

name: Spellbook: Surrender To Fire
description: Spellbook needed to learn Surrenders To Fire. Used by Human Wizards.\nRequired level: 25

name: Spellbook: Acumen
description: Spellbook needed to learn Acumen. Used by Clerics.\nRequired level: 20

name: Spellbook: Agility
description: Spellbook needed to learn Agility. Used by Elven Oracles.\nRequired level: 25

name: Spellbook: Summon Kat the Cat
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Kat the Cat. Used by Human Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

name: Spellbook: Servitor Recharge
description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Recharge. Used by Human Wizards, Elven Wizards, and Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 25

name: Spellbook: Servitor Heal
description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Heal. Used by Human Wizards, Elven Wizards, and Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

name: Spellbook: Servitor Wind Walk
description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Wind Walk. Used by Human Wizards.\nRequired level: 35

name: Spellbook: Servitor Magic Boost
description: Spellbook needed to learn Bright Servitor. Used by Elven Wizards.\nRequired level: 35

name: Spellbook: Mighty Servitor
description: Spellbook needed to learn Mighty Servitor. Used by Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 35

name: Spellbook: Slow
description: Spellbook needed to learn Slow. Used by Human Wizards and Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 35

name: Spellbook: Poisonous Cloud
description: Spellbook needed to learn Poisonous Cloud. Used by Human Wizards and Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 25

name: Spellbook: Aura Burn
description: Spellbook needed to learn Aura Burn. Used by Wizards, Elven Wizards and Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 20

name: Spellbook: Resist Aqua
description: Spellbook needed to learn Resist Aqua. Used by Elven Wizards and Prophets.\nRequired level: Elven Wizard - 25, Prophet - 58

name: Spellbook: Resist Wind
description: Spellbook needed to learn Resist Wind. Used by Shillien Oracles and Prophets.\nRequired level: Shillien Oracle - 35, Prophet - 58

name: Spellbook: Resist Fire
description: Spellbook needed to learn Resist Fire. Used by Clerics.\nRequired level: 30

name: Spellbook: Dryad Root
description: Spellbook needed to learn Dryard Root. Used by Clerics, Oracles and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 25

name: Spellbook: Curse of Chaos
description: Spellbook needed to learn Curse of Chaos. Used by Human Wizards and Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 35

name: Spellbook: Surrender To Earth
description: Spellbook needed to learn Surrender To Earth. Used by Elven Wizards.\nRequired level: 35

name: Spellbook: Surrender To Poison
description: Spellbook needed to learn Surrender To Poison. Used by Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 25

name: Blood Mark
description: An item needed to upgrade a clan to level three.

name: Ingredient List
description: A list of cooking ingredients from Jonas. Mandragora essence. Honey. Dionian potato. Marsh moss. Floating eye meat.

name: Sonia's Botany Book
description: A picture that shows what a mandragora looks like. You need this to get mandragora roots.

name: Red Mandragora Root
description: Red mandragora root. Collect these to take them to Trader Sonia.

name: White Mandragora Root
description: Rare white mandragora root. Collect these to take them to Trader Sonia.

name: Red Mandragora Sap
description: Red mandragora sap. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: White Mandragora Sap
description: Transparent mandragora sap. One of the ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: Jacob's Insect Book
description: A diagram that depicts the drawing of a bee. You must possess this in order to obtain nectar and royal jelly from the bloody bee or the stinger wasp.

name: Nectar
description: Honey water taken from a giant bee. Collect 20 of these to take them to Guard Jacob.

name: Royal Jelly
description: A rare ingredient that can be taken only from newborn working bees. Collect these and take them to Guard Jacob.

name: Honey
description: Honey made from the nectar you collected from bees. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: Golden Honey
description: Golden honey made from the nectar and the royal jelly you collected from bees. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: Pano's Contract
description: A contract Grocer Pano gave you. It says, if you kill Hobgoblins and bring 30 pieces of proof, he will give you potatoes as a reward.

name: Hobgoblin Amulet
description: An amulet made of a feather that Hobgoblins carry on their bodies. Collect 30 of these and take them to Grocer Pano.

name: Dionian Potato
description: The highest-quality potatoes grown in the rich soil of southern Dion. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: Glyvka's Botany Book
description: A picture that explains how to collect moss. You need this to collect marsh moss from grey ants or crimson ants.

name: Green Marsh Moss
description: Green marsh moss is sometimes used in cooking. Collect this and take it to Priestess Glyvka.

name: Brown Marsh Moss
description: Rare brown marsh moss, its flavors are superior to the green ones. Collect this and take it to Priestess Glyvka.

name: Green Moss Bundle
description: A bundle of well-cared-for moss, collected from a marshy place for cooking. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: Brown Moss Bundle
description: A bundle of well-cared-for moss, collected from a marshy place for cooking. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: Rollant's Creature Book
description: A picture that shows what a monster eye looks like. You need this to collect the right monster eye searcher or the monster eye gazer.

name: Body of Monster Eye
description: Severed flesh of the dead body of monster eye. Take this to Magister Rollant.

name: Monster Eye Meat
description: The dead body of a monster eye, ready to cook. One of the five ingredients needed for Jonas's cooking.

name: Jonas's 1st Steak Dish
description: A plate that contains Jonas's monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

name: Jonas's 2nd Steak Dish
description: A plate that contains Jonas's monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

name: Jonas's 3rd Steak Dish
description: A plate that contains Jonas's monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

name: Jonas's 4th Steak Dish
description: A plate that contains Jonas's monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

name: Jonas's 5th Steak Dish
description: A plate that contains Jonas's monster eye steak. Take this to Magister Mirien.

name: Mirien's Review
description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review
description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review
description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review
description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review
description: A letter from Magister Mirien about the taste of Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Harpy Feather
description: A feather taken from a harpy. Collect these and take them to Guard Belton.

name: Medusa Venom
description: Poison extracted from the snake hair of a medusa. Collect these and take them to Guard Belton.

name: Wyrm's Tooth
description: A sharp fang of a Wyrm. Collect these and take them to Guard Belton.

name: Jonas's Salad Recipe
description: Jonas's recipe for making marsh moss salad.

name: Jonas's Sauce Recipe
description: Jonas's recipe for making mandragora sauce.

name: Jonas's Steak Recipe
description: Jonas's recipe for making monster eye meat steak.

name: Crystal (D-Grade)
description: A crystal of D-Grade.

name: Crystal (C-Grade)
description: A crystal of C-Grade.

name: Crystal (B-Grade)
description: A crystal of B-Grade.

name: Crystal (A-Grade)
description: A crystal of A-Grade.

name: Crystal (S-Grade)
description: A crystal of S-Grade.

name: Soulshot (D-Grade)
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a D-grade weapon.

name: Soulshot (C-Grade)
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a C-grade weapon.

name: Soulshot (B-Grade)
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with a B-grade weapon.

name: Soulshot (A-Grade)
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with an A-grade weapon.

name: Soulshot (S-Grade)
description: The power of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a weapon, temporarily increasing power of attack. Used with an S-grade weapon.

name: Gludin Panacen
description: A medicated herb from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio.

name: Gludin Vermouth
description: Medicated wine from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio.

name: Artemeter
description: A medicated herb from Gludio. Purchase at the Castle Gludio.

name: Kasha Wolf Fang
description: A fang that is obtained by killing a kasha wolf. Collect fifty and take these to Praetorian Rukain.

name: Grave Robber's Head
description: The head of goblin robbers, who damaged the graves of Orc ancestors. Collect 50 to take to Seer Livina.

name: Black Soulstone
description: A black soulstone pulled out of the heart of a rakeclaw imp. Collect these to take to Atuba Chief Varkees.

name: Red Soulstone
description: A red soulstone pulled out of the heart of a rakeclaw imp. Collect these to take to Atuba Chief Varkees.

name: Maraku Werewolf Head
description: The head of a Maraku werewolf that has been cut off after they were defeated. Collect 40 of these and take them to Prefect Brukurse.

name: Darkwing Bat Fang
description: A fang of a darkwing bat. Collect 70 of these and take them to Neruga Chief Tantus.

name: Varangka's Parasite
description: An evil parasite that summons Varangka's trackers.

name: Kasha Parasite
description: A parasite-type evil spirit that comes out of the gray bear polluted by kasha's evil spirit. This is the key calling forth the kasha totem spirit.

name: Kasha Crystal
description: A crystal obtained by killing the gray bear totem polluted by kasha's evil spirit. Take this to Seer Tanapi.

name: Black Wolf Pelt
description: Pelt of a black wolf. Collect 40 to take to Maryse Redbonnet.

name: Goblin Necklace
description: A necklace obtained by killing a low-level goblin. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

name: Goblin Pendant
description: A necklace obtained by killing a high-level goblin. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

name: Goblin Lord Pendant
description: A necklace obtained by killing the goblin lord. Collect these and take them to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

name: Suspicious Memo
description: A suspicious memo obtained by killing a goblin brigand leader. Take this to Golden Wheel's Spiron.

name: Suspicious Contract
description: A suspicious contract completed by collecting suspicious memos. This contract reveals that the Silver Scale Guild requested the brigands to attack the freight wagons.

name: Chrysolite Ore
description: Chrysolite Ore received from defeating Utuku Orcs. Collect these and take them to Filaur of the Gray Pillar.

name: Torn Map Fragment
description: A part of the map that reveals the hidden vein of Chrysolite. Collect 4 of these pieces to complete the map.

name: Hidden Ore Map
description: A map that reveals a hidden vein of Chrysolite. Take this to Filaur of the Gray Pillar.

name: Bat Fang
description: A fang taken by killing a blade bat or a barb bat. Collect 100 and take them to Bronze Key's Keef

name: Floating Stone
description: A stone that floats on water. Obtain it from a magical weaver. Collect 50 and take them to Black Anvil's Arin.

name: Tarantula Spider Silk
description: The spider silk that makes when making their nests. Collect these and take them to Trader Mion.

name: Tarantula Spinnerette
description: A pocket shaped organ that makes spider silk. Take this to Defender Nathan.

name: Giant Spider's Skin
description: The husk of a giant spider that you peel off. Collect them and take them to Edmond.

name: Voucher of Flame
description: This token represents the qualification of Orc fighters. Take this and go to the Flame Guardian Vulkus.

name: Necklace of Flame
description: The necklace of flame given by Vulkus. Hand this to Kakai, the Lord of Flame, king of the Orcs.

name: License of Miner
description: A license given to Dwarves to allow them to mine. Take this and go to Foreman Laferon.

name: Laferon's Recommendation
description: The recommendation of Foreman Laferon. Take this and go to First Elder Lockirin.

name: Totem of Hestui
description: The totem of the Hestui. Can be sold in any shop for a high price.

name: Maraku Werewolf Totem
description: Maraku Wolfmen Totem. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Grandma's Pearl
description: An article left by the grandmother of Redbonnet. Can be sold in any shop for a high price.

name: Grandma's Mirror
description: An article left by the grandmother of Redbonnet. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Grandma's Necklace
description: An article left by the grandmother of Redbonnet. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Grandma's Hairpin
description: An article left by the grandmother of Redbonnet. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Spellbook: Confusion
description: Spellbook needed to learn Confusion. Used by Palace Knights and Assassins.\nLevel acquired: Palace Knight 24, Assassin 24

name: Spellbook: Charm
description: Spellbook needed to learn Charm. Used by Elven Knights and Elven Scouts.\nRequired level: 20

name: Spellbook: Resurrection
description: Spellbook needed to learn Resurrection. Used by Clerics, Elven Oracles, and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 20

name: Spellbook: Kiss of Eva
description: Spellbook needed to learn Kiss of Eva. Used by Clerics, Elven Oracles and Shillien Oracles.\nRequired level: 20

name: Spellbook: Corpse Life Drain
description: Spellbook needed to learn Corpse Life Drain. Used by Human Wizards and Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 30

name: Spellbook: Body To Mind
description: Spellbook needed to learn Body To Mind. Used by Human Wizards and Dark Wizards.\nRequired level: 25

name: Amulet: Flame Chant
description: Amulet required for the Flame Chant spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 30

name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Gift
description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Gift spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 30

name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Blessing
description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Blessing spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 35

name: Amulet: Chant of Fire
description: Amulet required for the Chant of Fire spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 20

name: Amulet: Chant of Battle
description: Amulet required for the Chant of Battle spell. Used by Orc Mystics.\nRequired level: 14

name: Amulet: Chant of Shielding
description: Amulet required for the Chant of Shielding spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 20

name: Amulet: Soul Shield
description: Amulet required for the Soul Shield spell. Used by Orc Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

name: Amulet: Life Drain
description: Amulet required for the Life Drain spell. Used by Orc Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

name: Amulet: Fear
description: Amulet required for the Fear spell. Used by Orc Mystics.\nRequired level: 14

name: Amulet: Venom
description: Amulet required for the Venom spell. Used by Orc Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

name: Amulet: Seal of Chaos
description: Amulet required for the Seal of Chaos spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 30

name: Amulet: Dreaming Spirit
description: Amulet required for the Spirit Dream spell. Used by Orc Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

name: Amulet: Seal of Slow
description: Amulet required for the Seal of Slow spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 35

name: Amulet: Chill Flame
description: Amulet required for the Chill Flame spell. Used by Orc Mystics.\nRequired level: 7

name: Amulet: Blaze Quake
description: Amulet required for the Blaze Quake spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 25

name: Amulet: Aura Sink
description: Amulet required for the Aura Sink spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 25

name: Amulet: Madness
description: Amulet required for the Madness spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 20

name: Amulet: Frost Flame
description: Amulet required for the Frost Flame spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 20

name: Amulet: Seal of Binding
description: Amulet required for the Seal of Binding spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 25

name: Amulet: Seal of Poison
description: Amulet required for the Seal of Poison spell. Used by Orc Shamans.\nRequired level: 20

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to the nearest village

name: Greater Healing Potion
description: A magical potion that quickly restores HP. Its effect lasts for 15 seconds.

name: Quick Healing Potion
description: A magical potion that quickly restores HP.

name: Honey Khandar
description: A miraculous medicine made of the mixture of honey and khandar extract. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Bear Fur Cloak
description: A cloak made of grizzly bear's fur. Excellent for keeping warm. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Bloody Axe
description: An axe that holds the blood of wild animals. It is said to strengthen its owner's life force. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Ancestor Skull
description: A skull of an ancestor of Urutus. It is said to strengthen its owner's life force. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Spider Dust
description: A grain of powder made of dried legs of poisonous spiders. Smelling it will make you feel refreshed. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Deep Sea Orb
description: A pearl brought out of a deep sea. It is said to help predict the future. Take this to Centurion Nakusin.

name: Bolter's List
description: The list of things that Bolter wants you to bring from the village.

name: Mining Boots
description: A pair of mining boots you got from Trader Garita. Take this to Miner Bolter.

name: Miner's Pick
description: A miner's pick you got from Blacksmith Brunon. Take this to Miner Bolter.

name: Boomboom Powder
description: A sack of boomboom powder you got from Trader Shari. Take this to Miner Bolter.

name: Redstone Beer
description: Delicious beer you got from Warehouse Chief Reed. Take this to Miner Bolter.

name: Bolter's Smelly Socks
description: A pair of socks that Miner Bolter gave you. For what...?

name: Hatos's 1st Order
description: The order to kill Baranka's messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Hatos's 2nd Order
description: The order states that you must kill Baranka's messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Hatos's 3rd Order
description: The order states that you must kill Baranka's messenger. After killing him, recover the letter and take it to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Letter to Dark Elf
description: The secret letter that Baranka is sending to Dark Elven Magister Kaland. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Letter to Human
description: The secret letter that Baranka is sending to Duke Van Halter. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Letter to Elf
description: The secret letter that Baranka is sending to Elven Master Laria. Take the letter to Urutu Chief Hatos.

name: Gouph's Contract
description: Collector Gouph drew up this contract when buying the star diamond from Trader Reep. Take this to Trader Reep.

name: Reep's Contract
description: Trader Reep drew up this contract when he requested the delivery of the star diamond. Take this to Carrier Torocco.

name: Elven Wine
description: Carrier Torocco bought this high quality wine to give it to his old friend, Maron, as a present. Take this to Miner Maron.

name: Brunon's Dice
description: These dice were specially made for gambling. Take these to Blacksmith Brunon.

name: Brunon's Contract
description: This contract says if Brunon gets the 20 stolen jewels back from goblins, he can get the star diamond back.

name: Aquamarine
description: This jewel is obtained by the goblin brigand leader. Take 10 aquamarines and 10 chrysoberyls to Blacksmith Brunon.

name: Chrysoberyl
description: This jewel is obtained by the goblin brigand leader. Take 10 aquamarines and 10 chrysoberyls to Blacksmith Brunon.

name: Gem Box
description: Blacksmith Brunon gives this gem box. Take it to Collector Gouph.

name: Coal Piece
description: This coal piece is in the gem box. Take this to Blacksmith Brunon.

name: Brunon's Letter
description: Blacksmith Brunon sends this letter to Warehouse Keeper Murdoc asking for the right box.

name: Berry Tart
description: Sweet strawberry-flavored tart. Warehouse Keeper Murdoc sends this to Warehouse Keeper Airy as a present of apology.

name: Bat Diagram
description: This diagram shows the blade bat in details. Take this and go hunt blade bats to obtain the star diamond.

name: Star Diamond
description: Everyone is looking for this diamond. Take this to the real owner.

name: Starstone
description: A mineral collected from the destroyed greystone golem. Collect 20 of these and take them to Gatekeeper Tamil.

name: Starstone
description: A mineral obtained by defeated whinstone golems. Collect twenty and take them to Gatekeeper Wirphy.

name: Mirien's Review
description: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas's dish. Take this and go to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review
description: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review
description: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Mirien's Review
description: A letter Magister Mirien wrote after tasting Jonas's dish. Take this to Jonas.

name: Green Blood
description: Goblin's blood. If you have enough of this item, the Kuruka ratman leader appears.

name: Goblin Dwelling Map
description: A map showing goblins' dwelling. Take this and find the goblin tribes and destroy them.

name: Kuruka Ratman Tooth
description: A tooth obtained after killing Kuruka ratman leader. Collect ten of these to take to Prefect Karukia.

name: Betrayer's Report
description: A detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

name: Betrayer's Report
description: A detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

name: Betrayer's Report
description: A detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

name: Betrayer's Report
description: A detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

name: Betrayer's Report
description: A detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

name: Betrayer's Report
description: A detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

name: Betrayer's Report
description: A detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

name: Betrayer's Report
description: A detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

name: Betrayer's Report
description: A detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

name: Betrayer's Report
description: A detailed account of a betrayer who recently joined the Umbar tribe and settled on the outskirts of a mountain west of the Spider Nest.

name: Head of Betrayer
description: The head of a traitor orc. Collect 2 and take them to Prefect Kasman in Gludin Village.

name: Mark of Raider
description: A necklace given to an Orc who has earned the qualification to become an Orc Raider. Take this to the high prefect to change your occupation to an Orc Raider.

name: Pomegranate
description: A red pomegranate fruit given by Gantaki. Take this and go to Khavatari Rosheek.

name: 1st Leather Pouch
description: A leather pouch given by Khavatari Rosheek. Take this and hunt kasha bears and collect 5 of their claws.

name: 2nd Leather Pouch
