name: Soulshot: No Grade for Beginners
description: A Soulshot: No Grade for use by newbies.

name: Spiritshot: No Grade for Beginners
description: A Spiritshot: No Grade for use by newbies.

name: Lucky Charm (D-Grade)
description: Bestows blessing on its owner such that when the owner dies during a boss/raid war, his/her abilities will not be diminished. This item can only be used on self, by a character whose level is between 20 and 39.

name: Lucky Charm (C-Grade)
description: Bestows blessing on its owner such that when the owner dies during a boss/raid war, his/her abilities will not be diminished. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 40 and 51.

name: Lucky Charm (B-Grade)
description: Bestows blessing on its owner such that when the owner dies during a boss/raid war, his/her abilities will not be diminished. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 52 and 60.

name: Lucky Charm (A-Grade)
description: Bestows blessing on its owner such that when the owner dies during a boss/raid war, his/her abilities will not be diminished. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 61 and 75.

name: Lucky Charm (S-Grade)
description: Bestows blessing on its owner such that when the owner dies during a boss/raid war, his/her abilities will not be diminished. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is 76 or higher.

name: Spellbook: Aqua Splash
description: Spellbook needed to learn Aqua Splash. Used by Spellsingers.\nRequired level: 58

name: Spellbook: Rain of Fire
description: Spellbook needed to learn Rain of Fire. Used by Sorcerers and Spellsingers.\nRequired level: 58

name: Spellbook: Mass Slow
description: Spellbook needed to learn Mass Slow. Used by Necromancers.\nRequired level: 62

name: Spellbook: Servitor Empowerment
description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Empowerment. Used by Warlocks, Elemental Summoners and Phantom Summoners.\nRequired level: 52

name: Spellbook: Servitor Cure
description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Cure. Used by Warlocks, Elemental Summoners and Phantom Summoners.\nRequired level: 40

name: Spellbook: Servitor Blessing
description: Spellbook needed to learn Servitor Blessing. Used by Warlocks, Elemental Summoners and Phantom Summoners.\nRequired level: 62

name: Spellbook: Wild Magic
description: Spellbook needed to learn Wild. Used by Elven Elders and Shillien Elders.\nRequired level: 62

name: Spellbook: Advanced Block
description: Spellbook needed to learn Advanced Block. Used by Elven Elders.\nRequired level: 58

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Clan Hall
description: A magical scroll that transports you to your clan hall. If you don't belong to a clan that possesses a clan hall, this scroll will have no effect.

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Castle
description: A magical scroll that transports you to your castle. If you don't belong to a clan that controls a castle, this scroll will have no effect.

name: Lienrik Egg
description: Lienrik's egg. It's the item that Pet Manager Rood of Heine asked you to find for him.

name: Lienrik Egg
description: Lienrik's shiny red egg. Pet Manager Rood of Heine asked you to find it for him, but...?

name: Stone of Contract
description: In order to obtain the power of darkness, you will first need to secure this item. Take it to Trader Galman in Dragon Valley.

name: Alligator Tooth
description: Sharp canine tooth of the Alligator. Bring this to the warehouse keeper of Heine.

name: Mysterious Map Piece
description: A faded piece of paper. Possibly part of a map.

name: Carnivore Spore
description: A tissue sample collected from a spore zombie from the Sea of Spores. It is used as research material by Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Herbivorous Spore
description: A spore sample collected from a rotting tree from the Sea of Spores. It is used as research material by Magister Gauen of the Ivory Tower.

name: Jade Crystal
description: A jade crystal collected from the Enchanted Valley. Take it to Warehouse Freightman Silva of Hunters Village.

name: Snake Scale
description: A snake scale from the bodies of Falibati and Trives. Take it to Grand Master Oltran of Town of Aden.

name: Remains of Aden Residents
description: Remains of residents of Aden Castle who were killed during the Aden-Elmore war. Collect 60 of them and take them to High Priest Orven.

name: Receipt of Supply
description: A document made from collected mysterious document pieces. Take it to Guard Coleman.

name: Suspicious Document Piece
description: A piece of document that seems to contain some suspicious contents. If you collect 5 of them, you may be able to decipher the information the document conveys.

name: Supply Items
description: Supply items for Taik Orcs. Take it to Guard Coleman and he will give you a reward.

name: Pirate's Treasure Chest
description: A treasure chest that was obtained by slaying Zaken's followers. Take it to Warehouse Keeper Randolf of Town of Giran.

name: Sairon's Silver Hair
description: Sairon's hair. Take it to Magister Dieter of Town of Giran.

name: Titan Lamp
description: It is called a Titan lamp. It is not lit.

name: Titan Lamp
description: It is called a Titan lamp. It is burning dimly.

name: Titan Lamp
description: It is called a Titan lamp. It is lit.

name: Titan Lamp
description: It is called a Titan lamp. It is lit.

name: Titan Lamp
description: It is called a Titan lamp. It is shining brightly.

name: Broken Titan Lamp
description: A broken Titan lamp. Take it to Lorain.

name: Blade Stakato Fang
description: A fang that was obtained from killing a blade stakato. Take it to Eva's Priestess Restina in Heine.

name: Flare Shard
description: A flare shard obtained from the Forgotten Temple. Take it to Magister Nell of Gludin Village.

name: Freezing Shard
description: A water shard obtained from the Forgotten Temple. Take it to Magister Nell of Gludin Village.

name: Cave Beast Tooth
description: An ingredient used by Orc Shamans during a ritual. Take it to Seer Manakia.

name: Death Wave Light
description: An ingredient used by Orc Shamans during their ritual. Take it to Seer Manakia.

name: Sealed Mysterious Stone
description: A pebble that radiates a strange aura. It sends out a dim light.

name: Mysterious Stone
description: A pebble that radiates a strange aura. It is shining brightly.

name: Karik Horn
description: An ingredient used by Orc Shamans during a ritual. Take it to Seer Manakia.

name: Cave Howler Skull
description: An ingredient used by Orc Shamans during a ritual. Take it to Seer Manakia.

name: Mysterious Book
description: A book obtained from The Giant's Cave. Written in an ancient language, its contents cannot be deciphered.

name: Ancient Language Dictionary: Basic Level
description: A simple dictionary published by scholars of ancient times. By using this, you can interpret some of the texts of the Titans.

name: Ancient Language Dictionary: Intermediate Level
description: A dictionary published by scholars of ancient times. By using this, you can interpret the entire texts of the Titans.

name: Leaf of Eucalyptus
description: One of the ingredients used to make wine. Collect 80 of them and take them to Guard Harlan located in the Town of Dion.

name: Stone of Chill
description: A magical stone used by Enku Orc Shamans when they cast ice magic. Collect 100 of these and take them to Guard Harlan located in the Town of Dion.

name: Ritron's Fruit
description: A fruit with a tough, hard outer skin and a fragrant smell. Collect 4 of these and take them to Magister Rollant in the Town of Dion.

name: Moon Face Flower
description: A flower that is said to bloom only under moonlight. Collect 20 of these and take them to Magister Rollant in the Town of Dion.

name: Leech Fluids
description: The bodily fluids of a Leech that can be obtained from the Cruma Marshlands. Collect 10 of these and take them to Magister Rollant in the Town of Dion.

name: Royal Membership
description: It's a coin collectors' dream! Take it to Head Blacksmith Vergara.

name: Kail's Coin
description: A coin owned by Sorcerer Kail who used to be an aid of Beleth. Take it to Warehouse Keeper Sorint.

name: Coin Collecting Album
description: A high quality coin collecting album made of leather.

name: Blood Offering
description: Blood that can be obtained by killing a Monster of Offering. The number of this item will determine your score.

name: Scroll of Ancient Magic
description: A scroll that contains ancient magic. Take it to Gatekeeper Ziggurat.

name: Ancient Ash Urn
description: An ancient urn that was found in the Tower of Insolence. Take it to Seer Reva of Town of Aden.

name: Wesley's Mixing Stone
description: A small gemstone that is given by Wesley. This item is required to use a mixing urn.

name: Magister's Mixing Stone
description: A gemstone that activates the mixing urn in the basement of the Ivory Tower.

name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (10 Honey Rice Cake Set)
description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage 2, this wrapped gift box contains 10 multi-colored honey rice cakes and 1 Lineage 2 Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (9 Honey Rice Cake Set)
description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage 2, this wrapped gift box contains 9 multi-colored honey rice cakes and 1 Lineage 2 Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Red Soul Crystal: Stage 13
description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 13. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (8 Honey Rice Cake Set)
description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage 2, this wrapped gift box contains 8 multi-colored honey rice cakes and 1 Lineage 2 Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (7 Honey Rice Cake Set)
description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage 2, this wrapped gift box contains 7 multi-colored honey rice cakes and 1 Lineage 2 Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Green Soul Crystal: Stage 13
description: Green Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 13. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (6 Honey Rice Cake Set)
description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage 2, this wrapped gift box contains 6 multi-colored honey rice cakes and 1 Lineage 2 Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: 5th Anniversary Gift Box (3 Honey Wheat Cake Set)
description: Commemorating the 5th anniversary of Lineage 2, this wrapped gift box contains 3 multi-colored honey wheat cakes and 1 Lineage 2 Commemorative Mark. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Blue Soul Crystal: Stage 13
description: Blue Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 13. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: Pirate's Treasure Map
description: A map that was created after putting together the map pieces found on Alligator Island. It appears to have a mark showing the location of treasure!

name: Spellbook Page
description: A torn piece of paper that seems to have been ripped out of a spellbook. If you double-click it, you can examine it closely.

name: Kranvel's Spellbook: Chapter of Fire
description: Great Magus Kranvel's Spellbook: Chapter of Fire. Collect the Chapters on Fire, Water, Wind and Earth and take all of them to Elder Casian.

name: Kranvel's Spellbook: Chapter of Water
description: Great Magus Kranvel's Spellbook: Chapter of Water. Collect the Chapters on Fire, Water, Wind and Earth and take all of them to Elder Casian.

name: Kranvel's Spellbook: Chapter of Wind

name: Kranvel's Spellbook: Chapter of Earth
description: Great Magus Kranvel's Spellbook: Chapter of Earth. Collect the Chapters on Fire, Water, Wind and Earth and take all of them to Elder Casian.

name: Worthless Piece of Paper
description: A paper piece that has useless scribbles written on it.

name: 15 Year Old Wine
description: A gift from Harlan as a token of gratitude. It is aged 15 years. Average quality wine.

name: 30 Year Old Wine
description: A gift from Harlan as a token of gratitude. It is aged 30 years. High quality wine.

name: 60 Year Old Wine
description: A gift from Harlan as a token of gratitude. It is aged 60 years. Excellent quality wine.

name: Ritron's Dessert Recipe
description: A secret recipe for making dessert by using ritron fruit as its ingredient. It can to sold at a store.

name: Ritron Jelly
description: Delicious jelly made from ritron fruit. It can be sold at a store.

name: Kail's Silver Basilisk
description: Royal-grade coin

name: Kail's Gold Golem
description: Royal-grade coin

name: Kail's Blood Dragon
description: Royal-grade coin

name: Warehouse Keeper's Medal
description: A medal that is issued by the Iron Gate Guild to Warehouse Keepers according to their productivity. If you collect them, you can use them to play bingo.

name: Blank Scroll
description: A spellbook that does not contain any magical power. Perhaps it can be helpful if you deal with Mammon's Trader?

name: Ancient Red Papyrus

name: Ancient Chain Letter
description: A mysterious letter found in the Tower of Insolence. Its text reads "if you send this letter to 10 other people, you will have good luck!"

name: Ancient Joke Book
description: A collection of jokes of Galfredo Romer, a Royal Clown.

name: Food for Wyvern
description: When the hunger gauge of a wyvern drops to 55% or below, its food will be consumed automatically.

name: Mixing Manual
description: A manual received from Magic Trader Wesley, with instructions for using the material mixing urn located in the basement of  the Ivory Tower.

name: Blood Fire
description: Dark flames from Purgatory. The only way to melt true gold.

name: Mimir's Elixir
description: A legendary elixir said to bestow ultimate wisdom. Take it to Magister Ladd.

name: Pure Silver
description: An essential ingredient of Mimir's Elixir. Take it to Magister Ladd.

name: True Gold
description: An essential ingredient of Mimir's Elixir. Take it to Magister Ladd.

name: Sage's Stone
description: An essential ingredient of Mimir's Elixir. Take it to Magister Joan.

name: Recipe: Sealed Phoenix Necklace(70%)
description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for the Sealed Phoenix Necklace. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 7. The success rate is 70%.

name: Recipe: Sealed Phoenix Necklace(100%)

name: Sealed Phoenix Earring Gemstone
description: An essential ingredient needed by a Dwarf to make a Sealed Phoenix Earring. It can be sold at any store.

name: Sealed Majestic Earring Gemstone
description: An essential ingredient needed by a Dwarf to make a Sealed Majestic Earring. It can be sold at any store.

name: Sealed Phoenix Necklace Beads
description: An essential ingredient needed by a Dwarf to make a Sealed Phoenix Necklace. It can be sold at any store.

name: Sealed Majestic Necklace Beads
description: An essential ingredient needed by a Dwarf to make a Sealed Majestic Necklace. It can be sold at any store.

name: Sealed Phoenix Ring Gemstone
description: An essential ingredient needed by a Dwarf to make a Sealed Phoenix Ring. It can be sold at any store.

name: Sealed Majestic Ring Gemstone
description: An essential ingredient needed by a Dwarf to make a Sealed Majestic Ring. It can be sold at any store.

name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Honor
description: Amulet required for the Pa'agrio's Honor spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 66

name: Amulet: Ritual of Life
description: Amulet required for the Ritual of Life spell. Used by Overlords.\nRequired level: 64

name: Spellbook: Prayer
description: Spellbook needed to learn Prayer. Used by Bishops.\nRequired level: 66

name: Blue Gemstone
description: A gemstone obtained from gremlins. Take it to a newbie helper.

name: Blue Seal Stone
description: A fragment of an ancient seal. Collect them all. Valued at 3 Ancient Adena.

name: Green Seal Stone
description: A fragment of an ancient seal. Collect them all to break the seal. Valued at 5 Ancient Adena.

name: Red Seal Stone
description: A fragment of an ancient seal. Collect them all to break the seal. Valued at 10 Ancient Adena.

name: Stolen Infernium Ore
description: Infernium ore once owned by the Iron Gate Guild. Take it to Warehouse Keeper Romp of Town of Aden to play bingo.

name: Blessed Scroll of Resurrection for Pets
description: A magic scroll that resurrects a dead pet and restores its Exp. completely.

name: Lord of the Manor's Certificate of Approval
description: This certificate allows the bearer to join the Lords of Dawn without belonging to a castle-owning clan.

name: Squash Seed
description: Squish Your Squash Event - Double-click it and a young squash will appear.

name: Large Squash Seed
description: Squish Your Squash Event - Double-click it and a large young squash will appear.

name: Nectar
description: L2 Gourd & Watermelon Event - Used to exchange with Puss the Cat for gourd seeds and watermelon seeds or for growing gourds and watermelons.

name: Event - Medal
description: L2 Medal Collection Event - If you take it to an Event Manager, he will trade it for a prize item of your choice.

name: Event - Glittering Medal
description: L2 Medal Collection Event - It is used to raise the grade of a collector during the event.

name: Amulet: Chant of Predator
description: Amulet required for the Chant of Predator spell. Used by Warcryers.\nRequired level: 48

name: Amulet: Chant of Eagle
description: Amulet needed to learn the Chant of Eagle incantation. Used by Warcryers.\nRequired level: 48

name: Amulet: Chant of Vampire
description: Amulet required for the Chant of Vampire spell. Used by Warcryers.\nRequired level: 44

name: Spellbook: Body of Avatar
description: Spellbook needed to learn Body of Avatar. Used by Bishops.\nRequired level: 48

name: Badge of Rabbit
description: The badge that indicates that its bearer's event collector grade is "rabbit."  Without this badge, one cannot prove one'S-Grade.

name: Badge of Hyena
description: The badge that indicates that its bearer's event collector grade is "hyena."  Without this badge, one cannot prove one'S-Grade.

name: Badge of Fox
description: The badge that indicates that its bearer's event collector grade is "fox."  Without this badge, one cannot prove one'S-Grade.

name: Badge of Wolf
description: The badge that indicates that its bearer's event collector grade is "wolf."  Without this badge, one cannot prove one'S-Grade.

name: Star Shard
description: Starlight Festival Event – A gift from the sky. When it is thrown, it creates a small explosion. Can be used as an ingredient to make other types of fireworks.

name: Gunpowder
description: Starlight Festival Event - Black powder. An ingredient used to make larger fireworks.

name: Magnesium
description: Starlight Festival Event - A chemical compound that generates a powerful flash when ignited. It is needed to make large fireworks.

name: Firework
description: An explosive device that brilliantly lights up the sky.

name: Large Firework
description: A large explosive device that ignites to light up the sky.

name: 2006 Battle Tournament - CP Potion
description: Restores CP by 200.

name: 2006 Battle Tournament - Quick Healing Potion
description: A magical potion that quickly restores HP. However, its effects do not last.

name: Green Colored Lure - Low Grade
description: A lure used for fishing. The higher the grade of the lure, the less time it will take for a fish to take the bait. This bait is preferred by fast fish.

name: Green Colored Lure
description: This fishing lure is preferred by fast fish.

name: Green Colored Lure (High Grade)
description: A lure used for fishing. The higher the grade of the lure, the less time it will take for a fish to take the bait. This bait is preferred by fast fish.

name: Purple Colored Lure - Low Grade
description: A lure used for fishing. The higher the grade of the lure, the less time it will take for a fish to take the bait. This bait is preferred by fat fish.

name: Purple Colored Lure
description: This fishing lure is preferred by fat fish.

name: Purple Colored Lure (High Grade)
description: A lure used for fishing. The higher the grade of the lure, the less time it will take for a fish to take the bait. This bait is preferred by fat fish.

name: Yellow Colored Lure - Low Grade
description: A lure used for fishing. The higher the grade of the lure, the less time it will take for a fish to bite the bait. This bait is preferred by ugly fish.

name: Yellow Colored Lure
description: This fishing lure is preferred by ugly fish.

name: Yellow Colored Lure (High Grade)
description: A lure used for fishing. The higher the grade of the lure, the less time it will take for a fish to bite the bait. This bait is preferred by ugly fish.

name: Event bait
description: Bait for fishing that increases chance of getting the treasure chest.

name: Fishing Shot (No-Grade)
description: Soulshot consumed by a fishing rod like general soulshots. Gives double damage when the pumping or reeling skill is cast. Usable for the no-grade fishing rod.

name: Fishing Shot (D-Grade)
description: Soulshot consumed by a fishing rod like general soulshots. Gives double damage when the pumping or reeling skill is cast. Usable for the D-grade fishing rod.

name: Fishing Shot (C-Grade)
description: Soulshot consumed by a fishing rod like general soulshots. Gives double damage when the pumping or reeling skill is cast. Usable for the C-grade fishing rod.

name: Fishing Shot (A-Grade)

name: Fishing Shot (S-Grade)
description: Soulshot consumed by a fishing rod like general soulshots. Gives double damage when the pumping or reeling skill is cast. Usable for the S-grade fishing rod.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-Grade)
description: Increases P. Atk. of an A-Grade weapons such as sword/one-handed, blunt/one handed, dagger, spear and etc. type by 4. P. Atk. of sword/two-handed, blunt/two-handed, dual swords, and fists type will increase by 5 and bow type by 8. The M.Atk of all weapons will increase by 3. From +4, the added bonuses for P.Atk/M.Atk are double the above value. When fail on enchanting, item does not get crystallized but it's enchant value will return to 0.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (A-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. of A-Grade armor or accessory. Can be safely enchanted up to +3, although 1-piece armor can be enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP when armor is enchanted above +4.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-Grade)
description: Increases P. Atk. of a B-Grade weapons such as sword/one-handed, blunt/one handed, dagger, spear and etc. type by 3. P. Atk. of sword/two-handed, blunt/two-handed, dual swords, and fists type will increase by 4 and bow type by 6. The M.Atk of all weapons will increase by 3. From +4, the added bonuses for P.Atk/M.Atk are double the above value. When fail on enchanting, item does not get crystallized but it's enchant value will return to 0.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (B-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. of B-Grade armor or accessory. Can be safely enchanted up to +3, although 1-piece armor can be enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP when armor is enchanted above +4.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-Grade)
description: Increases P. Atk. of a C-Grade weapons such as sword/one-handed, blunt/one handed, dagger, spear and etc. type by 3. P. Atk. of sword/two-handed, blunt/two-handed, dual swords, and fists type will increase by 4 and bow type by 6. The M.Atk of all weapons will increase by 3. From +4, the added bonuses for P.Atk/M.Atk are double the above value. When fail on enchanting, item does not get crystallized but it's enchant value will return to 0.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. of C-Grade armor or accessory. Can be safely enchanted up to +3, although 1-piece armor can be enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP when armor is enchanted above +4.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (D-Grade)
description: Increases P. Atk. of a D-Grade weapons such as sword/one-handed, blunt/one handed, dagger, spear, sword/two-handed, blunt/two-handed, dual swords, and fists, etc. type will increase by 2 and bow type by 4. The M.Atk of all weapons will increase by 2. From +4, the added bonuses for P.Atk/M.Atk are double the above value. When fail on enchanting, item does not get crystallized but it's enchant value will return to 0.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (D-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. of D-Grade armor or accessory. Can be safely enchanted up to +3, although 1-piece armor can be enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP when armor is enchanted above +4.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-Grade)
description: Increases P. Atk. of a S-Grade weapons such as sword/one-handed, blunt/one handed, dagger, spear and etc. type by 5. P. Atk. of sword/two-handed, blunt/two-handed, dual swords, and fists type will increase by 6 and bow type by 10. The M.Atk of all weapons will increase by 4. From +4, the added bonuses for P.Atk/M.Atk are double the above value. When fail on enchanting, item does not get crystallized but it's enchant value will return to 0.

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. of S-Grade armor or accessory. Can be safely enchanted up to +3, although 1-piece armor can be enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP when armor is enchanted above +4.

name: Old Golden Spice
description: Food for creatures on the Beast Farm. - When this food is fed to monsters that are capable of evolving, they will do so at various rates. Once a monster reaches a certain level of growth, it can then become a pet. This food also causes monsters to only drop adena.

name: Old Crystal Spice
description: Food for creatures on the Beast Farm. - When this food is fed to monsters that are capable of evolving, they will do so at various rates. Once a monster reaches a certain level of growth, it can then become a pet. This food also causes monsters to only drop materials.

name: Beast Soulshot
description: The light of a spirit is bestowed upon a pet/servitor and temporarily increases the power of attack. The number of soulshots consumed can be viewed in the Pet/Servitor Information window. (Used in the master's inventory.)

name: Beast Spiritshot
description: The light of a spirit is bestowed upon a pet/servitor and temporarily increases the power of M. Atk. The number of spiritshots consumed can be viewed in the Pet/Servitor Information window. (Used in the master's inventory.)

name: Blessed Beast Spiritshot
description: The light of a higher-level spirit is bestowed upon a pet/servitor and temporarily increases the power of M. Atk. The number of blessed spiritshots consumed can be viewed in the Pet/Servitor Information window. (Used in the master's inventory.)

name: Baby Buffalo Panpipe
description: A panpipe that is used to call a baby buffalo. The baby buffalo will take away 5 percent of the Exp that its master acquires.

name: Baby Cougar Chime
description: A chime that is used to call a baby cougar. The baby cougar will take away 5 percent of the Exp that its master acquires.

name: Baby Kookaburra Ocarina
description: An ocarina that is used to call a baby Kookaburra. The baby Kookaburra will take away 5 percent of the Exp that its master acquires.

name: Noblesse Gate Pass
description: Expired certificate. Can be purchased from a shop.

name: Scroll: Protection of Valakas
description: Fire dragon's protection amulet. Upon use, resistance against Fire dragon's front attack increases.

name: Scroll: Flames of Valakas
description: Removes the abnormal state resulting from the fiery breath attack of Valakas.

name: Scroll: Slay Valakas
description: Increases your P. Atk. when fighting against Valakas.

name: Fruit Basket
description: A basket full of fruit. Emily asked you to bring it to her.

name: Avellan Spice
description: Spice imported from Avella. Has a special fragrance. Emily asked you to bring it to her.

name: Honey Pouch
description: Well sealed pouch of honey collected from bees. Take this to Emily.

name: Bracelet of Lizardman
description: A bracelet that Leto Lizardman wears. Take this to Guard Rath in Town of Giran.

name: Cross of Einhasad
description: A holy item that was found in the Forest of the Dead. Take this to the priest of the Rune Township.

name: Cross of Einhasad
description: A holy cross that was found in the Forest of the Dead. The Priest of the Rune Township returned it to you. Take this to Dark Elf Magister Tifaren.

name: Lost Skull of Elf
description: A skull of an elf that Grand Magister Tifaren asked you to bring.

name: Letter of Innocentin
description: A contract between High Priest Innocentin and the dead explorer is in this letter.

name: Jewel of Adventurer
description: Jewel that the explorer possessed. The color of jewel changes by the explorer's call.

name: Jewel of Adventurer
description: Jewel that the explorer possessed. The color of jewel changes by the explorer's call.

name: Sealed Report Box
description: Explorer's report box. It is sealed multiple times. Take this to the ghost of explorer.

name: Report Box
description: Explorer's report box. The box is locked. Take this to High Priest Innocentin.

name: Lidia's Hairpin
description: Lidia's hair pin that has moonlight flower shape.

name: Silver Key
description: A silver spear is engraved on this key. There must be a lock that can be opened with this key.

name: Silver Spear
description: A reward that is given to the family with highest merit by the royal member of Elmore land. It is a model spear thus it has no P. Atk.

name: Suspicious Totem Doll
description: A totem doll you have obtained while hunting black magi according to the instructions of Lidia's maid. Take this to the mysterious magus and question him.

name: Flower Bouquet
description: A flower bouquet that Dorian asked you to lay at the gravestone in the south.

name: Silver Cross of Einhasad
description: A talisman given by Dorian. He asked you to find information about the monsters that appear in the Forest of the Dead at night.

name: Broken Silver Cross of Einhasad
description: A talisman given by Dorian. It seems to have been cracked by a powerful force.

name: Lidia's Dress
description: A red dress that was unearthed from the grave of Rose. It exhibits an aristocratic taste.

name: Suspicious Totem Doll
description: The totem doll that was returned by the mysterious magus. Take it to the priests of the Rune Township and question them about it.

name: Gemstone Key
description: A gemstone studded key. It has a nickname of "bejeweled staff" that indicates the authority of the king.

name: Suspicious Totem Doll
description: A suspicious totem doll that one obtains after slaying the underlings of Triol.

name: Box of Cookies
description: Well sealed box of cookies.

name: Luxury Wine
description: Premium wine that is on delivery.

name: Skein of Yarn
description: Yarn made of twisted spider web. Tenacious and sturdy.

name: Rough Jewel
description: Rough stone of jewel. Becomes a beautiful jewel when processed.

name: Enchanted Iron
description: Sturdier than generic iron. Tools made of this iron are said to be priceless.

name: Signet Ring
description: A seal that represents noble family.

name: Map
description: A map that is drawn for Miki the Cat.

name: Medicinal Herb
description: A medicinal herb that Miki the Cat found in Devil's Isle. Gentler is in need of this herb.

name: Crystal of Seal
description: A crystal that is used to activate the sealing in the altar.

name: Blood of Saint
description: Saint's blood that has power of holiness.

name: Blood of Saint
description: The blood obtained at the time of Kel Mahum's death. It contains the power of Einhasad.

name: Seal of Light
description: A seal from a Mysterious Necromancer. It uses the power of light.

name: Bead of Obedience
description: A gem from Kel Mahum that has power of Einhasad.

name: Gem of Saints
description: A gem that is left after the cremation of a saint. It has power of holiness.

name: Feather Ornament
description: A warrior symbol for Langk Lizardman.

name: Tooth of Totem
description: A tooth that has mysterious power.

name: Tooth of Dragon
description: A tooth of Langk Lizardman Commanders that strengthens their warriors.

name: Letter of Iris
description: A letter from Iris to Magister Rohmer in the Town of Gludio.

name: Letter of Rohmer
description: A letter from Rohmer to Magister Iris in Gludin Village.

name: Black Bone Necklace
description: A charm of Maille Lizardman Warriors.

name: Red Bone Necklace
description: A charm of Maille Lizardman Commanders.

name: Incense Pouch
description: A pouch of incense with mysterious scent.

name: Gem of Maille Lizardman
description: A gem of Maille Lizardman that has mysterious power.

name: Patrol's Report
description: A report from Guard Praga to Magister Rohmer.

name: Shining Gem
description: A gem that controls Araneid.

name: Shining Red Gem
description: A gem in Araneid's head that controls them.

name: Jewel of Innocence
description: A white jewel from the beast that brings back fond memories.

name: Horn of Buffalo
description: Buffalo horn fragments used by Ketra Orcs as currency.

name: Nepenthes Seed
description: Nepenthes seed used by Varka Silenos as currency.

name: Proof of Avenger
description: Certificate acquired when one becomes an avenger.

name: Eye of Darkness
description: A mark that proves membership of Daimon's family.

name: Evil Spirit of Darkness
description: An object substantiating the intrinsic darkness of Daimon the White-Eyed.

name: Broken Crystal
description: A fraction of the crystal used to summon Daimon.

name: Unfinished Summon Crystal
description: A fraction of the crystal used to summon Daimon. Still in an unfinished state.

name: Summon Crystal
description: A crystal used to summon Daimon. Emits golden shine.

name: Essence of Daimon
description: A crystal of darkness that constitutes Daimon.

name: Boiled Eggs
description: Delicious eggs boiled in spring water.

name: Fee of Boiled Egg
description: Price of the boiled egg.

name: Special Drink
description: Special drink at hot springs.

name: Fee of Special Drink
description: Price of the special drink.

name: Leaf of Flava
description: Rare ingredient for food.

name: Buffalo Meat
description: Rare ingredient for food.

name: Antelope Horn
description: Rare ingredient for food.

name: Trunk of Nepenthes
description: Rare ingredient for food.

name: Foot of Bandersnatchling
description: Rare ingredient for food.

name: Secret Spice
description: Piquant smelling spice.

name: Soy Sauce Jar
description: Sauce imported across the sea from the Gracian Kingdom.

name: Boiled Eggs for Delivery
description: Delicious egg boiled in spring water.

name: Special Drink for Delivery
description: Special drink at hot springs.

name: Hot Food Box
description: Box of delicious food. Very hot.

name: Food for Bumbalump
description: Favorite food of Icicle Prince Bumbalump.

name: Special Yeti Meat
description: Legendary ingredient that can only be attained from the strongest Yeti.

name: Mark of Ketra's Alliance - Level 1
description: A necklace given to those who build an alliance with the Ketra Orc Tribe. Stage 1 - Prudent alliance relations.

name: Mark of Ketra's Alliance - Level 2
description: A necklace given to those who build an alliance with the Ketra Orc Tribe. Stage 2 - Dependent alliance relations.

name: Mark of Ketra's Alliance - Level 3
description: A necklace given to those who build an alliance with the Ketra Orc Tribe. Stage 3 - Friendly alliance relations.

name: Mark of Ketra's Alliance - Level 4
description: A necklace given to those who build an alliance with the Ketra Orc Tribe. Stage 4 - Firm alliance relations.

name: Mark of Ketra's Alliance - Level 5
description: A necklace given to those who build an alliance with the Ketra Orc Tribe. Stage 5 - Steadfast firm alliance relations.

name: Varka's Badge - Soldier
description: A badge attained by slaying Varka Silenos Soldiers.

name: Varka's Badge - Captain
description: A badge attained by slaying Varka Silenos Captains.

name: Varka's Badge - General
description: A badge attained by slaying Varka Silenos Generals.

name: Totem of Valor
description: A totem presented to the warriors of the Ketra Orc tribe to attest their valor.

name: Totem of Wisdom
description: A totem presented to the warriors of the Ketra Orc tribe to attest their wisdom.

name: Mark of Varka's Alliance - Level 1
description: A charm given to those who build an alliance with the Varka tribe. Stage 1 - Prudent alliance relations.

name: Mark of Varka's Alliance - Level 2
description: A charm given to those who build an alliance with the Varka tribe. Stage 2 - Dependent alliance relations.

name: Mark of Varka's Alliance - Level 3
description: A charm given to those who build an alliance with the Varka tribe. Stage 3 - Friendly alliance relations.

name: Mark of Varka's Alliance - Level 4
description: A charm given to those who build an alliance with the Varka tribe. Stage 4 - Firm alliance relations.

name: Mark of Varka's Alliance - Level 5
description: A charm given to those who build an alliance with the Varka tribe. Stage 5 - Steadfast firm alliance relations.

name: Ketra's Badge - Soldier
description: A badge attained by slaying Ketra Orc Soldiers.

name: Ketra's Badge - Captain
description: A badge attained by slaying Ketra Orc Captains.

name: Ketra's Badge - General
description: A badge attained by slaying Ketra Orc Generals.

name: Feather of Valor
description: A feather presented to the warriors of Varka Silenos tribe to attest their valor.

name: Feather of Wisdom
description: A feather presented to the warriors of Varka Silenos tribe to attest their wisdom.

name: Munitions Box
description: A munitions box that is on delivery to Ketra Orc tribe.

name: Munitions Box
description: A munitions box that is on delivery to Varka Silenos tribe.

name: Varka's Mane
description: A mane attained from slaying Varka Silenos.

name: Molar of Ketra Orc
description: A molar attained from slaying Ketra Orcs.

name: Head of Shadith
description: A proof of slaying Shadith.

name: Head of Mos
description: A proof of slaying Mos.

name: Stolen Green Totem
description: A stolen green totem from the post of Varka Silenos.

name: Green Totem
description: A totem used to summon Water Spirit Ashutar.

name: Ice Heart of Ashutar
description: A crystalline shard of ice attained from slaying Water Spirit Ashutar.

name: Head of Hekaton
description: A proof of slaying the Hero of Ketra, Hekaton.

name: Head of Tayr
description: A proof of slaying the Commander of Ketra, Tayr.

name: Stolen Red Totem
description: A stolen red totem from the base of Ketra Orcs.

name: Red Totem
description: A totem used to summon Fire Spirit Nastron.

name: Fire Heart of Nastron
description: A Spirit, ore of fire attained from slaying Fire Spirit Nastron.

name: Supply Box
description: A supply box that is on delivery to Golden Ram Army.

name: Golden Ram Badge - Recruit
description: A badge that is given to recruits of Golden Ram Army.

name: Golden Ram Badge - Soldier
description: A badge that is given to soldiers of Golden Ram Army.

name: Splinter Stakato Chitin
description: A striped chitin from Splinter Stakatos.

name: Needle Stakato Chitin
description: A striped chitin from Needle Stakatos.

name: Talon of Stakato
description: A talon from Stakatos in Swamp of Scream.

name: Golden Ram Coin
description: A coin used by Golden Ram Army as currency.

name: Krorin's Journal
description: A journal found in body of Krorin.

name: Letter to Archaeologist
description: A letter to an archaeologist who left to Imperial Tomb to explore.

name: Broken Relic Part
description: A fragment of relic found in Imperial Tomb. Looks like it has no value because it is broken.

name: Sealed Box
description: A sealed box found in the 4th sepulcher. This box is sealed with a mysterious power.

name: Goblet of Alectia
description: A goblet attained by slaying Shadow of Halisha in the 4th sepulcher.

name: Goblet of Tishas
description: A goblet attained by slaying Shadow of Halisha in the 4th sepulcher.

name: Goblet of Mekara
description: A goblet attained by slaying Shadow of Halisha in the 4th sepulcher.

name: Goblet of Morigul
description: A goblet attained by slaying Shadow of Halisha in the 4th sepulcher.

name: Chapel Key
description: A key used to open the chapel door.

name: Used Grave Pass
description: A used pass necessary for entry into the 4th sepulcher at the Imperial Tomb. Cannot be used again. It may be useful when meeting the ghost of Elmoreden Chamberlain.

name: Antique Brooch
description: A luxurious looking old brooch that displays a magnificent symbol. It may be useful when meeting the Nameless Spirit.

name: Package to Vulcan
description: A package that needs to be delivered to Vulcan who's in Valakas' Cave.

name: Torch
description: A torch that Vulcan requested to collect.

name: Vacualite Ore
description: A ore required to make Vacualite.

name: Vacualite
description: Complete Vacualite. Take it to Klein.

name: Vacualite Floating Stone
description: Stone needed to reach the entrance to the Hall of Flames. If you bring it and speak to Valakas' Watcher Klein, you will be permitted to go up to the entrance to the Hall of Flames.

description: A dish made by Donath.

name: Donath's' Note - Vol.1
description: A note that has cooking tips written by Donath.

name: Shaved Ice
description: Lilly's most favorite dessert that is made of a mixture of shaved ice and sweet flavorings.

name: Ice Cream
description: Sweet, soft and cold scoop of ice cream.

name: Ice Crystal Gemstone
description: When sunlight reflects on it, it shines brightly with a rainbow of colors.

name: Offering
description: Food that is dedicated to Saint Agnes. It is tightly sealed to preserve its freshness.

name: Offering
description: Food that is dedicated to Saint Agnes. It is tightly sealed to preserve its freshness.

name: Offering
description: Food that is dedicated to Saint Agnes. It is tightly sealed to preserve its freshness.

name: Offering
description: Food that is dedicated to Saint Agnes. It is tightly sealed to preserve its freshness.

name: Ancient Language Dictionary
description: A dictionary that is used to decipher an ancient language.

name: Ancient Language Dictionary
description: A dictionary that is used to decipher an ancient language.

name: Spinneret
description: A spider's anatomical structure from which spider web is produced.

name: Investigative Report
description: A document received from Information Broker Mist. It contains the results of an investigation requested by Magister Justin.

name: Investigative Report
description: A document received from Information Broker Mist. It contains the results of an investigation requested by Magister Alminas.

name: Investigative Report
description: A document received from Information Broker Mist. It contains the results of an investigation requested by Magister Kamilen.

name: Investigative Report
description: A document received from Information Broker Bavarin. It contains the results of an investigation requested by Guard Baird.

name: Investigative Report
description: A document received from Information Broker Mist. It contains the results of an investigation requested by High Priest Gregory.

name: Ice Cold Flower
description: An ice crystal that is wrapped in fish scales and emits cold, icy air. Since it is beautifully created with a highly skilled hand, it looks like a flower.

name: Pure Ice
description: A chunk of purest ice that is made by freezing purified water. It is known to contain the power of the gods from the beginning of the world.

name: Bitter Cold Beer
description: The beer requested by Blacksmith Feynn. Just touching it makes your hands feel like they are freezing.

name: Multiple Course Meal
description: An elaborate meal requested by the Arena Manager. It is said to be eaten by duelists in ancient times to strengthen their stamina the day before their match.

name: Dead Souls Fish Soup
description: A soup that is supposed to contain all the nutrition of the fish it is made from. According to legend, depending on the fish you use to make it, it can have the effect of increasing or decreasing one's lifespan.

name: Bitter Cold Vodka
description: A legendary liquor that is made by dipping hot flames into cold, freezing ice. Although it feels cold to the lips it becomes hot in one's body.

name: Silver Crystal
description: The type of crystal that is needed to store wedding march music.

name: Red Crystal
description: The type of crystal that is needed to store birthday party music.

name: Vampire's Heart
description: The heart that is ripped out of the body of a vampire. It is still beating and pumping out blood.

name: Zombie's Brain
description: A piece of brain collected from an undead monster in the Forest of the Dead. It may contain the memory of the moment of its death.

name: Rib Bone of a Black Magus
description: The remaining bone that is left in the place where a necromancer died and disappeared. Perhaps it was used to transfix the shape of the necromancer.

name: Zombie's Liver
description: A liver that is rotting and emitting a strong stench. It is known to be a source of magical power of undead.

name: Top Quality Meat
description: A piece of top quality meat that is obtained by slaughtering a wild beast of proper age. Only one piece of this high quality meat can be obtained from one beast.

name: Young Wild Beast Meat
description: A piece of meat obtained by slaughtering a wild beast that is too young. Although it may have a pleasant aroma, it doesn't give good flavor when eating it.

name: Map Piece
description: A piece of a map that was once possessed by Monster Eyes.

name: Yellow Map
description: A map that contains a plot of the beasts. Take it to Mercenary Captain Sophya.

name: Map Piece
description: A piece of map obtained from the ghostly apparitions that haunt the Execution Grounds.

name: Ivory Colored Map
description: A map that contains strange information. By the way, sometime ago, Trader Galladucci complained that one of the maps he was supposed to receive didn't arrive...?

name: Broken Gemstone Fragment
description: A fragment of gemstone that can be obtained by hunting Maille Lizardmen.

name: Gold Colored Gemstone
description: A gold colored orb. High Priest Drikus is supposed to be looking for it.

name: Scroll of Escape: Talking Island Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Talking Island.

name: Scroll of Escape: Elven Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Elven Village.

name: Scroll of Escape: Dark Elven Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Dark Elven Village.

name: Scroll of Escape: Orc Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Orc Village.

name: Scroll of Escape: Dwarven Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Dwarven Village.

name: Scroll of Escape: Town of Giran
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Town of Giran.

name: Fishing Manual
description: An instructional book of fishing techniques. You can double-click it to read it.

name: Dimensional Diamond
description: A crystal that is filled with magical power. It is needed when casting Teleportation magic. If you collect this item and take them to a gatekeeper, you can trade them for various types of Scroll of Escape.

name: Galladucci's Order (Document)
description: A document with Galladucci's trader order. Take it to Trader Gentler at his magic shop.

name: Galladucci's Order (Document)
description: A document with Galladucci's trader order. Take it to Jeweler Sandra at her shop.

name: Galladucci's Order (Document)
description: A document with Galladucci's order. Take it to Priest Dustin at his shop.

name: Purified Magic Necklace
description: It's the item given by Priest Dustin. It seems to be the item Trader Galladucci has been looking for.

name: Gemstone Powder
description: The item given by Jeweler Sandra. This seems to be the item Trader Galladucci has been looking for.

name: Magic Sword Hilt
description: An item given by Trader Gentler. This seems to be the item Trader Galladucci has been looking for.

name: Four-leaf Golden Clover Coin
description: A gold coin that is engraved with a four-leaf clover design.

name: Mark of Traveler
description: A certificate to prove to Trader Galladucci the traveler's identity.

name: Baulro's Letter
description: The letter sent by Magister Baulro to Archon Sir Windawood.

name: Ariel's Recommendation
description: A letter of recommendation Trader Ariel wrote for you to be sent to Hierarch Asterios.

name: Roselyn's Note
description: A note Roselyn wrote while being angry and wrathful. You should deliver it to Magister Harne.

name: Very Expensive Necklace
description: A gift from Head Blacksmith Reed for Priest of the Earth Gerald. It looks very expensive.

name: Draconic Bow Shaft
description: Main ingredient essentially required for a Dwarf to make a Draconic Bow. Can also be sold at ordinary shops.

name: Recipe: Draconic Bow (60%)
description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for a Draconic Bow. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 9. The success rate is 60%.

name: Recipe: Draconic Bow (100%)
description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for a Draconic Bow. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 9. The success rate is 100%.

name: Baby Spice
description: When the food gauge of a baby buffalo, a baby cougar or a baby kookaburra drops to 55% or below, this feed will be consumed automatically.

name: Sweet Fluid
description: A type of fluid with a sweet fragrance. It is used as an ingredient to make a fishing shot.

name: Legend of Seventeen
description: A record of the seventeen heroes who fought against Antharas, the Land Dragon.

name: Faded Poetry Book
description: A poetry book written by an unknown Elven bard several hundred years ago.

name: Echo Crystal - Forgotten Song
description: An echo crystal that contains the song of Forgotten Heroes.

name: Strand of Golden Hair
description: A strand of hair that seems to have fallen from a blonde-haired lady.

name: Ring of Goddess: Waterbinder
description: Ring with a subtle blue gem. When picked up, it makes a sound like a flowing brook.

name: Necklace of Goddess: EverGreen
description: A necklace with a clear and bright bluish green crystal as a medallion. The moment when you hold it in your hand, you smell the scent of grass,  wet with spring rain.

name: Staff of Goddess: Rain Song
description: A wooden staff that is embedded with a light blue orb at the top of it. It gives you a feeling of an ocean breeze filled with moisture blowing gently in your face.

name: Relic Box
description: Box containing 3 relics of Goddess

name: Orb of Binding
description: A silver colored orb that emanates a strong feeling of magical power.

name: Sorcery Ingredient
description: A sorcery ingredient that is used by Witch  Kalis.

name: Malruk Succubus Claw
description: Thin and sharp claw obtained from Malruk Succubus

name: Crimson Moss
description: Crimson Moss obtained from Swamp of Screams

name: Rahorakti's Miraculous Medicine
description: Remedy prescribed by Grand Seer Rahorakti for Dwarf Girl Kassandra

name: Worn Tarot Card - Wealth
description: An old and worn out tarot card given by the Lady of the Lake. This card symbolizes wealth.

name: Worn Tarot Card - Power
description: An old and worn out tarot card given by the Lady of the Lake. This card symbolizes power.

name: Worn Tarot Card - Love
description: An old and worn out tarot card given by the Lady of the Lake. This card symbolizes love.

name: Worn Tarot Card - Knowledge
description: An old and worn out tarot card given by the Lady of the Lake. This card symbolizes knowledge.

name: Summoner Keats' Letter
description: A clumsily written letter written by Summoner Keats who was turned into a frog.

name: Miracle Potion of Transferred Life
description: An Elven miracle cure mixed by Priest Cerenas.

name: Kamilen's Antidote
description: A medicine made by Magister Kamilen to cure Summoner Noctisse.

name: Coolant of the Repaired Wilma #3
description: The cooling system refrigerant of repaired time machine "Wilma 3".

name: Sealed Envelope
description: A sealed envelope given by Information Broker Bavarin.

name: Proof of Catching a Fish
description: A fishing certificate. If you collect it and take it to a member of the Fishermen's Guild, you can learn a skill that is related to expanding a slot.

name: Wind Fishing Lure
description: A lure that was given out by Lanosco. It contains the hidden power of wind. It is not easy to use this lure. Only those who are highly skilled in fishing should use it.

name: Icy Air Fishing Lure
description: A lure that was given out by O'Fulle. It contains the hidden power of icy air. It is not easy to use this lure. Only those who are highly skilled in fishing should use it.

name: Earth Fishing Lure
description: A lure that was given out by Willie. It contains the hidden power of earth. It is not easy to use this lure. Only those who are highly skilled in fishing should use it.

name: Flaming Fishing Lure
description: A lure that was given out by Linnaeus. It contains the hidden power of flames. It is not easy to use this lure. Only those who are highly skilled in fishing should use it.

name: Chest Caught by Wind Fishing Lure
description: A chest that was brought up out of the bait of wind by using the wind fishing lure.

name: Chest Caught by Icy Air Fishing Lure
description: A chest that was brought up out of the bait of icy air by using the wind fishing lure.

name: Chest Caught by Earth Fishing Lure
description: A chest that was brought up out of the bait of earth by using the wind fishing lure.

name: Chest Caught by using a Flaming Fishing Lure
description: A chest that was brought up out of the bait of fire water by using the wind fishing lure.

name: Scroll of Escape: Ketra Orc Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Ketra Orc Village. Cannot be sold in shops.

name: Scroll of Escape: Varka Silenos Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to Varka Silenos Village. Cannot be sold in shops.

name: Trash
description: Saint's blood that has power of holiness.

name: Essence of Wind
description: Essence of wind extracted from Singing Wind. It is an item requested by Lanosco.

name: Lost Bait Ingredient
description: The lost bait that was recovered from a Fettered Soul. O'Fulle asked you to bring it back to him.

name: Eye of Tarlk Basilisk
description: An eye harvested from a Tarlk Basilisk. Willie asked you to bring it back to him.

name: Crimson Drake Heart
description: Heart of a Crimson Drake surrounded by flames. Linnaeus asked you to bring it back to him.

name: Strange Golem Blueprint
description: A golem blueprint with an unusual design that is different from any other golem blueprint. It seems to be designed by Shaling.

name: Kiki's Letter
description: A completely sealed letter. On the envelope,  Kiki's name is written as its recipient.

name: Small Glass Box
description: A beautiful box made of glass. It is engraved with the names of Anabel and Liesel.

name: Rukal's Musical Score
description: A musical score of  beautiful music. Its author is written down as Composer Rukal.

name: Looted Goods - White Cargo box
description: White Cargo Box looted from a trader's wagon. Seems to have valuable goods. Double-click to see the contents.

name: Looted Goods - Blue Cargo box
description: Blue Cargo Box looted from a trader's wagon. Seems to have valuable goods. Double-click to see the contents.

name: Looted Goods - Yellow Cargo box
description: Yellow Cargo Box looted from a trader's wagon. Seems to have valuable goods. Double-click to see the contents.

name: Looted Goods - Red Cargo Box
description: Red Crate looted from a trader's wagon. Seems to have valuable goods. Double-click to see the contents.

name: Looted Goods - Purple Cargo Box
description: Purple crate looted from a trader's wagon. Seems to have valuable goods. Double-click to see the contents.

name: Looted Goods - Brown Pouch
description: Pouch looted from a trader's wagon. Seems to have valuable goods. Double-click to see the contents.

name: Looted Goods - Gray Pouch
description: Pouch looted from a trader's wagon. Seems to have valuable goods. Double-click to see the contents.

name: Booty - Yellow Pouch
description: Item discovered in the marsh. Dirty yellow pouch ripped here and there. Double-click to see the contents.

name: Booty - Brown Pouch
description: Item discovered in the marsh. Dirty brown pouch ripped here and there. Double-click to see the contents.

name: Spellbook - Mass Summon Storm Cubic
description: Spellbook needed to learn Mass Summon Storm Cubic. Used by Warlocks.\nRequired level: 40

name: Spellbook - Mass Summon Aqua Cubic
description: Spellbook needed to learn Mass Summon Aqua Cubic. Used Elemental Summoners.\nRequired level: 40

name: Spellbook - Mass Summon Phantom Cubic
description: Spellbook needed to learn Mass Summon Phantom Cubic. Used by Phantom Summoners.\nRequired level: 40

name: Spellbook - Summon Feline Queen
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Feline Queen. Used by Warlocks.\nRequired level: 56

name: Spellbook - Summon Unicorn Seraphim
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Unicorn Seraphim. Used by Elemental Summoners.\nRequired level: 56

name: Spellbook - Summon Nightshade
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Night Shade. Used by Phantom Summoners.\nRequired level: 56

name: Spellbook - Summon Cursed Man
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Cursed Man. Used by Necromancers.\nRequired level: 56

name: Spellbook - Balance Life
description: Spellbook needed to learn Balance Life. Used by Cardinals.

name: Spellbook - Curse of Doom
description: Spellbook needed to learn Curse of Doom. Used by Soultakers.

name: Spellbook - Curse of Abyss
description: Spellbook needed to learn Curse of Abyss. Used by Soultakers.

name: Spellbook - Arcane Chaos
description: Spellbook needed to learn Arcane Chaos. Used by Archmages/Mystic Muses/Storm Screamers.

name: Spellbook - Fire Vortex
description: Spellbook needed to learn Fire Vortex. Used by Archmages.

name: Spellbook - Ice Vortex
description: Spellbook needed to learn Ice Vortex. Used by Mystic Muses.

name: Spellbook - Wind Vortex
description: Spellbook needed to learn Wind Vortex. Used by Storm Screamers.

name: Spellbook - Light Vortex
description: Spellbook needed to learn Light Vortex. Used by Mystic Muses.

name: Spellbook - Dark Vortex
description: Spellbook needed to learn Dark Vortex. Used by Soultakers and Storm Screamers.

name: Spellbook - Mass Warrior Bane
description: Spellbook needed to learn Mass Warrior Bane. Used by Soultakers.

name: Spellbook - Mass Mage Bane
description: Spellbook needed to learn Mass Mage Bane. Used by Soultakers.

name: Spellbook - Warrior Servitor
description: Spellbook needed to learn Warrior Servitor. Used by Arcana Lords.

name: Spellbook - Wizard Servitor
description: Spellbook needed to learn Wizard Servitor. Used by Elemental Masters.

name: Spellbook - Assassin Servitor
description: Spellbook needed to learn Assassin Servitor. Used by Spectral Masters.

name: Spellbook - Final Servitor
description: Spellbook needed to learn Final Servitor. Used by Arcana Lords/Elemental Masters/Spectral Masters.

name: Spellbook - Warrior Bane
description: Spellbook needed to learn Warrior Bane. Used by Arcana Lords/Elemental Masters.

name: Spellbook - Mage Bane
description: Spellbook needed to learn Mage Bane. Used by Arcana Lords/Spectral Masters.

name: Spellbook - Elemental Protection
description: Spellbook needed to learn Elemental Protection. Used by Hierophants.

name: Spellbook - Divine Protection
description: Spellbook needed to learn Divine Protection. Used by Cardinals/Eva's Saints.

name: Spellbook - Arcane Protection
description: Spellbook needed to learn Arcane Protection. Used by Eva's Saints or Shillien Saints.

name: Spellbook - Prophecy of Water
description: Spellbook needed to learn Prophecy of Water. Used by Eva's Saints.

name: Spellbook - Prophecy of Fire
description: Spellbook needed to learn Prophecy of Fire. Used by Hierophants.

name: Spellbook - Prophecy of Wind
description: Spellbook needed to learn Prophecy of Wind. Used by Shillien Saints.

name: Spellbook - Block Shield
description: Spellbook needed to learn Block Shield. Used by Hierophants/Shillien Saints.

name: Spellbook - Block Wind Walk
description: Spellbook needed to learn Block Wind Walk. Used by Hierophants/Eva's Saints.

name: Spellbook - Mass Block Shield
description: Spellbook needed to learn Mass Block Shield. Used by Cardinals.

name: Spellbook - Mass Block Wind Walk
description: Spellbook needed to learn Mass Block Wind Walk. Used by Cardinals.

name: Amulet - Chant of Spirit
description: Amulet required to memorize the Chant of Spirit spell. Used by Doomcryers.

name: Amulet - Chant of Victory
description: Amulet required to memorize the Chant of Victory spell. Used by Doomcryers.

name: Amulet - Pa'agrio's Eye
description: Amulet required to memorize the Pa'agrio's Eye spell. Used by Dominators.

name: Amulet - Pa'agrio's Soul
description: Amulet required to memorize the Pa'agrio's Soul spell. Used by Dominators.

name: Amulet - Seal of Despair
description: Amulet required to memorize the Seal of Despair spell. Used by Dominators.

name: Virgil's Letter
description: Letter sent by Virgil, a rich Dwarf in the Rune Township. It asks for help.

name: Caradine's Letter
description: Letter sent by Messenger of the Lake, Caradine. Says to go to the Town of Goddard when you reach Sub Class Level 65.

name: Caradine's Letter
description: Letter sent by Messenger of the Lake, Caradine. Says to go to the Town of Goddard when you reach Sub Class Level 75.

name: Raccoon Ears Fabric
description: Main ingredient essentially required to make Raccoon Ears. Can also be sold at ordinary shops.

name: Outlaw's Eyepatch Strap
description: Main ingredient essentially required to make an Outlaw's Eyepatch. Can also be sold at ordinary shops.

name: Maiden's Hairpin Piece
description: Main ingredient essentially required to make a Maiden's Hairpin. Can also be sold at ordinary shops.

name: Rabbit Ears Fabric
description: Main ingredient essentially required to make Rabbit Ears. Can also be sold at ordinary shops.

name: Cat Ears Fabric
description: Main ingredient essentially required to make Cat Ears. Can also be sold at ordinary shops.

name: Recipe - Raccoon Ears (100%)
description: This recipe for Raccoon Ears can be used by all races. Requires Create Common Item Skill Level 4.

name: Piece of Daisy Hairpin

name: Recipe: Daisy Hairpin (100%)
description: This technique for creating a Daisy Hairpin can be used by all races. Requires Create Common Item Skill Level 4.

description: An item recovered from the swampland. It is a dirty and worn out gray pouch that is ripped here and there. It seems to contain an object that looks like a water bottle. If you double-click it, you can view what it contains.

name: Key of Splendor Room
description: The key to the Splendor Room in the Monastery of Silence.

name: Silver Hemocyte
description: The Ice Queen's pets' favorite food.

name: Lockup Research Report
description: Dr. Chaos's research report. It's locked.

name: Research Report
description: Unlock the padlock to read Dr. Chaos's research report.

name: Key of Enigma
description: The small journal key that was included with the memo.

name: Scribbled Memo
description: Dr. Chaos's research report.

name: Blood of Maille Lizardman
description: Blood obtained by killing Maille Lizardmen.

name: Leg of King Araneid
description: The legs obtained by defeating King Araneid.

name: Visitor's Mark
description: Permits entry to the Pagan Temple. Don't lose it!

name: Faded Visitor's Mark
description: This faded mark permits entry to the Pagan Temple.

name: Necromancer's Heart
description: Obtain this necromantic heart by slaying Bone Animators, Bone Slayers or Skull Animators.

name: Pagan's Mark
description: Permits entry and access to the chapel of the Pagan Temple.

name: Pagan Totem
description: The totem obtained by defeating the Pagans.

name: Monk's Scripture
description: The scripture obtained by defeating the monks within the Monastery of Silence.

name: Water Bottle
description: The bottle from Greymore. Pour the water into the Holy Grail in the Splendor Room and take it with you.

name: Bottle of water from the Holy Grail
description: The bottle containing the water from the Holy Grail in the Splendor Room. Take it to Greymore.

name: Antelope Skin
description: The exceptional hide needed to create the magical scroll.

name: Frintezza's Magic Force Field Removal Scroll
description: The scroll that permits passage though Frintezza's Magic Force Field. Meet his guide near the Imperial Tomb entrance and he will let you enter the forbidden area.

name: Watching Eyes
description: This "Wandering Eye" has been harassing the farmers of Floran. Take it to Almankel in Floran Village.

name: Roughly Hewn Rock Golem Shard
description: This is a fragment from a Roughly Hewn Rock Golem. Take it to Almankel in Floran Village.

name: Delu Lizardman's Scale
description: This is a scale of the Delu Lizardman that has been harassing the farmers of Floran. Take it to Almankel in Floran Village.

name: Silver Ice Crystal
description: A crystal obtained from a monster. When processed, it becomes the Black Ice Crystal.

name: Black Ice Crystal
description: When stuck into a target, the character becomes violent.

name: Misa's Letter
description: A secret letter from Misa to Rafforty. Don't break the seal!

name: Rafforty's Letter
description: A secret letter from Rafforty to Misa.

name: Piece of Tablet
description: An unknown tablet fragment.

name: Report Piece
description: A fragment of the report from the stone statue.

name: Scout's Memo
description: A scribbled note written by a scout searching the nest.

name: Crystal of Purity
description: This white crystal was expelled by a wild beast whose heart was pure.

name: Fang of Stakato
description: Fangs gained from killing Stakatos.

name: Box Containing the Fire of Holy Spirit
description: Box containing the Fire of the Holy Spirit

name: Cursed Doll
description: An enchanted doll that has been said to control the evil creatures of the Ragna Orcs.

name: Orc Grave Goods
description: Remains stolen by graverobbers.

name: Cursed Grave Goods
description: Items made by angry spirits to use physical force.

name: Electric Wave Detector
description: This rod lights up in the presence of strong electric waves. It is presently unlit.

name: Electric Wave Detector
description: This rod lights up in the presence of strong electric waves. It is presently lit.

name: Telescope Golem's Corpse
description: Metal obtained from hunting the Scout Golem. It may be concealing something.

name: Golem's Dispatcher
description: Dispatcher obtained from hunting the Telescope Golem.

name: Storage Medium
description: The storage medium taken from the Golem. It is empty.

name: Storage Medium
description: The storage medium taken from the Golem. It contains information.

name: Ginzu Golem's Black Box
description: The analysis device obtained from the Ginzu Golem.

name: X-688
description: A curious scroll found on Dr. Chaos's bookshelf.

name: Supplying Goods for Railroad Worker
description: Supplies sent by a Dwarven Elder to a Railroad Worker.

name: Thief Guild's Mark
description: An animal's tooth worn by the thieves of the Plunderous Plains.

name: Destroyed Golem Shards
description: Shards obtained from hunting the Golem.

name: Dwarf's Favor
description: Letter of introduction  to Yumita, written by Head Blacksmith Newyear of Schuttgart Village.

name: Adventurer's Guide Book
description: An essential read for adventurers.

name: Herb of Life
description: Recovers a certain amount of HP immediately.

name: Herb of Mana
description: Recovers a certain amount of MP immediately.

name: Herb of Power
description: Increases P. Atk. for a certain period of time.

name: Herb of Magic
description: Instantly increases M. Atk. for a certain period of time.

name: Soul Breaking Arrow
description: Double-clicking the arrow temporarily pauses Frintezza's musical performance. It cannot be dropped and is deleted upon entering the Last Imperial Tomb.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Green
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a green fish (level 1~3 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Jade
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a jade fish (level 4~6 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Blue
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a blue fish (level 7~9 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Yellow
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a yellow fish (level 10~12 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Orange
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch an orange fish (level 13~15 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Purple
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a purple fish (level 16~18 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Red
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a red fish (level 19~21 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - White
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a white fish (level 22~24 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion - Black
description: By lowering one's fishing skill level, this potion allows one to catch a green fish (level 25~27 fish). If one uses a potion that is designed for a higher fishing skill level than one's own, the potion will have no effect.

name: Fisherman's Potion
description: Restores a player's fishing mastery level, which was lowered by the Fisherman's Potion, back to the previous level.

description: Opens the door to one of the Anterooms within the Pagan Temple.

description: Opens the door to the chapel in the Pagan Temple.

name: Key of Darkness
description: The key that opens the Door of Darkness located at the altar within the Pagan Temple.

description: The scale obtained by defeating Sekina, Malruk's Witch.

name: Themis' Scale
description: Obtain this scale by defeating Palibati Queen Themis.

name: Starstone

name: Starstone

name: Flower of Pavel
description: The strange flower from Atlanta.

name: Heart of Atlanta
description: The stone found where Atlanta was last seen. It should be given to Wendy.

name: Wendy's Necklace
description: The necklace that became Wendy's last gift. It's not powerful, but it has great historical significance.

name: Trainer License
description: Mark needed to participate in a Clan Hall War.

description: Allows on-the-spot resurrection during a Castle Siege, Clan Hall or Fortress Battle (level 1-85).

name: Seed: Sea Coba
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Sea Coba. For best results, a level 74-84 character must plant it on a level 74-84 monster.

name: Seed: Alternative Sea Coba
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Sea Coba. For best results, a level 74-84 character must plant it on a level 74-84 monster.

name: Seed: Twin Coba
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Twin Coba. For best results, a level 77-87 character must plant it on a level 77-87 monster.

name: Seed: Alternative Twin Coba
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Twin Coba. For best results, a level 77-87 character must plant it on a level 77-87 monster.

name: Seed: Great Coba
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Great Coba. For best results, a level 80-90 character must plant it on a level 80-90 monster.

name: Seed: Alternative Great Coba
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Rune area and it will bear the fruit of the Alternative Great Coba. For best results, a level 80-90 character must plant it on a level 80-90 monster.

name: Adventurer's Box: C-Grade Accessory (Low Grade)
description: Has a chance of containing a C-Grade, low quality accessory.

name: Adventurer's Box: C-Grade Accessory (Medium Grade)
description: Has a chance of containing a C-Grade, medium quality accessory.

name: Adventurer's Box: C-Grade Accessory (High Grade)
description: Has a chance of containing a C-Grade, high quality accessory.

name: Adventurer's Box: B-Grade Accessory (Low Grade)
description: Has a chance of containing a B-Grade, low quality accessory.

name: Adventurer's Box: B-Grade Accessory (High Grade)
description: Has a chance of containing a B-Grade, high quality accessory.

name: Adventurer's Box: Hair Accessory
description: Has a chance of containing a Raider's Hair Accessory.

name: Adventurer's Box: Cradle of Creation
description: Has a chance of containing a Cradle of Creation.

name: Newbie Travel Token
description: This token is used to help novice travelers move to various places. Characters under level 20 may redeem it at a Newbie Guide for travel between Talking Island Village, Dark Elven Village, Elven Village, Dwarven Village, Orc Village, and Kamael Village.

name: Bead Parcel
description: Take this parcel of woven beads to Warehouse Chief Yasheni in the Town of Schuttgart.

name: Timora Orc's Head
description: Severed head of the cowardly Timora Orc who betrayed his own tribe and joined the Ragna Orcs.

name: Kasha Spider's Tooth
description: This crooked spider's tooth was pulled out by hand during close combat.

name: Horn of Baar Dre Vanul
description: This smooth, flawless horn comes from Baar Dre Vanul, who inhabits the Immortal Plateau's Southern Region.

name: Old Box
description: An old box that can be caught by fishing in the Hot Springs area. If you double-click it, you can obtain the Certificate for Participation in a Clan Hall war in the Hot Springs at a certain rate of chance.

name: Hot Springs Lure
description: This fishing lure can be used to catch old box while fishing in the Hot Springs area in Goddard. Only characters with Fishing Mastery Level 20 or higher can haul in the old box.

name: Bruin Lizardman Blood
description: Blood obtained by slaying a Bruin Lizardman.

name: Picot Araneid's Leg
description: Leg obtained by slaying a Picot Araneid.

name: Box of Cheerleading Gear Used to encourage victory.
description: Box of Cheerleading Items for Cheering on the Red Devils. If you double-click it, it will randomly change to a different item.

name: Red Mask of Victory, Fabric
description: The essential ingredient needed to make a Mask of the Red Devils. It can be sold at a regular store.

name: Recipe: Red Mask of Victory (100%)
description: For All Tribes. Recipe for a Mask of the Red Devils. Requires Create Common Item Skill Level 4.

name: Echo Crystal - Viva Victory Korea
description: Echo Crystal that plays the theme music of the World Cup. It disappears after one use.

name: Dewdrop of Destruction
description: Clicking the Dewdrop of Destruction causes the portrait to disappear. It cannot be dropped, but is deleted upon entering the Last Imperial Tomb.

name: Event Gift Box
description: PC cafe coupon event item. When double clicked, it turns to another random item. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. (Can be used when the weight gauge is below 80% and there are more than 10 empty inventory slots.)

name: Event Gift Box
description: PC cafe coupon event item. When double clicked, it turns to another random item. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. (Can be used when the weight gauge is below 80% and there are more than 10 empty inventory slots.)
