name: Weapon Exchange Coupon - No Grade
description: An item that is used for the PC Cafй coupon event. An exchange coupon that can be used to exchange for a no grade weapon at Adventurers' Guide.

name: Weapon Exchange Coupon (C-Grade)
description: An item that is used for the PC Cafй coupon event. An exchange coupon that can be used to exchange for a D grade weapon at Adventurers' Guide.

name: Scroll: Recovery (No Grade)
description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character of level 19 or below. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters.

name: Scroll: Recovery (Grade D)
description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 20 and 39. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters.

name: Scroll: Recovery (Grade C)
description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 40 and 51. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters.

name: Scroll: Recovery (Grade B)
description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 52 and 60. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters.

name: Scroll: Recovery (Grade A)
description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used on self by a character whose level is between 61 and 75. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters.

name: Scroll: Recovery (Grade S)
description: This scroll recovers a character's abilities from the effects of death. This item can only be used by a character whose level is 76 or higher. This scroll cannot be used by chaotic characters.

name: Summoning Crystal
description: A crystal imbued with mystical power. Used for teleportation magic.

name: Spellbook: Summon Friend
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Friend. Used by Warlocks, Elemental Summoners and Phantom Summoners.\nRequired level: 56

name: Spellbook: Word of Invitation
description: Spellbook needed to learn Word of Invitation. Used by Sorcerers, Spellsingers and Spellhowlers.

name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Modern Language Version)
description: Restores forgotten abilities. The book was re-published after being translated into the modern language. (Can only be used by characters level 52 or higher.)

name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Original Language Version)
description: Restores forgotten abilities. This book was published by ancient scholars for research purposes. It contains more information than the modern language version. (Can only be used by characters level 61 or higher.)

name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Manuscript)
description: Restores forgotten abilities. This book is a hand-written copy of the original. It is almost the same as the original version. (Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.)

name: Ancient Book: Divine Inspiration (Original Version)
description: Awakens a forgotten ability. Those who lack the requisite knowledge cannot understand its contents. (Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.)

name: Elixir of Life (No Grade)
description: Regenerates HP. Can only be used by characters below level 19 upon themselves. Re-use delay is 5 minutes.

name: Elixir of Life (D-Grade)
description: Regenerates HP. This item can only be used by a character whose level is between 20 and 39. Re-use delay is 5 minutes.

description: A mystical object that has a tiny bit of unstable dark energy trapped inside. Double-click to transform into a random special item.

name: Top-Grade Life Stone -  Level 58
description: The highest-grade mineral available that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. Key component used in weapon Augmentation by characters level 58 and above.

name: Top-Grade Life Stone -  Level 61
description: The highest-grade mineral available that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. Key component used in weapon Augmentation by characters level 61 and above.

name: Top-Grade Life Stone -  Level 64
description: The highest-grade mineral available that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. Key component used in weapon Augmentation by characters level 64 and above.

name: Top-Grade Life Stone -  Level 67
description: The highest-grade mineral available that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. Key component used in weapon Augmentation by characters level 67 and above.

name: Top-Grade Life Stone -  Level 70
description: The highest-grade mineral available that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. Key component used in weapon Augmentation by characters level 70 and above.

name: Top-Grade Life Stone -  Level 76
description: The highest-grade mineral available that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. Key component used in weapon Augmentation by characters level 76 and above.

name: Trap Stone
description: A stone used in the Elrokian Trap.

name: Red Gem
description: Shiny red gems collected by Warehouse Chief Klump of Town of Aden. You can play the card game if you bring Klump more than 50 of these gems.

name: Spirit Bead
description: Beads collected by Blacksmith Wilbert of Town of Aden. You can play the game if you bring him more than 50.

name: Tyrannosaurus Claw
description: This claw can be obtained by defeating a Tyrannosaurus.

name: Diary Fragment
description: This is a piece of a missing expedition member's diary. Deliver it to the expedition leader, Captain Marquez.

name: Expedition Member's Letter
description: This is a letter that a missing expedition member sent to his Elrokian friend Kirikachin. Deliver it to Kirikachin.

name: Ornithomimus Claw
description: Take this to Asamah, the chief's son.

name: Deinonychus Bone
description: Take this to Asamah, the chief's son.

name: Pachycephalosaurus Skin
description: Take this to Asamah, the chief's son.

name: Practice Elrokian Trap
description: Take this practice trap, which is necessary for learning a special Elrokian tribal skill, to Kirikachin.

name: Dinosaur Tissue
description: This Dinosaur Tissue is a research ingredient for magicians and Dwarven craftsmen.

name: Dinosaur Egg
description: This Dinosaur Egg is a research ingredient (along with Dinosaur Tissue) for magicians and Dwarven craftsmen.

name: Bones of a Plains Dinosaur
description: This is a research ingredient for Shilen's priests and magicians.

name: Ancient Creatures and How I Long To Be With Them
description: Found in Rune's main library, this book contains information about ancient creatures.

name: Mantarasa Egg
description: This mysterious item can cure any illness. It can be obtained in the Primeval Isle's Lost Nest.

name: Ornithomimus Claw
description: This dinosaur claw can be used by the Elrokian Shaman Karakawei to perform a special ritual.

name: Deinonychus Bone Fragment
description: This dinosaur bone fragment can be used by the Elrokian Shaman Karakawei to perform a special ritual.

name: Epitaph of Wisdom
description: This epitaph can be obtained from the Chuta Kaimu Pillar of Wisdom in the Lost Nest.

name: Gazkh Fragment
description: This is a fragment of the axe Gazkh that Shilen gave to the Elrokian warriors long ago.

name: Bone Powder
description: These ash-like remains of an ancient Elrokian warrior can be obtained after performing a memorial service at the Warrior's Grave.

name: Gazkh
description: This ancient axe, Gazkh, can be reformed by Shilen's Stone Statue. It is necessary to battle Sailren.

name: Dinosaur Fang Necklace
description: This necklace is the mark of the ancient Elrokians who raid the wharf.

name: Primeval Potion
description: Increases Resistance to poison and anesthesia.

name: Sprigant's Fruit
description: This fruit, dropped by Sprigants, increases Resistance to poison and anesthesia.

name: Ziggo's Gemstone
description: This bright, shiny gemstone looks as though it would fetch a good price if you sold it at the shop.

name: Shadow Item Exchange Coupon (D-Grade)
description: This exchange coupon allows you to obtain a D-Grade Shadow Item. Take it to a Grand Master for your occupation to exchange it for a shadow item.

name: Shadow Item Exchange Coupon (C-Grade)
description: This exchange coupon allows you to obtain a C-Grade Shadow Item. Take it to a Grand Master for your occupation to exchange it for a shadow item.

name: Strategy Guide
description: This book contains information about the methods and strategies used to lead a Command Channel. Use it to create a Command Channel.

name: Flash Gunpowder
description: This specially processed gunpowder doesn't create smoke. It is consumed while using the swoop cannon skill.

name: Phoenix Blood
description: A consumption item for using Soul of the Phoenix.

name: Einhasad's Holy Water
description: A consumption item for using Cleanse or Salvation.

name: Battle Symbol
description: A consumption item for using the skill learned with the Ancient Tactical Manual.

name: Magic Symbol
description: A consumption item for using the skill learned with the ancient spellbook.

name: Spellbook: Soul of the Phoenix
description: Spellbook needed to learn Soul of the Phoenix. Used by a Phoenix Knight.

name: Spellbook: Summon Feline King
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Feline King. Used by an Arcana Lord.

name: Spellbook: Summon Magnus the Unicorn
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Magnus the Unicorn. Used by an Elemental Master.

name: Spellbook: Summon Spectral Knight
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Spectral Knight. Used by a Spectral Master.

name: Spellbook: Cleanse
description: Spellbook needed to learn Cleanse. Used by a Cardinal.

name: Spellbook: Salvation
description: Spellbook needed to learn Salvation. Used by a Cardinal.

name: Spellbook: Mystic Immunity
description: Spellbook needed to learn Mystic Immunity. Used by a Hierophant.

name: Spellbook: Spell Turning
description: Spellbook needed to learn Spell Turning. Used by a Hierophant.

name: Amulet: Magnus' Chant
description: Amulet needed to learn Magnus' Chant. Used by Doomcryers.

name: Amulet: Victories of Pa'agrio
description: Amulet needed to learn Victories of Pa'agrio. Used by Dominators.

name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Emblem
description: Amulet needed to learn Pa'agrio's Emblem. Used by Dominators.

name: Amulet: Pa'agrio's Fist
description: Amulet needed to learn Pa'agrio's Fist. Used by Dominators.

name: Amulet: Gate Chant
description: Amulet needed to learn Gate Chant. Used by Doomcryers.

name: Spellbook: Summon Attractive Cubic
description: Spellbook needed to learn Summon Attractive Cubic. Used by a Temple Knight.\nRequired level: 62

name: Spellbook: Aura Flash
description: Spellbook needed to learn Aura Flash. Used by a Sorcerer, Spellsinger, and Spellhowler.\nRequired level: 58

name: Ancient Tactical Manual: Symbol of Defense
description: Ancient Tactical Manual needed to master the Symbol of Defense. Can be used by a Phoenix Knight, Hell Knight, Eva's Templar, and Shillien Templar.

name: Ancient Tactical Manual: Symbol of Noise
description: Ancient Tactical Manual needed to master the Symbol of Noise. Can be used by a Sword Muse and Spectral Dancer.

name: Ancient Tactical Manual: Symbol of Resistance
description: Ancient Tactical Manual needed to master the Symbol of Resistance. Can be used by a Titan and Fortune Seeker.

name: Ancient Tactical Manual: Symbol of Honor
description: Ancient Tactical Manual needed to master the Symbol of Honor. Can be used by a Dreadnought and Maestro.

name: Ancient Tactical Manual: Symbol of Energy
description: Ancient Tactical Manual needed to master the Symbol of Energy. Can be used by a Duelist and Grand Khavatari.

name: Ancient Tactical Manual: Symbol of the Sniper
description: Ancient Tactical Manual needed to master the Symbol of the Sniper. Can be used by a Sagittarius, Ghost Sentinel, and Moonlight Sentinel.

name: Ancient Tactical Manual: Symbol of the Assassin
description: Ancient Tactical Manual needed to master the Symbol of Assassin. Can be used by an Adventurer and a Windrider.

name: Ancient Spellbook: Volcano
description: Ancient Spellbook needed to learn Volcano. Can be used by an Archmage.

name: Ancient Spellbook: Cyclone
description: Ancient Spellbook needed to learn Cyclone. Can be used by a Storm Screamer.

name: Ancient Spellbook: Raging Waves
description: Ancient Spellbook needed to learn Raging Waves. Used by Mystic Muses.

name: Ancient Spellbook: Day of Doom
description: Ancient Spellbook needed to learn Day of Doom. Can be used by a Soultaker.

name: Ancient Spellbook: Gehenna
description: Ancient Spellbook needed to learn Gehenna. Can be used by a Soultaker.

name: Ancient Spellbook: Anti-Summoning Field
description: Ancient Spellbook needed to learn Anti-Summoning Field. Can be used by an Arcana Lord, Elemental Master, and Spectral Master.

name: Ancient Spellbook: Purification Field
description: Ancient Spellbook needed to learn Purification Field. Used by a Cardinal.

name: Ancient Spellbook: Miracle
description: Ancient Spellbook needed to learn Miracle. Used by a Cardinal.

name: Ancient Spellbook: Flames of Invincibility
description: Ancient Spellbook needed to learn Flames of Invincibility. Used by a Dominator.

name: Ancient Spellbook: Mass Recharge
description: Ancient Spellbook needed to learn Mass Recharge. Can be used by an Eva's Saint and Shillien Saint.

name: Blueprint: Summon Swoop Cannon
description: Blueprint needed to learn the Summon Swoop Cannon technique. Can be used by a Warsmith.\nRequired level: 68

name: Boat Ticket: Primeval Isle to Rune.
description: Boat Ticket from Primeval Isle to Rune.

name: Boat Ticket: Rune to Primeval Isle.
description: Boat Ticket from Rune to Primeval Isle.

name: Dominic's Mark
description: Dominic's Mark. Used in carrying out a secret mission.

name: Mark of the Future: Human
description: Mark of the Future. Received from Grand Master Klaus Blackbird of Oren Castle Town.

name: Mark of the Future: Dwarf
description: Mark of the Future. Received from Warehouse Chief Alder of Schuttgart Castle Town.

name: Mark of the Future: Elf
description: Mark of the Future. Received from Magister Juris of Town of Giran.

name: Mark of the Future: Dark Elf
description: Mark of the Future. Received from Grand Master Oltran of Town of Aden.

name: Mark of the Future: Orc
description: Mark of the Future. Received from High Prefect Aklan of Goddard Castle Town.

name: Spellbook: Celestial Shield
description: Spellbook needed to learn Celestial Shield. Used by Bishops.\nRequired level: 64

name: Spellbook: Invocation
description: Spellbook need to learn Invocation. Used by Bishops, Elders, and Shillien Elders.\nRequired level: 56

name: Blue Primeval Crystal
description: Increases SP by 50000 when used. Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.

name: Green Primeval Crystal
description: Increases SP by 100000 when used. Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.

name: Red Primeval Crystal
description: Increases SP by 200000 when used. Can only be used by characters level 76 or higher.

name: Attack Orders
description: Fantastic Scroll of Escape event item. A Warehouse Keeper can exchange these for Shadow Items appropriate to your level.

name: Defense Orders
description: Fantastic Scroll of Escape event item. A Warehouse Keeper can exchange these for Shadow Item appropriate to your level.

name: Supply Orders
description: Fantastic Scroll of Escape event item. A Warehouse Keeper can exchange these for consumables appropriate to your level.

name: Santa's Hat
description: Santa's Hat, which is made to celebrate the holy day.

name: Apiga
description: Money used by cursed creatures. Take it to a magic lab for a reward.

name: Golden Apiga
description: Rare money used by cursed creatures. Depending on the amount, you may use these to earn a reward in a lottery. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Pirate's Booty
description: One can receive Golden Apigas with a certain rate of chance by double clicking. If you are unlucky, you won't receive anything. (Can be used when the weight gauge is below 80% and there are more than 10 empty inventory slots.)

name: Scroll of Guidance (Event)
description: Accuracy increases. Event reward item.

description: Critical Damage increases. Event reward item.

name: Santa's Antlers

name: Fire Stone
description: The power of fire increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of fire increases by 6 and the water resistance becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given between the attribute level 1 and 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. In addition, maximum three types of attribute enhancing are possible. Opposite attributes cannot be endowed together.

name: Water Stone
description: The power of water increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of water increases by 6 and the fire resistance becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given between the attribute level 1 and 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. In addition, maximum three types of attribute can be enhanced. Opposite attributes cannot be endowed together.

name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 14
description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 14. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 14
description: Blue Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 14. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: Green Soul Crystal - Stage 14
description: Green Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 14. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: Life Stone -  Level 80
description: An ordinary mineral that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. May be used as an ingredient in weapon crafting by characters above level 80.

name: Mid-Grade Life Stone -  Level 80
description: A mid-grade mineral that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. May be used as an ingredient in weapon crafting by characters above level 80.

name: High-Grade Life Stone -  Level 80
description: A high-grade mineral that has been petrified by a creature's physical or magical damage. May be used as an ingredient in weapon crafting by characters above level 80.

name: Top-Grade Life Stone -  Level 80
description: This is the highest-grade mineral available, having been petrified by a creature's physical or magical force. May be used as an ingredient in weapon augmentation by characters higher than level 80.

name: Yellow Seed of Evil - Shard
description: Pieces of Yellow Seed of Evil which were planted into a monster by Beleth. If you take this to Blacksmith Ram, he will exchange it for a useful item. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped.

description: Pieces of Green Seed of Evil which were planted into a monster by Beleth. If you take this to Blacksmith Ram, he will exchange it for a useful item. This item cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Leonard

description: Material used to build Dwarven items. Can be sold at an ordinary store.

description: Material used to build Dwarven items. Can be sold at an ordinary store.

description: Material used to build Dwarven items. Can be sold at an ordinary store.

description: Can be used as a bolt for a no-grade crossbow.

name: Bone Bolt
description: Can be used as a bolt for a D-grade crossbow.

name: Steel Bolt
description: Can be used as a bolt for a C-grade crossbow.

name: Mithril Bolt
description: This mithril-plated steel bolt can be used with a A-grade crossbow.

name: Shining Bolt
description: This bolt, made of unknown material, can be used with a S-grade cross bow.

name: Scroll of Escape: Kamael Village
description: A magical scroll that relocates you to the Kamael Village. Cannot be sold in shops.

name: Transform Sealbook: Onyx Beast
description: This book contains a spell to magically transform yourself into an Onyx Beast.

name: Transform Sealbook: Death Blader
description: This book contains a spell to magically transform yourself into a Death Blader.

name: Transform Sealbook: Grail Apostle

description: This book contains a spell to magically transform a hidden race ability into a form that can be used.

name: Great Wolf Food
description: Automatically ingested when a Great Wolf's hunger gauge drops below 55%.

name: Magic Bottle
description: Bottle that can hold the Chimera's M. Atk.

name: Holy Water
description: Allows you to lay to rest ghosts in a temple.

name: Darion's Badge
description: The spiritual force of Beleth's followers that is carried as a token. Whoever possesses this permit can travel freely throughout Hellbound whether he is a follower of Beleth, a native, or anyone else.

name: Prayer Fragment
description: This fragment of an ancient prayer might be valuable to someone.

name: Mark of Betrayal
description: A token that says you killed betrayers of Caravans.

name: Magic Gem
description: This is a key to open other dimensions.

name: Steel Citadel Blueprints
description: These blueprints are extremely difficult to obtain.

name: Dim Life Force
description: Life Force absorbed from the Chimera.

name: Life Force
description: Life Force absorbed from the Chimera.

name: Contained Life Force
description: Life Force absorbed from the Chimera Celtus.

name: Sand Worm Tooth
description: This is an excellent item to use when bartering with caravans.

name: Native Treasure
description: This can be found in a secret underground room in the town.

name: Gate Key: Darkness
description: This key contains a Symbol of Darkness.

name: Gate Key: Destruction
description: This key can open the Destruction Gate.

name: Gate Key: Blood
description: This key bleeds continually.

name: Ballista Bomb
description: You can use this to destroy Ballista and gain reputation.

name: Spirit of the Lake
description: A spirit that is used to recover HP of Fafurion Families.

name: Contaminated Crystal
description: A black and murky crystal. Needed in order to enter Crystal Caverns

name: Water Dragon Scale
description: Scales of Fafurion Families, which can harm certain targets. Has no effect when used on the wrong targets.

name: Red Coral
description: A Red Coral Fragment which extends time. Used at Crystal Caverns Steam Corridor.

name: Crystal Fragment
description: A Crystalline Golem Shard. Can be used in Crystal Caverns Coral Garden.

name: Secret Key
description: A key used to open a Secret Gate.

name: Blue Crystal
description: A Crystal attained by killing Darnel. It may be used to save Parme.

name: Red Crystal
description: A Crystal attained by killing Kechi. It may be used to save Parme.

name: Clear Crystal
description: A Crystal attained by killing Tears. It may be used to save Parme.

name: Blue Coral Key
description: A key to open the Sapphire Gate.

name: Red Coral Key
description: A key used to open the Gate that leads to the Steam Corridor.

name: Water Dragon Claw
description: An item given by a Fafurion Family. It may be used to save Parme.

name: Sealed Magic Field Key
description: This key can seal a Magic Field.

name: Caravaner's Remedy
description: This can cool down the heat of the Hellbound Desert.

name: Gate Key: Kamael
description: This key can open the Kamaelic Gate.

name: Gate Key: Archives
description: This key can open the Gate to the Archives.

name: Gate Key: Observation
description: This key can open the Observation Gate.

name: Gate Key: Spicula
description: This key can open the Spiculan Gate.

name: Gate Key: Harkilgamed
description: This key can open the Harkilgamed Gate.

name: Gate Key: Rodenpicula
description: This key can open the Rodenpicula Gate.

name: Gate Key: Arviterre
description: This key can open the Arviterre Gate.

name: Gate Key: Katenar
description: This key can open the Katenar Gate.

name: Gate Key: Prediction
description: This key can open the Gate of Prediction.

name: Gate Key: Massive Cavern
description: This key can open the Massive Cavern Gate.

name: Nornil's Power
description: Use it at locations marked in yellow on the map.

name: Key of the Evil Eye
description: The keymaster in town has the key you need to enter the Steel Citadel.

name: Giant Key
description: This key is the size of a human arm. What can it be used for?

name: Scroll of Escape: Kamael Village
description: This scroll magically relocates you to Kamael Village.

name: Information on Eranus
description: Double-click this document for more information on Eranus.

name: Report on the Crimson Duchess
description: This report about Beleth's minion, the Crimson Duchess, whom you may encounter while making a pilgrimage to the Tablet. Double-click it for more information.

name: List of Attackers
description: This is a list of the angels who recently attacked. Double-click it for more information.

name: Freezer
description: This machine can be acquired from Information Broker Mist. Take it to Master Duroga.

description: Item needed to communicate with the first Tablet of Vision.

name: Halisha's Mark
description: This cursed mark summons the minion of Halisha.

name: Halisha's Mark
description: This cursed mark summons the minion of Halisha.

name: Halisha's Mark
description: This cursed mark summons the minion of Halisha.

name: Shining Medallion
description: This medal is possessed by high level angels.

name: Blood Jewel
description: A blood-red jewel.

name: Black Echo Crystal
description: This crystal creates something ominous.

name: Commander's Feather
description: A feather pulled out of a commander-level Muertos.

name: Crimson Spider Claw
description: Take this claw to Second Hierarch Perwan.

name: Muertos Feather
description: This feather can be obtained by hunting the Muertos. Take it to merchant Treabi.

name: Felim Lizardman Head
description: A Head obtained after killing the Felim Lizardman.

name: Venomous Spider's Leg
description: This leg is obtained by killing a giant spider.

name: Tumran Bugbear Heart
description: The heart of a Tumran Bugbear.

name: Shubain's Recommendation
description: A letter of recommendation written by Master Shubain of Gludin. Take it to Gwain in the Town of Gludio.

name: Gwain's Recommendation
description: A letter of recommendation written by Master Gwain of Gludio. Give it to a grand master of the Kamael Guild to change your job.

name: Breka Orc Head
description: A Head obtained after killing a Breka Orc.

name: Message Plate
description: A message plate collected from a Road Scavenger.

name: Report - East
description: A report discovered on the corpse of a Dead Seeker on the Execution Grounds.

name: Report - North
description: A report discovered on the corpse of a Stakato Drone in the Cruma Marshlands.

name: Harkilgamed's Letter
description: Harkilgamed asks that this letter be delivered to Master Tenain.

name: Tenain's Recommendation
description: Take this letter of recommendation written by Master Tenain to Master Orkurus in the Town of Oren.

name: Orkurus' Recommendation
description: A letter of recommendation written by Master Orkurus in the Town of Oren. Give it to a grand master of the Kamael Guild to change your job.

name: Frozen Cell Samples
description: Magister Justin requires these cells for his life energy studies.

name: Orders
description: These Ol Mahum Orders can be found in the deserted campground. Collect them, as well as Ol Mahum Organization Charts, and give them to Kamael Master Sione.

name: Organization Chart
description: This Ol Mahum Organization Chart can be found in the deserted campground. Collect them, as well as the Ol Mahum Orders, and give them to Kamael Master Sione.

name: Gobie's Orders
description: Based on documents of the Ol Mahum, these orders outline the strategy for facing them. It should be delivered to Kamael Master Gobie.

name: Letter to the Humans
description: This letter, written to the Human allies of the Kamael, should be delivered to Captain Bathis in the town of Gludio.

name: Humans' Reply
description: This letter from Captain Bathis should be delivered to Master Gobie.

name: Letter to the Dark Elves
description: This letter, written to the Dark Elven allies of the Kamael, should be delivered to Grand Master Tobias in the Town of Gludio.

name: Dark Elves' Reply
description: This letter from the Dark Elf Grand Master Tobias should be delivered to Kamael Master Gobie.

name: Report to Sione
description: This report, written by Gobie on the progress of negotiations between the Humans and Dark Elves, should be delivered to Master Sione.

name: Empty Soul Crystal
description: Ol Mahum Officer Tak can be imprisoned in this crystal.

name: Tak's Captured Soul
description: Ol Mahum Officer Tak is imprisoned within this crystal. Take it to Master Gobie for interrogation.

name: Steelrazor Evaluation
description: An evaluation of the Kamael special forces, Steelrazor. Give it to a nearby Kamael Grand Master to complete the class transfer to a Warder.

name: Enmity Crystal
description: Magister Clayton has been searching for this material. If you bring him a sufficient amount, he will give you information.

name: Enmity Crystal Core
description: This magic item is made from Enmity Crystals. Give it to Blacksmith Poitan of Dion.

name: Manuscript Page
description: Warehouse Keeper Holvas is searching for these pages. Collect them all and give them to him.

name: Encoded Page on the Ancient Race
description: This coded document discusses new races. Holvas says that Kamael Grand Master Meldina can decode it.

name: Kamael Inquisitor Trainee Mark
description: Show this to Selsia, the head of the Kamael Intelligence Agency, to take the class transfer test.

name: Fragment of Attack Orders
description: Fragments of attack orders gathered by killing Grandis. Collect all the fragments to discover who is behind the attack.

name: Grandis' Attack Orders
description: Complete attack orders which say the attack was requested by Ivory Tower Magister Gaius. Let's interrogate Gaius with the request.

name: Manashen's Talisman
description: Pieces of a control charm obtained by killing Manashen. You may find out who controlled Manashen if you can find every piece of the charm.

name: Research on the Giants and the Ancient Race
description: This research document on the Giants' relationship to the hidden race was carried by Beleth's minion, the Crimson Duchess. Take it to Master Selsia.

name: Kamael Inquisitor Mark
description: This mark proves that you have successfully passed the Inquisitor test. Show it to a Kamael Grand Master to be transferred to Arbalester.

name: Echo Crystal of Free Thought
description: This crystal originally belonged to the Mother of Witches. Can be used to help a witch recover her memories.

name: Parme's Letter
description: This letter from the Witch of Water Dragon following the recovery of her memory should be delivered to Priest Karnis.

name: Refined Crystal Sample
description: This magic material sought by a Wizard who was sent to the Ivory Tower to keep Hellbound Island under observation. Give it to him and try to talk with him.

name: Stabilized Ectoplasm
description: Hardin requires this material for his studies on transformation magic. Deliver it to him to enable him to carry on with his experiments.

name: Ectoplasm
description: This material is necessary for creating stabilized ectoplasm, which can be used in transformation magic.

name: Hardin's Instructions
description: Written by Hardin concerning transformation magic, this should be delivered to Magister Clayton of Dion.

name: Glass Jaguar Crystal
description: One of the materials requested by Hardin. Deliver it to Magister Clayton.

name: Blank Sealbook
description: This empty, sealed letter can store powers and seals for Hardin's transformation magic. It should be delivered to Hardin.

name: Transform Sealbook: Onyx Beast
description: A sealed letter that carries powers and seals of initial transformation magic. If you give it to 2nd floor of the Ivory Tower to the Wizard of Transformation, you can be transformed.

name: Warehouse Manifest
description: A supply confirmation for a warehouse in Kamael. It should be delivered to Zerstorer Marcela.

name: Grocery Store Manifest
description: A supply confirmation for a Grocery Store in Kamael. It should be delivered to Zerstorer Marcela.

name: Weapon Shop Manifest
description: A supply confirmation for a Weapon Shop in Kamael. It should be delivered to Zerstorer Marcela.

name: Supply Report
description: Zerstorer Marcela's report on supplies. It should be delivered to Hierarch Casca.

name: Hills of Gold Monster Claw
description: The claw of a monster found in the Hills of Gold. It should be taken to Zerstorer Marcela.

name: Dungeon Leader Mark
description: A mark that signifies the leader of the monsters which appear in the Dungeon. It should be delivered to a Manager at the Fortress Monster Prison Camp.

name: Fragment of the Dungeon Leader Mark
description: A badge fragment that signifies a leader of the monsters which appear in the Dungeon. It should be delivered to a Manager at the Fortress Monster Prison Camp.

name: Wolf Tail
description: This tail possesses rich, luxurious fur.

name: Ranku's Blueprint
description: This is a blueprint belonging to Ranku that Matras requested.

name: Demon Prince's Blueprint
description: This is a blueprint belonging to a Demon Prince that Matras requested.

name: Safe Key
description: This key, crafted by Blacksmith Noel, should be given to Warehouse Chief Mona.

name: Sealed Document
description: This document was sent by Kaitnat to the Hierarch Casca.

name: Wyrm Heart
description: This is the heart of the Wyrm that Kekropus requested.

name: Kekropus' Recommendation
description: This letter of recommendation written by Kekropus should be shown to Bitus in Giran.

name: Soul Breaker Certificate
description: Show this Soul Breaker Certificate to a nearby Grand Master and you can become a Soul Breaker.

name: Wolf Tail
description: Perwan has requested this wolf tail for the Rite of Warriors.

name: Muertos Claw
description: Collect 10 of these sharp Muertos claws and take them to Kekropus.

name: Grey Keltir Tooth
description: Marksman Bixon will pay well for this Grey Keltir Tooth.

name: Black Wolf Tooth
description: Marksman Bixon will pay well for this tooth of a Black Wolf.

name: Fortress Certificate
description: Use this to trade for supplies with a Detention Camp Warden.

name: Castle Certificate
description: Use this to trade for supplies with a Prison Warden.

name: Memento Mori
description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

name: Dragon Heart
description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

name: Earth Egg
description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

name: Nonliving Nucleus
description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

name: Angelic Essence
description: Obtained by attacking a Raid Boss, you can assemble this Crystal of Life and trade it for something useful.

name: Basic Caravan Certificate
description: A certificate of friendship with Caravans.

name: Standard Caravan Certificate
description: A certificate of business relations with Caravans.

name: Premium Caravan Certificate
description: A certificate indicating a unique friendship with Caravans.

name: Mark of Friendship and Trust
description: A mark to show the highest grade of relationship Caravans.

name: Diploma
description: Take this Diploma to Second Hierarch Perwan.

name: Great Wolf Necklace
description: A necklace used to summon Great Wolf. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Scroll of Transformation - Pig
description: Scroll of Transformation that transforms you into a pig for 60 minutes. It will have no effect if used while in a transformed state.

name: SP Scroll: Highest Grade
description: A scroll that can load 500,000 SP.

name: Blood Oath
description: An item needed for a clan leader to raise the clan up to level 9. It can also be used to strengthen subordinate forces. Cannot be traded, dropped or sold.

name: Blood Alliance
description: An item needed for a clan leader to raise the clan up to level 10. It can also be used to strengthen subordinate forces. Cannot be traded, dropped or sold.

name: Knight's Epaulette
description: A mark obtained after defeating enemies. It can be used to purchase special items after Fortress battles.

name: Recipe - Dynasty Sword (60%)
description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for the Dynasty Sword. Requires Create Item Skill - Level 9. 60% success rate.

name: Sealed Dynasty Earring Gemstone
description: A key material that Dwarves use to make Sealed Dynasty Earring. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Sealed Dynasty Necklace Gemstone
description: A key material that Dwarves use to make Sealed Dynasty Necklace. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Sealed Dynasty Ring Gemstone
description: A key material that Dwarves use to make Sealed Dynasty Ring. Can be sold in any shop.

name: Map of Hellbound
description: This torn map of an island is covered with black stains.

name: Fire Potion
description: Increases resistance to fire attacks by 30 for 10 minutes.

name: Water Potion
description: Increases resistance to water attacks by 30 for 10 minutes.

name: Earth Potion
description: Increases resistance to earth attacks by 30 for 10 minutes.

name: Wind Potion
description: Increases resistance to wind attacks by 30 for 10 minutes.

name: Dark Potion
description: Increases resistance to dark attacks by 30 for 10 minutes.

name: Divine Potion
description: Increases resistance to holy attacks by 30 for 10 minutes.

name: Scorpion Poison Stinger
description: Poison stinger from a scorpion. A good item for bartering with caravans.

name: Race Stamp
description: Mark to obtain Secret Garden Key.

name: Control Room Card
description: Card to operate Control Equipment.

name: Underground Warehouse Key
description: Key to open Underground Warehouse.

name: Coral Treasure Chest Key
description: Key to open Coral Treasure Chest.

name: Dark Seed
description: Item needed for the Imbue Dark Seed Skill. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Special Bolt
description: Item needed for the Deadly Roulette, and Bleeding Shot skills. It cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Sealed Dynasty Sigil Piece
description: Ingredient needed for a Dwarf to make a Dynasty Sigil. It can be sold to public stores.

name: Recipe: Sealed Dynasty Sigil (60%)
description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for the Sealed Dynasty Sigil. Requires Create Item Skill - Level 9. 60% success rate.

name: Recipe: Sealed Dynasty Sigil (100%)
description: Exclusive to Dwarves. Recipe for making a Sealed Dynasty Sigil. Requires Create Item - Skill Level 9. The success rate is 100%.

name: Chaotic Sealed Dynasty Sigil
description: A rare Sealed Dynasty Sigil that requries a thorough varnishing. It can be varnished by the Blacksmith of Mammon.

name: Chaotic Dynasty Sigil
description: A rare Sealed Dynasty Sigil that requires a thorough varnishing. It can be varnished by the Blacksmith of Mammon.

name: Scroll of Escape: Fortress
description: A magical scroll that transports you to your Fortress. If you don't have a Fortress, it will relocate you to the nearest village.

name: Blessed Scroll of Escape: Fortress
description: A magical scroll that transports you to your Fortress quickly.

name: Transformation Scroll: Onyx Beast
description: A Scroll that transforms you into an Onyx Beast for 30 minutes.

name: Transformation Scroll: Death Blader
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Death Blader for 30 minutes.

name: Transformation Scroll: Grail Apostle
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Grail Apostle for 30 minutes.

name: Transformation Scroll: Unicorn
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Unicorn for 30 minutes.

name: Transformation Scroll: Lilim Knight
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Lilim Knight for 30 minutes.

name: Transformation Scroll: Golem Guardian
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Golem Guardian for 30 minutes.

name: Transformation Scroll: Inferno Drake
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Inferno Drake for 30 minutes.

name: Transformation Scroll: Dragon Bomber
description: A Scroll that transforms you into a Dragon Bomber for 30 minutes.

name: Battleground Spell - Shield Master
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Shield Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Bless Shield Lv 6, and Haste Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Spell - Wizard
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Shield Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Acumen Lv 1, and Empower Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Spell - Healer
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Shield Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Acumen Lv 1, and Heal Empower Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Spell - Dagger Master
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Might Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Focus Lv 1, and Haste Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Spell - Bow Master
description: Effects of Wind Walk Lv 2, Might Lv 3, Magic Barrier Lv 2, Guidance Lv 1, and Haste Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Spell - Berserker
description: Effects of Berserker Spirit Lv 2 and Clarity Lv 1 can be obtained for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Blessed Scroll of Escape
description: Relocates you to the nearest village. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Blessed Scroll of Resurrection
description: Resurrects a dead character and restores his or her Exp. completely. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Battleground Transform Spell
description: When used, it transforms you into a pixy for a certain amount of time. It can only be used on the battleground during a siege battle or a fortress battle. It will have no effect if used while in a transformed state.

name: Battle Health Recovery Potion
description: Recovers HP when in use. Characters below Level 52 are not affected. Usable only during a Siege or Fortress war.

name: Battle Mana Recovery Potion
description: Recovers MP when in use. Characters below Level 52 are not affected. Usable only during a Siege or Fortress war.

name: Battle CP Recovery Potion
description: Recovers CP when in use. Characters below Level 52 are not affected. Usable only during a Siege or Fortress war.

name: Mental Strengthening Potion
description: Increases Resistance to Hold and Sleep for a certain period of time. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Medusa's Potion
description: Becomes invincible temporarily. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Instant Haste Potion
description: Increases Speed instantly. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Capture Rope
description: Disturbs movement of targets. Can only be used in Siege and Fortress war.

name: Cursed Red Soul Crystal - Stage 14
description: A red crystal that is cursed by the darkness, stage 14. Take this to Legendary Blacksmith Shadai in Hellbound to process.

name: Cursed Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 14
description: A blue crystal that is cursed by the darkness, stage 14. Take this to Legendary Blacksmith Shadai in Hellbound to process.

name: Cursed Green Soul Crystal - Stage 14
description: A green crystal that is cursed by the darkness, stage 14. Take this to Legendary Blacksmith Shadai in Hellbound to process.

name: Wolf Collar
description: Necklace used to summon wolves. It takes away some experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Animal Slayer's List
description: Destroys the animal slayers of the Mimir Forest, the Crimson Spiders.

name: Bloody Red Claw
description: A claw dripping with animal blood. Collect 50 of these and take them to Martin, the Pet Manager of the Town of Gludin.

name: Hot Springs CP Potion
description: Instantly recovers 1000 CP when used.

name: Seed: Dark Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Dark Coda. For best results, a level 5-15 character must plant it on a level 5-15 monster.

name: Seed: Red Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Red Coda. For best results, a level 8-18 character must plant it on a level 8-18 monster.

name: Seed: Chilly Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Chilly Coda. For best results, a level 11-21 character must plant it on a level 11-21 monster.

name: Seed: Blue Coda
description: Plant this seed onto a monster in the Aden area and it will bear the fruit of the Blue Coda. For best results, a level 14-24 character must plant it on a level 14-24 monster.

name: Sweet Fruit Cocktail
description: A Cocktail made of various rare fruits. When consumed, it bestows temporary effects of Might, Shield, Wind Walk, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Bless Shield, Bless Body, Haste, and Vampiric Rage for a certain amount of time.

name: Fresh Fruit Cocktail
description: A Cocktail made of various rare fruits. When consumed,  it bestows temporary effects of Berserker Spirit, Blessed Body, Magic Barrier, Shield, Wind Walk, Blessed Soul, Empower, Acumen, and Clarity effects for a certain amount of time.

name: Battle Manual - Soul Gathering
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Soul Gathering. Used by Berserkers, Arbalesters, Soul Breakers, and Inspectors.\nRequired level: 46

name: White Seed of Evil Lump
description: Double-click to obtain white seed of evil.

name: Black Seed of Evil Lump
description: Double-click to obtain black seed of evil.

description: When double-clicked, a random 6th Place prize is granted.

name: Alacrity Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Atk. Spd. increases by 33% when used.

name: Accuracy Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Increases Accuracy by 4 when used.

name: Critical Hit Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Critical Damage increases by 35% when used.

name: Critical Rate Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Critical Rate increases by 30% when used.

name: Casting Spd. Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Casting Spd. increases by 30% when used.

name: Evasion Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Increases Evasion by 4 when used.

name: M. Atk. Juice

name: Power Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Increases P. Atk. by 15% when used.

name: Speed Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Speed increases by 33 when used.

name: Defense Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. P. Def. increases by 15% when used.

name: MP Consumption Juice
description: Delicious beverage made with rare fruits. Decreases physical skill MP consumption by 10%, magic skill MP consumption by 4%, and song/dance skill MP consumption by 10%.

name: Treasure Sack Piece
description: You can exchange 50 Treasure Sack Pieces for a Treasure Sack if you bring them to Snow.

name: Transformation Scroll: Rabbit
description: A scroll that transforms you into a rabbit for 10 minutes. Locates treasure when used on Fantasy Isle. It will have no effect if used while a pet or servitor is summoned or while in a transformed state.

name: Battle Manual - Warp
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Warp. Used by Warders.\nRequired level: 32

name: Battle Manual - Soul Shock
description: Battle Manual needed to learn Soul Shock. Used by Warders.\nRequired level: 36

name: Transformation Scroll: Onyx Beast
description: Documents the method for transforming into Onyx Beast.

name: Certificate - Emergent Ability
description: Certificate needed to learn an Emergent Ability. Only main classes can learn this skill. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or stored in a warehouse.

name: Certificate - Warrior Ability
description: Certificate needed to learn a Warrior Ability. Only main classes can learn this skill. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or stored in a warehouse.

description: Allows for transformation into a highly specialized form, by transferring the powerful energy of the subclass to the main class. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or stored in a warehouse.

description: Allows for transformation into a highly specialized form, by transferring the powerful energy of the subclass to the main class. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or stored in a warehouse.

name: Great Snow Wolf Necklace
description: Necklace used to summon a Great Snow Wolf. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Red Dragon Bugle of Wind
description: Trumpet used to summon the Strider of the Red Wind. This takes some of experience which is acquired by the pet master.

name: Red Dragon Bugle of Star
description: Trumpet used to summon the Strider of the Red Star. This takes some of experience which is acquired by the pet master.

name: Red Dragon Bugle of Twilight
description: Trumpet used to summon the Strider of the Red Dusk. This takes some of experience which is acquired by the pet master.

name: Improved Buffalo Panpipe
description: Necklace used to summon an Improved Baby Buffalo. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Improved Cougar Chime
description: Necklace used to summon an Improved Baby Cougar. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Improved Kookaburra Ocarina
description: Necklace used to summon an Improved Baby Kookaburra. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Evil Weapon
description: Weapon that can only be obtained from the evil spirits created at the Monster Foundry

name: Stolen Cargo
description: Cargo stolen from Warehouse Keeper Sonin of Florin Village. Return it to Sonin.

name: Hate Crystal
description: An important item that Grocer Pano of Florin Village is seeking. Give it to Pano.

name: Old Treasure Map
description: An important item that Captain Alex of Florin Village is seeking. Give it to Alex.

name: Sonin's Credentials
description: Give it to Priest Shegfield of Dion Village along with Pano's and Alex's Credentials.

name: Pano's Credentials
description: Give it to Priest Shegfield of Dion Village along with Sonin's and Alex's Credentials.

name: Alex's Credentials
description: Give it to Priest Shegfield of Dion Village along with Pano's and Sonin's Credentials.

name: Badge - Temple Executor
description: Give it to High Priest Sylvain along with the Temple of Einhasad's "Temple Executor" proof of identity and the "Badge - Temple Missionary."

name: Giants' Experimental Tool Fragment
description: Relic of the Giants found on the monsters and apostates in the Cruma Marshlands. Bring it to Spellbook Seller Rouke.

name: Giants' Experimental Tool
description: Experimental tool created by the Giants. Use it to lure the apostates in the Cruma Marshlands.

name: Giants' Technology Report
description: Proof of the traitor's defeat in the Cruma Marshlands. Bring it to Spellbook Seller Rouke.

name: Rouke's Report
description: Rouke's Report. Deliver it to Priest Glyvka.

name: Badge - Temple Missionary
description: Give it to High Priest Sylvain along with the Temple of Einhasad's "Temple Missionary" proof of identity and the "Badge - Temple Executor."

name: Report Fragment
description: A piece of the Investigation Report carried by the missing Temple investigator. Bring it to High Priest Sylvain.

name: Temple Manifesto
description: Temple's manifesto describing the only "righteousness"

name: Relics of the Dark Elf Trainee
description: Relics of a Dark Elf trainee who was killed during live training. Give it to Dark Elf Angus.

name: Angus' Recommendation
description: Token for helping Angus. Show it to Priestess Pupina.

name: Pupina's Recommendation
description: Proof of versatility and the right to contact the preachers. Show it to Preacher Sla.

name: Records Chest Key Fragment
description: Key fragment that is held by the Tasaba Lizardmen. If you bring it to Warehouse Keeper Mia, she can turn it into a Records Chest Key.

name: Records Chest
description: Records chest held by the Tasaba Lizardmen. Bring it to Warehouse Keeper Mia to inspect the contents.

name: Dark Crystal
description: Ingredient needed to create the Dark Oxide. Bring it to Magister Xenovia.

name: Dark Oxide
description: Substance on which Magister Xenovia is experimenting.

name: Cryptogram of the Goddess Sword
description: Secret document about the Sword of Sthelotte that the Goddess of Lake Eva gave to Rionelle, bring it to Kluck.

name: Predecessor's Report
description: Investigate report of the intelligence agency that records the death of Shadow Fox. Bring it to Warehouse Chief Natools.

name: Cryptogram of the Angel Search
description: Clue regarding the angel's location that was discovered by Shadow Fox's intelligence agency. Encoded as a Cryptogram. Decipher it through High Priest Raymond in the Town of Gludio.

name: Prophecy Fragment
description: Prophecy - Path of the God. When all the prophecy fragments are collected, they reveal the Fallen Angel's location.

name: Fallen Angel Blood
description: Proof of the eradication of the angel that was labeled a Fallen Angel by the Temple. Deliver it to High Priest Raymond in the Town of Gludio.

name: Sealed Prophecy - Path of the God
description: Sealed prophecy that foretells the location of the angel. Bring it to Grand Master Tobias in Gludio Castle.

name: Prophecy - Path of the God
description: Prophecy that foretells the location of the angel. Ask Elder Casian of the Wastelands to decipher it.

name: Empty Sound Crystal
description: A sound crystal for saving the angel's message. There is nothing recorded on it yet.

name: Angel Medicine
description: Medicine that Casian made for the injured angel. Administer it to the Fallen Angel.

name: Angel's Message
description: A sound crystal for saving the angel's message. Bring it to Grand Master Tobias in Gludio Castle.

name: Metallograph
description: Metal device obtained in Cruma Tower. It appears to be a recording device from the time of Giants.

name: Broken Metal Pieces
description: Metallograph shard obtained in Cruma Tower

name: Nikola's Map
description: Map that shows the location Nikola searched in Cruma Tower.

name: Loraine's Certificate
description: Voucher that proves you received the Metallograph that Loraine obtained in Cruma Tower. Hold onto it and return to her later.

name: Metallograph
description: Metallograph obtained in Cruma Tower. Appears to be a recording device of the giants.

name: Broken Metal Pieces
description: Metallograph shard obtained in Cruma Tower

name: Nikola's Map
description: Map that shows the location that Nikola searched in Cruma Tower.

name: Metallograph - Research Report
description: Metallograph obtained in Cruma Tower. It is confirmed as a recording device that was used in the Cruma Tower laboratory.

name: Leto Lizardman Accessory
description: Accessory held by the Leto Lizardmen. Blueprint Seller Luka in the Town of Oren likes it.

name: Metallograph
description: Metallograph obtained in Cruma Tower. Appears to be a recording device of the giants.

name: Broken Metal Pieces
description: Metallograph shard obtained in Cruma Tower

name: Metallograph - Decipher Pattern
description: Luka summarized the contents which have been decoded from the metal plate. Take this back to Lorain.

name: Repaired Metallograph
description: Dorothy repaired the metallograph shard obtained in Cruma Tower.

name: Red Stone
description: Item that Matras instructed to bring back as proof of the defeated agitators. He doesn't tell you its purpose.

name: Old Agathion
description: Old Agathion with the spirit's seal unbound. Double-click to unlock items.

name: A Bottle of Souls
description: A bottle that holds 5 Souls. Double-click to fill the bottle. For Kamael use only. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Full Bottle of Souls - 5 Souls
description: A bottle containing 5 Souls. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Kamael Exclusive Weapon. Disappears without effect if used by other races.

name: Full Bottle of Souls - 5 Souls (For Combat)
description: A bottle containing 5 Souls. Usable only in combat. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Kamael Exclusive Weapon. Disappears without effect if used by other races.

name: Full Bottle of Souls - 10 Souls
description: A bottle containing 10 Souls. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Kamael exclusive item. Disappears without effect if used by other races.

name: Dynastic Essence II
description: An item that can modify Dynasty Tunic. Powerful options are available for a modified Dynasty Tunic. Grants more powerful options than Dynastic Essence.

name: Improved Baby Pet Food
description: Automatically consumed when an improved baby pet's hunger gauge drops below 55%.

name: Fenrir Necklace
description: A necklace that can summon a Fenrir. It takes away some of the experience points the Pet Master earns.

name: Tully's Platinum Medal
description: Small, shiny platinum medal. It reads, 'Permission No.1 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

name: Tully's Tin Medal
description: Small, shiny tin medal. It reads, 'Permission No.2 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

name: Tully's Lead Medal
description: Small, shiny lead medal. It reads, 'Permission No.3 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

name: Tully's Zinc Medal
description: Small, shiny zinc medal. It reads, 'Permission No.4 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

name: Tully's Copper Medal
description: Small, shiny copper medal. It reads, 'Permission No.5 for Group Admission to Special Workshop'.

name: Magic Accessory Set
description: Obtain this Shadow Item by double-clicking. It cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Red Soul Crystal - Stage 15
description: Red Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 15. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: Blue Soul Crystal - Stage 15
description: Blue Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 15. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: Green Soul Crystal - Stage 15
description: Green Crystal that absorbs souls, stage 15. Special abilities can be applied to the weapon when absorbing certain amount of souls. Every time it is used, it consumes 26 of MP. However, the Soul Crystal of this stage absorbs souls by itself, so there is no need for using the Soul Crystal to monsters.

name: Life Stone -  Level 82
description: General mineral created when a stone in a monster is solidified by a physical or magic hit. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting weapons.

name: Mid-Grade Life Stone -  Level 82
description: Mid-Grade mineral created when a stone in a monster is solidified by a physical or magic hit. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting weapons.

name: High-Grade Life Stone -  Level 82
description: High-Grade mineral created when a stone in a monster is solidified by a physical or magic hit. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting weapons.

name: Top-Grade Life Stone -  Level 82
description: Top-Grade mineral created when a stone in a monster is solidified by a physical or magic hit. Usable by characters level 82 and above when augmenting weapons.

name: Beast Soulshot Compressed Pack
description: A small capsule of compressed Beast Soulshot. Changes into 500 Beast Soulshots when used.

name: Beast Spiritshot Compressed Pack
description: A small capsule of compressed Beast Spiritshot. Changes into 500 Beast Spiritshots when used.

name: Blessed Beast Spiritshot Compressed Pack
description: A small capsule of compressed Blessed Beast Spiritshot. Changes into 500 Blessed Beast Spiritshots when used.

name: Echo Crystal - Kuraki Mai
description: Echo Crystal that plays Kuraki Mai's music. It can be used once every 40 seconds and disappears after being used.

name: Rough Ore of Fire
description: The power of fire increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of fire increases by 6 and water resistance becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Rough Ore of Water
description: The power of water increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of water increases by 6 and fire resistance becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Rough Ore of the Earth
description: The power of the earth increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of the Earth increases by 6 and wind resistance becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Rough Ore of Wind
description: The power of wind increases by 5 when given to a weapon. The power of wind increases by 6 and earth resistance becomes strong if given to defensive armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Rough Ore of Darkness
description: Increases dark power by 5 when given to a weapon. Increases dark power by 6 and increases resistance to holy attacks when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Rough Ore of Divinity
description: Increases holy power by 5 when given to a weapon. Increases holy power by 6 and darkness resistance becomes stronger when given to armor. Element attribute can be given up until level 3, and it cannot be given above level 3. Cannot be exchanged or dropped.

name: Recipe - Dynasty Staff(60%)
description: For Dwarves only. The recipe for the Dynasty Staff. Requires Create Item Skill - Level 9. 60% success rate.

description: Certificate needed to learn a Master Ability. Only main classes can learn this skill. This item cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or stored in a warehouse.

name: Wondrous Cubic
description: Double-click to create a cube fragment that can be exchanged for a weapon/armor enchant scroll. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. (Can only be used once per day.)

name: Energy Ore
description: An energy ore that is found in the eastern region's mining area. It is used as an experimental ingredient in Inventor Maru's energy conversion device.

name: Bloody Cloth Fragment
description: A piece of cloth soaked with Mark's blood. It is needed to determine the type of poison.

name: Helvetia's Antidote
description: Antidote purchased from Helvetia. Give it to Mark.

name: Contaminated Kasha Spider Venom
description: Kasha Spider venom that has been contaminated by Kasha, the evil spirit of decay and death. Collect them and bring them to Trader Kunai.

name: Weapon-Type Enhance Backup Stone (D-Grade)
description: Vitamin item\nItem that raises a D-Grade weapon's enchant rate by 20%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Weapon-Type Enhance Backup Stone (C-Grade)
description: Vitamin item\nItem that raises a C-Grade weapon's enchant rate by 18%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Weapon-Type Enhance Backup Stone (B-Grade)
description: Vitamin item\nItem that raises a B-Grade weapon's enchant rate by 15%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Weapon-Type Enhance Backup Stone (A-Grade)
description: Vitamin item\nItem that raises an A-Grade weapon's enchant rate by 12%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Weapon-Type Enhance Backup Stone (S-Grade)
description: Vitamin item\nItem that raises an S-Grade weapon's enchant rate by 10%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Armor-Type Enhance Backup Stone (D-Grade)
description: Vitamin item\nItem that raises a D-Grade armor's enchant rate by 35%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. For one-piece items, can only be used on items with 4~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Armor-Type Enhance Backup Stone (C-Grade)
description: Vitamin item\nItem that raises a C-Grade armor's enchant rate by 27%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. For one-piece items, can only be used on items with 4~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Armor-Type Enhance Backup Stone (B-Grade)
description: Vitamin item\nItem that raises a B-Grade armor's enchant rate by 23%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. For one-piece items, can only be used on items with 4~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Armor-Type Enhance Backup Stone (A-Grade)
description: Vitamin item\nItem that raises an A-Grade armor's enchant rate by 18%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. For one-piece items, can only be used on items with 4~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Armor-Type Enhance Backup Stone (S-Grade)
description: Vitamin item\nItem that raises an S-Grade weapon's enchant rate by 15%. Can only be used on items with 3~9 enchants. For one-piece items, can only be used on items with 4~9 enchants. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Spellbook - Bless the Blood
description: Spellbook needed to learn Bless the Blood. Used by Shillien Elders.\nRequired level: 40

name: Extra Entrance Pass - Kamaloka (Hall of the Abyss)
description: Vitamin item\nExtra entrance pass that lets you enter Kamaloka (Hall of the Abyss). Can cancel the limit on entrance if used while a limit on entrance to the Hall of the Abyss exists. Can only be used once a day outside the instant zone. After use, the effect disappears at the corresponding instant dungeon's reset time. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within the account through Vitamin Manager.

name: Extra Entrance Pass - Near Kamaloka
description: Vitamin item\nExtra entrance pass that lets you enter Near Kamaloka. Can cancel the limit on entrance if used while a limit on entrance to Near Kamaloka exists. Can only be used once a day outside the instant zone. After use, the effect disappears at the corresponding instant dungeon's reset time. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within the account through Vitamin Manager.

name: Extra Entrance Pass - Kamaloka (Labyrinth of the Abyss)
description: Vitamin item\nExtra entrance pass that lets you enter Kamaloka (Labyrinth of the Abyss). Can cancel the limit on entrance if used while a limit on entrance to the Labyrinth of the Abyss exists. Can only be used once a day outside the instant zone. After use, the effect disappears at the corresponding instant dungeon's reset time. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within the account through Vitamin Manager.

name: Gesto's Box
description: Goods earmarked for Gesto. Collect 300 and take them to him.

name: Freight Chest's Seal
description: Seal stamped on a freight chest. Take it to Gesto.

name: My Teleport Spellbook
description: Vitamin item\nIncreases by 3 slots the free teleport list, which can remember designated locations. Can expand up to 9 slots. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Vitamin Manager.

name: My Teleport Scroll
description: Vitamin item\nItem that is consumed when moving to the remembered location. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Can be shared between characters within the account through Vitamin Manager.

name: White Weasel Hunting Helper Necklace
description: Vitamin item\nItem that allows you to summon a hunting helper who temporarily casts warrior-type battle support magic. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Fairy Princess Hunting Helper Necklace
description: Vitamin item\nItem that allows you to summon a hunting helper who temporarily casts magician-type battle support magic. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Wild Beast Fighter Hunting Helper Necklace
description: Vitamin item\nItem that allows you to summon a warrior-type battle hunting helper. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Fox Shaman Hunting Helper Necklace
description: Vitamin item\nItem that allows you to summon a magician-type battle hunting helper. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Transformation Scroll: Schuttgart Kamael Captain Mercenary
description: Allows you to transform into a Kamael Captain Mercenary. Can only be used by an elite mercenary in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Transformation Scroll: Schuttgart Knight Captain Mercenary
description: Allows you to transform into a Knight Captain mercenary. Can only be used by an Exalted Mercenary in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Transformation Scroll: Schuttgart Commander Mercenary
description: Allows you to transform into a Commander mercenary. Can only be used by an Exalted Mercenary in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Gludio Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Gludio Territory.

name: Dion Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Dion Territory.

name: Giran Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Giran Territory.

name: Oren Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Oren Territory.

name: Aden Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Aden Territory.

name: Innadril Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Innadril Territory.

name: Goddard Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Goddard Territory.

name: Rune Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Rune Territory.

name: Schuttgart Disguise Scroll
description: Allows you to hide your name when participating in a battle in Schuttgart Territory.

name: Sealed Knight's Cloak
description: Cloak with luxurious embroidery. When the seal is cancelled, it'll have Dark Attribute Defense +30 effect. The seal can be cancelled through the weaver Olf Kanore and Olf Adams. It cannot be worn before the seal cancellation. Enchantment, special abilities and augmentation are not possible. Cannot be exchnaged or dropped.

name: Mark of Keucereus - Stage 1
description: Mark given to an adventurer who successfully completes Keucereus' order to break through to the Hall of Suffering. This mark is required for taking on higher level missions.

name: Mark of Keucereus - Stage 2
description: Mark given to an adventurer who successfully completes Kucereus' order to conquer the Hall of Erosion. Mark given to prove heroic achievements at the Seed of Infinity.

name: Gracian Anniversary Coins
description: Gracian Anniversary Coins. When possessed, a reward can be acquired. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, deleted nor stored in a private warehouse.

name: Gracia Key
description: You can acquire Gracia Anniversary Coins by using a Gracian treasure box. Re-use time is 10 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, destroyed, or stored in a private warehouse.

name: Gludio Supply Box - Magic Pin
description: A box that has the symbol of Gludio. A low grade magic pin that's attached to the belt can be acquired at a certain rate.

name: Dion Supply Box - Magic Pin
description: A box that has the symbol of Dion. A low grade magic pin that's attached to the belt can be acquired at a certain rate.

name: Giran Supply Box - Magic Pin
description: A box that has the symbol of Giran. A low grade magic pin that's attached to the belt can be acquired at a certain rate.

description: A box that has the symbol of Gludio. A low grade magic Pouch that's attached to the belt can be acquired at a certain rate.

name: Rune Supply Box - Magic Pouch

name: Schuttgart Supply Box - Magic Pouch
description: A box that has the symbol of Schuttgart. Grade A, S magic pouch that can be attached to the belt is packaged.

name: Gludio Supply Box - Belt
description: A box that has the symbol of Gludio. At a certain rate, a low grade belt can be acquired.

name: Dion Supply Box - Belt
