name: Solina's Biography
description: A biography containing the life story of Solina, a saintess of the Elmore-Aden kingdom. This text has been banned throughout the kingdom and is incredibly difficult to find and intact copy. Double click for more information.

name: Kaerun's Memoir
description: A complete copy of Kaerun's Memoir. It is a detailed look at Solina's life written by Kaerun from his perspective. This book was never circulated but it's original print has been archived inside the monastery. Double click for more information.

name: Kaerun's Memoir Part 1
description: An incomplete portion of Kaerun's Memoir. This is only part of Solina's life story as written by Kaerun. The book is divided into 4 parts and is kept inside the Monastery of Silence. Double click for more information.

name: Kaerun's Memoir Part 2
description: An incomplete portion of Kaerun's Memoir. This is only part of Solina's life story as written by Kaerun. The book is divided into 4 parts and is kept inside the Monastery of Silence. Double click for more information.

name: Kaerun's Memoir Part 3
description: An incomplete portion of Kaerun's Memoir. This is only part of Solina's life story as written by Kaerun. The book is divided into 4 parts and is kept inside the Monastery of Silence. Double click for more information.

name: Kaerun's Memoir Part 4
description: An incomplete portion of Kaerun's Memoir. This is only part of Solina's life story as written by Kaerun. The book is divided into 4 parts and is kept inside the Monastery of Silence. Double click for more information.

name: Eris's Chronicle
description: A book chronicling the early life and events of Solina written by Eris, the abbot of the Monastery of Silence. Double click for more information.

name: Catalog Card
description: Librarian Sophia has given the catalog card containing the location of the book. Double click for more information.

name: Key to the Passageway
description: Key that opens the passageway gate to the Seal of the Saintess entrance. You can enter the passageway with this key.

name: Key to the Tomb
description: Key that opens the door to the Tomb inside the Relic Safehouse of the Seal of the Saintess. You cannot enter the Tomb without this key.

name: Key to the Library
description: Key that opens the door to the Library inside the Relic Safehouse of the Seal of the Saintess. You cannot enter the Library without this key.

name: Key to the Warehouse
description: Key that opens the door to the Warehouse inside the Relic Safehouse of the Seal of the Saintess. You cannot enter the Warehouse without this key.

name: Key to the Armory
description: Key that opens the door to the Armory inside the Relic Safehouse of the Seal of the Saintess. You cannot enter the Armory without this key.

name: Elcadia's Mark
description: Rune mark created by magic for Elcadia's test.

name: Elcadia's Token
description: Rune token created by magic for Elcadia's test.

name: Scroll of Abstinence
description: One of the relics stored inside the Seal of the Saintess. This scroll emanates an unusual energy. The scroll is very old and worn. It must be handled with care.

name: Shield of Sacrifice
description: One of the relics stored inside the Seal of the Saintess. This shield emanates an unusual energy. But it is very worn and large. It is fragile and cannot be used in battle.

name: Sword of Holy Spirit
description: One of the relics stored inside the Seal of the Saintess. The sword emanates an unusual energy. But it is very worn and large. It is fragile and cannot be used in battle.

name: Staff of Blessing
description: One of the relics stored inside the Seal of the Saintess. This staff emanates an unusual energy. But it is very worn and heavy. It is fragile cannot be used in battle.

name: Ball Trapping Gnosian Agathion Pack

name: Olympiad Match 3 Participation Certificate

description: Document that proves participation in the Olympiad Match 5. Take this document to the Olympiad Operator to receive an incomplete reward.

name: Olympiad Match 10 Participation Certificate
description: Document that proves participation in the Olympiad Match 10. Take this document to the Olympiad Operator to receive a whole reward.

name: Olympiad Team Event Certificate
description: Certificate that proves participation in the Olympiad team event 5 matches. Take the certificate to the Olympiad Operator. If you take it with the class-free and class battle certificates, you can expect a greater reward.

name: Olympiad Class-Free Battle Certificate
description: Certificate that proves participation in the Olympiad class-free battle 5 matches. Take the certificate to the Olympiad Operator. If you take it with the team event and class battle certificates, you can expect a greater reward.

name: Olympiad Class Battle Certificate
description: Certificate that proves participation in the Olympiad class battle 5 matches. Take the certificate to the Olympiad Operator. If you take it with the team event and class-free battle certificates, you can expect a greater reward.

name: Olympiad 2 Consecutive Wins Confirmation
description: Document needed to confirm 2 consecutive wins in the Olympiad. Take this confirmation to the Olympiad Operator to receive the minimum reward.

name: Olympiad 5 Consecutive Wins Confirmation

name: Olympiad 10 Consecutive Wins Confirmation
description: Document needed to confirm 10 consecutive wins in the Olympiad. Take this document to the Olympiad Operator to receive a whole reward.

name: Party Vitality Herb
description: Herb that brings Vitality to stage 4 for 10 minutes upon use. Effect works for all party members.

name: Large Dragon Bone

name: Large Dragon Skull
description: Dragon Skull obtained after finishing off the raid monster that lives in the Dragon Valley. After obtaining the dragon skulls from all 7 different raid monsters, bring them to Gilmore.

name: Large Baby Dragon
description: Baby Dragon obtained after finishing off the raid monster that lives in the Dragon Valley. After obtaining the baby dragon, bring it to the separated soul in the Dragon Valley.

name: Drake Lord's Essence

name: Behemoth Leader's Essence

name: Dragon Beast's Essence

name: Box of Theodric

name: Blessed Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-Grade)
description: When enchanted, P. Atk. increases by 4 for A-grade swords, one-handed blunts, daggers, spears, and other weapons. Increases P. Atk. by 5 for two-handed swords, two-handed blunts, dualswords, and dual-handed combat weapons. Increases P. Atk. by 8 for for bows. Increases M. Atk. by 3 for all weapons. After +4, P. Atk. / M. Atk. increase by two times. If the enchantment fails, the item is not enhanced, and the existing enchant value becomes 0.

name: Blessed Armor Enchant Scroll (A-Grade)
description: Increases P. Def. by 1 for A-grade armor and accessories. After +4, they increase by 3. Can safely enchant up to +3, and for one-piece armor, can safely enchant up to +4. If the enchantment fails, the item is not enhanced, and the existing enchant value becomes 0. When armor is enchanted above +4, HP also increases according to the enchant value.

name: Certificate of Dawn
description: A certificate received from the Witness of Dawn Franz. It says that if you show this certificate to Priest Wood, he will exchange it for an occupation specific Forgotten Scroll that can be learned at level 81.

name: Will of Antharas
description: A command stone made by Antharas embedded in his high commanding minions so he will always have control over them. Used to create Antharas Blood Crystal. Bring it to a Separated Soul.

name: Sealed Blood Crystal
description: Small crystal particles made from the blood of Antharas. After his blood was spilt, the land absorbed the blood and acted as a filter that separated the poison from the blood creating a pure form of his blood that crystallized over time. Used to create an Atharas's Blood Crystal. Bring it to a Separated Soul.

name: Antharas Blood Crystal
description: Using the power held within the blood of Antharas, this crystal can revive and fully restore EXP of all dead characters in the Command Channel. Can only be used while inside the Lair of Antharas. Reuse time is 1 hour.

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-Grade)
description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \nAttack power for D-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, other swords, two-handed sword, two-handed blunt, dualsword, and combat/two-handed weapons increases by 2 when enchanted. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 4. Magic power for all weapons increases by 2. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. No exchange/drop are allowed.

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (C-Grade)
description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \nAttack power for C-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 3 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 4. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 6. Magic power for all weapons increases by 3. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. No exchange/drop available

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (B-Grade)

Magic power for all weapons increases by 3. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. No exchange/drop available

name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (A-Grade)
description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \nAttack power for A-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 4 when enchanted. name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (C-Grade)

name: Ancient Weapon Enchant Crystal (B-Grade)
description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \nWhen enchant fails, the existing enchant value is retained. \nAttack power for B-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 3 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 4. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 6. Magic power for all weapons increases by 3. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. Cannot use weapons enchanted by above 16. No exchange/drop available

name: Ancient Weapon Enchant Crystal (A-Grade)
description: 10 % increase in enchant success rate. \nWhen enchant fails, the existing enchant value is retained. \nAttack power for A-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 4 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 5. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 8. name: Scroll: Enchant Weapon (S-Grade)
description: 10% increase in enchant success rate. \nAttack power for S-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 5 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 6. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 10. Magic power for all weapons increases by 4. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Scroll: Enchant Armor (S-Grade)
description: 10% increase in enchant success rate. \nDefense power for Grade S armor or accessory by 1 and by 3 starting from +4. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can be safely enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP according to level when armor is enchanted above +4. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Ancient Weapon Enchant Crystal (S-Grade)
description: 10% increase in enchant success rate. \nWhen enchant fails, the existing enchant value is retained. \nAttack power for S-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 5 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 6. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 10. Magic power for all weapons increases by 4. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. Cannot use weapons enchanted by above 16. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Ancient Armor Enchant Crystal (S-Grade)
description: 10% increase in enchant success rate. \nWhen enchant fails, the existing enchant value is retained. \nDefense power for Grade S armor or accessory by 1 and by 3 starting from +4. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can be safely enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP according to level when armor is enchanted above +4. Cannot use armors enchanted by above 16. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Divine Weapon Enchant Crystal (S-Grade)
description: Enchant success rate is 100%. \nAttack power for S-grade sword, one-handed blunt, one-handed dagger, spear, and other weapons increases by 5 when enchanted. Attack power for sword, two-handed blunt, two-handed dualsword, and combat and dual-handed weapons increases by 6. Attack power for bow weapons increases by 10. Magic power for all weapons increases by 4. Attack and magic power increase two times after +4. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Divine Armor Enchant Crystal (S-Grade)
description: Enchant success rate is 100%. \nDefense power for Grade S armor or accessory by 1 and by 3 starting from +4. It can be safely enchanted up to +3. For one-piece armor, it can be safely enchanted up to +4. Also increases HP according to level when armor is enchanted above +4. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Kotatz
description: Summons Kotatz, who increases HP Regeneration by 40% and MP Regeneration by 20%. The recovery bonus effect occurs only only when summoned away at a certain distance from the town. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: New Year's Money
description: Contains a Kadomas Transformation Stick and 3 Kotatz. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Red Firework
description: Ignites a Red Firework. For 10 minutes, increases water attribute defense by 30 and STR by 1. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Reuse delay is 4 hours.

name: Gold Firework
description: Ignites a Gold Firework. For 10 minutes, increases resistance to holy attacks by 30 and CON by 1. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Reuse delay is 4 hours.

name: Blue Firework
description: Ignites a Blue Firework. For 10 minutes, increases fire attribute defense by 30 and DEX by 1. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Reuse delay is 4 hours.

name: Pink Firework
description: Ignites a Pink Firework. For 10 minutes, increases earth attribute defense by 30 and MEN by 1. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Reuse delay is 4 hours.

name: White Firework
description: Ignites a White Firework. For 10 minutes, increases wind attribute defense by 30 and WIT by 1. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Reuse delay is 4 hours.

name: Silver Firework
description: Ignites a Silver Firework. For 10 minutes, increases darkness attribute defense by 30 and INT by 1. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Reuse delay is 4 hours.

name: Love for All Seasons
description: For 1 hour, increases M. Atk. by 75% and the chance of magic damage by 2. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Happy New Year
description: For 1 hour, increases Critical attack power by 35%, Critical attack rate by 30, and accuracy by 4. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Female Aniruddha
description: For 1 hour, increases P. Def. by 15, M. Def. by 30%, and Shield defense rate by 15. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Kung Hei Fat Choy
description: Decreases P. Def. by 8%, M. Def. by 16%, and evasion by 4, and increases P. Atk. by 15%, M. Atk. by 16%, Atk. Spd. by 8%, Casting Spd. by 8%, and moving speed by 8 for 1 hour. Recovers as HP 9% of the standard short-range physical damage inflicted on the enemy. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Chinese Feast
description: For 1 hour, decreases physical skill MP consumption by 20%, magic skill's MP consumption by 10%, and song/dance skill's MP consumption by 20%. Increases Casting Spd. by 30% and Max MP by 35%. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Hwa Gei Bu Gwi
description: Increases Atk. Spd. by 33% and the weight penalty interval by 9000 for 1 hour. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Fire Stamp
description: For 1 hour, increases Speed by 33, evasion rate by 4, and Max HP by 35%. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or sold. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Neolithic Crystal - S84
description: If you bring it to the Vitamin Manager, you can exchange an ordinary S84 Grade item for a Masterwork Item.

name: Olf's T-shirt Enchant Scroll
description: Enchant scroll exclusive to Olf's T-shirt.\nIncreases the T-shirt's P. Def. and M. Def. by 1. Starting from +4, increases P. Def. by 3. Can safely enchant to +3 and up to a max +9. From +4, "basic abilities (CON, MEN, STR, INT, DEX, WIT)" are raised in stages. Special skills are added at +5, +7, and +9. Cannot be exchanged or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Item cannot be dropped.

name: Blessed Olf's T-shirt Enchant Scroll
description: Vitamin item\nEnchant scroll exclusive to Olf's T-shirt.\nIncreases the T-shirt's P. Def. and M. Def. by 1. Starting from +4, increases P. Def. by 3. Can safely enchant to +3 and up to a max +9. From +4, "basic abilities (CON, MEN, STR, INT, DEX, WIT)" are raised in stages. Special skills are added at +5, +7, and +9. If the enchant fails, the existing enchant value becomes 0. Cannot be exchanged or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse. Item cannot be dropped.

This item cannot be exchanged or dropped, but can be stored in your private warehouse.

Reuse time is 60 minutes. Cannot be destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Sealed Cloak of Zaken

description: A severaly damaged staff piece. A mysterious light shines faintly.

name: Angel Cat's Blessing
description: When used, HP Recovery Bonus, Max MP, and Critical Atk. Rate +20%, and you can feel the effects of Prophecy of Water, Might, Haste, Empower, Acumen, Wind Walk, Vampiric Rage, Berserker Spirit, Shield, Focus, Death Whisper, Guidance, Clarity, Wild Magic, and Concentration for 1 hour. Reuse time is 60 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Letter Collector's Gift
description: Letter Collector's Gift\nUpon use, for 2 hours, increases Atk. Spd. +15%, magic Casting Spd. +15%, moving speed +20, and changes the appearance of the equipped weapon and armor to look like items of memory. Reuse time is 60 minutes.

name: Maestro's Key
description: Can open a level 21~85 treasure chest with 100% chance. When a character below level 77 uses it on a treasure chest that is more than 6 levels above, or when a character above level 78 uses it on a treasure chest that is more than 5 levels above, the key disappears but the reward cannot be obtained.

name: Beginner Adventurer's Treasure Sack
description: Treasure sack containing the treasure of beginner adventurers. When you use it, you can obtain 1 C~D grade weapon.

name: Experienced Adventurer's Treasure Sack
description: Treasure sack containing the treasure of experienced adventurers. When you use it, you can obtain 1 B~S grade weapon (excludes Dynasty).

name: Great Adventurer's Treasure Sack
description: Treasure sack containing the treasure of great adventurers. When you use it, you can obtain 1 Dynasty~Vesper grade weapon.

name: Proof of Challenge
description: Token received by adventurers for their service to the Elmore king. If you bring it to Captain Mathias in Rune, you will receive a reward. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Rune Jewelry Box - Crystal
description: Jewelry box containing the precious treasure of Rune. When used, you can obtain 15 Crystals of Life with a certain rate of chance.

name: Rune Jewelry Box - Talisman
description: Jewelry box containing the precious treasure of Rune. When used, you can obtain a Talisman with a certain rate of chance.

name: Pablo's Box
description: Box containing the precious treasure of Elmore's renowned scholar Pablo. When used, you can obtain a hat with a certain rate of chance.

name: Illumination - Red
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Illumination - Pink
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Illumination - Rose Pink
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Illumination - Orange
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Illumination - Mint Green
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Illumination - Green
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Illumination - Sky Blue
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Illumination - Blue
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Illumination - Purple
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Illumination - White
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Unrefinhed Ore
description: Ore before refining. Absolutely necessary for the craftsman to make a jewel. It should still fetch a certain price at the shop.

name: Unrefined Jewel
description: Jewel before refining. Absolutely necessary for the craftsman to make a jewel. It should still fetch a certain price at the shop.

name: Jewel of Dusk
description: Jewel carged with ancient skills. It shines brightly. It should still fetch a certain price at the shop.

name: Jewel of Dawn
description: The jewel of dawn that was created by the craftsman using ancient skills. It shines brightly. It should still fetch a considerable price at the shop.

name: Jewel of Splendor
description: The jewel of dawn that was created by the craftsman using ancient skills. It shines brightly. It should still fetch a considerable price at the shop.

name: Giant's Jewel
description: The giant's jewel that was created by the craftsman using ancient skills. It shines brightly. It should still fetch a considerable price at the shop.

name: Imperial Crusader of Friendship Set Pack (S-Grade)
description: When used, you acquire an Imperial Crusader of Friendship armor set. Expires after 90 days if not used. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Draconic Leather of Friendship Set Pack (S-Grade)
description: When used, you acquire a Draconic Leather of Friendship Armor Set. Expires after 90 days if not used. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Major Arcana Robe of Friendship Set Pack (S-Grade)
description: When used, you acquire an Arcana Robe of Friendship Set. Expires after 90 days if not used. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Dynasty Breastplate of Friendship Set Pack (S-Grade)
description: When used, you acquire a Dynasty Breastplate Armor of Friendship Set. Expires after 90 days if not used. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Dynasty Leather Mail of Friendship Set Pack (S-Grade)
description: When used, you acquire a Dynasty Leather Mail of Friendship Set. Expires after 90 days if not used. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Dynasty Tunic of Friendship Set Pack (S-Grade)
description: When used, you acquire a Dynasty Robe of Friendship Set. Expires after 90 days if not used. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Tateossian Accessory of Friendship Pack (S-Grade)
description: When used, you acquire a Tateossian Accessory Set. Expires after 90 days if not used. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Dynasty Accessory of Friendship Pack (S-Grade)
description: When used, you acquire a Dynasty Accessory Set. Expires after 90 days if not used. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Mysterious No Grade Soulshot
description: Soulshot containing the light of Sprites; instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. It can be used for none grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Mysterious Soulshot (D-Grade)
description: Soulshot containing the light of Sprites; instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. It can be used for D-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Mysterious Soulshot (C-Grade)
description: Soulshot containing the light of Sprites; instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. It can be used for C-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Mysterious Soulshot (B-Grade)
description: Soulshot containing the light of Sprites; instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. It can be used for B-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Mysterious Soulshot (A-Grade)
description: Soulshot containing the light of Sprites; instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. It can be used for A-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Mysterious Soulshot (S-Grade)
description: Soulshot containing the light of Sprites; instantly inflicts a powerful attack on the enemy. It can be used for S-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Mysterious No Grade Spiritshot
description: Spiritshot containing the light of Sprites; it instantly and greatly increases the power of magic. It can be used for none grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Mysterious Spiritshot (D-Grade)
description: Spiritshot containing the light of Sprites;  it instantly and greatly increases the power of magic. It can be used for D-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Mysterious Spiritshot (C-Grade)
description: Spiritshot containing the light of Sprites;  it instantly and greatly increases the power of magic. It can be used for C-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Mysterious Spiritshot (B-Grade)
description: Spiritshot containing the light of Sprites;  it instantly and greatly increases the power of magic. It can be used for B-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Mysterious Spiritshot (A-Grade)
description: Spiritshot containing the light of Sprites;  it instantly and greatly increases the power of magic. It can be used for A-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Mysterious Spiritshot (S-Grade)
description: Spiritshot containing the light of Sprites;  it instantly and greatly increases the power of magic. It can be used for S-grade weapons. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Hero's Gold Chest
description: Hero's Gold Chest\nGift box containing 1 each of a Hero's Treasure Box, Vitamin Support Pack, Potion Support Pack, and Supplies Support Pack. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Vitamin Support Pack
description: Vitamin support pack\nGift box containing 2 high quality hunting helper exchange coupon, 3 feathers of blessing, 5 Kamaloka (Near Kamaloka, Hall of the Abyss, Labyrinth of the Abyss) entrance passes, and 3 Vitality Replenishing Beverages. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Potion Support Pack
description: Potion support pack\nGift box containing 20 highest power temporary healing potion, 50 greater healing potions, 5 fresh milks, and 5 energy of sprouts. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Supplies Support Pack
description: Supplies support pack\nGift box containing 200,000 mysterious soulshots and spirits according to grade. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: PC Cafe Energy - 1 hour
description: When used, for 1 hour(s), energy is replenished when Exp. is acquired through hunting. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Can only be used at levels 1~75. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: PC Cafe Energy Pack
description: PC cafe energy pack\nGift box containing 3 PC cafe energies. When used, duration can receive a 1~4 hour PC Cafe Energy with a certain rate of chance. Can only be used at levels 1~75. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: PC Cafe Blessing
description: When used, for 20 minute(s), energy is replenished for party members, including the user, when Exp. is acquired through hunting. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: PC Cafe Blessing Pack
description: PC cafe blessing pack\nGift box containing 1 PC cafe blessing. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: PC Cafe Energy - 2 hour
description: When used, for 2 hour(s), energy is replenished when Exp. is acquired through hunting. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Can only be used at levels 1~75. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: PC Cafe Energy - 3 hour
description: When used, for 3 hour(s), energy is replenished when Exp. is acquired through hunting. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Can only be used at levels 1~75. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: PC Cafe Energy - 4 hour
description: When used, for 4 hour(s), energy is replenished when Exp. is acquired through hunting. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Can only be used at levels 1~75. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Joy of Halloween
description: Gift provided for Halloween. When used, can obtain 20 Belldandy Summon Scrolls. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Hero's Gold Chest Pack
description: Hero's Gold Chest Pack\nA gift box that contains a Hero's Gold Chest. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Hero Assistance Package
description: A coupon for an item set that helps a hero to grow stronger. Bestows an Equipment Set 7-Day Pak, a Button-Eyed Bear Doll Agathion 7-Day Pack, a Quick Healing Potion, and a Steam Beatle Mounting Bracelet 7-Day Pack. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Fresh Herb
description: Herb that Rudolph likes. When the seal on Rudolph is removed, Rudolph automatically eats for 10 minutes.

name: Santa Claus's Treasure Box
description: Santa Claus's treasure box. When used, you can receive Santa Claus's gift.

name: Medal of Glory
description: Item for obtaining Fame. If you bring it to the Olympiad Manager, you can exchange it for 100 Fame points.

name: Campfire Flint
description: You can use this item if you have gathered 30 tree branches to start a campfire. A campfire near a battlefield can help to raise HP, MP, and CP recovery rate. You can only make campfires when you are away from towns. You can only receive the recovery bonus while near the campfire. \nCannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Pa'agrio's Christmas Package
description: Vitamin item\nGift box containing 1 each of Pa'agrio's Warm Breeze - 4 hour pack, Nevit's Hourglass - 4 hour pack, party cake, and shiny party hat. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Vitamin Manager. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Pa'agrio's Christmas Package
description: Vitamin item\nGift box containing 1 each of Pa'agrio's Warm Breeze - 4 hour pack, Nevit's Hourglass - 4 hour pack, party cake, and shiny party hat. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Vitamin Manager. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Pa'agrio's Warm Breeze - 4 hour pack
description: Vitamin item pack\nGift box containing 15 Pa'agrio's warm breezes. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Vitamin Manager. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Nevit's Hourglass - 4 hour pack
description: Vitamin pack\nGift box containing 15 Nevit's Hourglasses - 4 hours. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Vitamin Manager. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Pa'agrio's Warm Breeze - 4 hour
description: Vitamin item\nWhen used, you can feel the vitality recovery herb's effect for 4 hour(s). But there will be no effect when the "Birthday Joy" effect is applied. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Vitamin Manager. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Party Cake
description: Vitamin item\nSummons a party cake that maintains vitality for 20 minutes. It'll be effective only when summoned away at a certain distance from the town. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Vitamin Manager. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: (Not In Use)
description: (Not In Use)

name: (Not In Use)
description: (Not In Use)

name: Valentine's Day Rose Spirit Exchange Coupon Pack
description: Vitamin item pack\nGift box containing 2 improved rose spirit exchange tickets. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Vitamin Manager. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Valentine's Day Rose Spirit Set Pack
description: Vitamin item\nGift box containing 1 Valentine's Day Rose Spirit Exchange Coupon and 1 Sweet Chocolate Box. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Vitamin Manager. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Valentine's Day Rose Spirit Exchange Ticket
description: Coupon that can be exchanged for a necklace (5 hour) that summons an Improved Rose Spirit. Can be exchanged through the Vitamin Manager. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Sweet Chocolate Box
description: Gift box containing 3 sweet chocolates and 50 rose essences. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Sweet Chocolate - 4 hour
description: When used, you can feel the vitality recovery herb's effect for 4 hour(s). But there will be no effect when the "Birthday Joy" effect is applied. Re-use time is 60 minutes. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Valentine's Day Rose Spirit Exchange Coupon Pack
description: Vitamin item pack\nGift box containing 2 improved rose spirit exchange tickets. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Vitamin Manager. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Valentine's Day Rose Spirit Set Pack
description: Vitamin item\nGift box containing 1 Valentine's Day Rose Spirit Exchange Coupon and 1 Sweet Chocolate Box. Cannot be exchanged, dropped, or destroyed. Can be shared between characters within an account through the Vitamin Manager. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Scroll: Valakas Call
description: One-time use scroll that teleports you to Watcher of Valakas Klein in the Hall of Flames.

name: Jewel of Valakas
description: Mysterious jewel that teleports you to Watcher of Valakas Klein in the Hall of Flames. Re-use time is 60 minutes.

name: Scroll: Antharas Call
description: One-time use scroll that teleports you to the entrance to Antharas's Lair.

name: Jewel of Antharas
description: Mysterious jewel that teleports you to the entrance to Antharas's Lair. Re-use time is 60 minutes.

name: Totem of Body
description: Summons a totem that increases HP recovery speed by 30% and decreases damage from the topography by 80%. Totem duration is 30 minutes. Can only be used inside the lairs of Valakas and Antharas. Re-use time is 10 minutes.

name: Totem of Spirit
description: Summons a totem that increases MP recovery speed by 15%. Totem duration is 30 minutes. Can only be used inside the lairs of Valakas and Antharas. Re-use time is 10 minutes.

name: Totem of Bravery
description: Summons a totem that increases P. Def. by 30%. Totem duration is 30 minutes. Can only be used inside the lairs of Valakas and Antharas. Re-use time is 10 minutes.

name: Totem of Fortitude
description: Summons a totem that increases M. Def. by 25% and cancels petrification at a certain cycle. Totem duration is 30 minutes. Can only be used inside the lairs of Valakas and Antharas. Re-use time is 10 minutes.

name: Refined Red Dragon Blood
description: When used, instantly recovers some HP to yourself and to party members. Can only be used inside the lairs of Valakas and Antharas. Re-use time is 5 minutes.

name: Refined Blue Dragon Blood
description: When used, instantly recovers some MP to yourself and to party members. Can only be used inside the lairs of Valakas and Antharas. Re-use time is 5 minutes.

name: Clear Crystal
description: There is nothing inside the clear crystal. Rumors say that this crystal can store the Antharas' energy.

name: Empty Crystal
description: There is nothing inside the empty crystal. Rumors say that this crystal can store the Valakas' energy.

name: Filled Crystal (Antharas Energy)
description: Crystal containing the land dragon's energy. You must bring it to Theodric.

name: Filled Crystal (Valakas Energy)
description: Crystal containing the fire dragon's energy. You must bring it to Klein.

name: Lavasaurus Stone Fragment
description: Stone fragment from a Lavasaurus. Researchers say this is what controls how a Lavasaurus moves.

name: Lavasaurus Head Fragment
description: Framgent from the head of a Lavasaurus. Its shape resembles that of a Dragon.

name: Lavasaurus Body Fragment
description: Fragment taken from the body of a Lavasaurus.

name: Lavasaurus Horn Fragment
description: Fragment from a Lavasaurus horn.

name: Strange Red Liquid
description: Odd red colored liquid of unknown origin.

name: Strange Blue Liquid
description: Odd blue colored liquid of unknown origin.

name: Ice Candy Piece
description: Sweet ice candy piece. Collect 50 and bring them back to Santa Claus to receive a reward.

name: Super Kat the Cat Z Summon Necklace
description: Vitamin item\nItem that allows you to summon a hunting helper who temporarily casts magician-type battle support magic. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Super Feline Queen Z Summon Necklace
description: Vitamin item\nItem that allows you to summon a hunting helper who temporarily casts magician-type battle support magic. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Super Mew the Cat Z Summon Necklace
description: Vitamin item\nItem that allows you to summon a hunting helper who temporarily casts magician-type battle support magic. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Tarask Dragon's Leather Fragment
description: Leathery hide from a Tarask Dragon.

name: Behemoth Dragon Leather
description: Leathery hide from a Behemoth Dragon.

name: Lavasaurus Pustbon Fragment
description: Lavasaurus Pustbon fragment piece. Bring it to Watcher of Valakas Klein.

name: Vitality Replenishing Beverage - Pack of 9
description: Vitamin Item Pack\nA pack containing 9 units of Energy Replenishing Beverage. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Vitality Replenishing Beverage - Pack of 12
description: Vitamin Item Pack\nA pack containing 12 units of Energy Replenishing Beverage. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Vitality Replenishing Beverage - Pack of 15
description: Vitamin Item Pack\nA pack containing 15 units of Energy Replenishing Beverage. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Shattered Bones
description: Shattered bones that can be obtained from the Ketra Orcs and the Varka Silenos. Bring this to Rune Captain Mathias.

name: Cannibalistic Stakato Leader Claw
description: Cannibalistic Stakato Leader Claw. Bring this to Rune Captain Mathias.

name: Anais Scroll
description: Magic scroll that belongs to Anais. Bring this to Rune Captain Mathias.

name: Event - Baby Bunny Scroll of Summon
description: Scroll that summons a baby bunny. If you relieve the Baby Bunny's fatigue, you can acquire Apiga. (Recovery is only possible through Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion or Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Recovery Potion.)

name: Event - Sad Baby Bunny Scroll of Summon
description: Scroll that summons a sad baby bunny. Can sometimes transform into a Rabbit while trying to recover the sad baby bunny. (Recovery is only possible through Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion or Vitamin.)

name: Event - Baby Bunny Captain Scroll of Summon
description: Scroll that summons a Baby Bunny Captain. If you relieve the Baby Bunny Captain's fatigue, you can acquire Apiga. (Recovery is only possible through Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion or Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Recovery Potion.)

name: Event - Sad Baby Bunny Captain Scroll of Summon
description: Scroll that summons a Sad Baby Bunny Captain. Can sometimes transform into a Rabbit while trying to recover the sad baby bunny captain. (Recovery is only possible through Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion or Vitamin.)

name: Event - Save the Bunny Event Pack
description: An event pack that can be obtained 1 time per account every 12 hours. By double clicking, you can obtain the Baby Bunny Summon Scroll and "Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion" that are needed for the event. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Item that can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Event - Cupid's Fatigue Relief Potion
description: Decreases fatigue when used on a Bunny.

name: Event - Cupid's Powerful Fatigue Relief Potion
description: Decreases fatigue when used on a Bunny. It has a better effect than Cupid's Fatigue Recovery Potion.

name: Illumination - Yellow
description: Brightly burning illumination.

name: Cat the Ranger Summon Necklace Exchange Coupon
description: Coupon that can be exchanged for a necklace (5 hour) that summons a Cat the Ranger. Can be exchanged through the Vitamin Manager. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Birthday Present Pack
description: Birthday present received from Alegria on the character's birthday. When used, you can obtain (3) Birthday Vitality Potion(s), a birthday cake, and a Birthday Hat. Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: Birthday Vitality Potion
description: When used, full vitality is maintained for 4 hour(s). Cannot be exchanged or dropped. Can be stored in a private warehouse.

name: 1st Place Treasure Sack
description: When double-clicked, a random 1st Place prize is granted.

name: 2nd Place Treasure Sack
description: When double-clicked, a random 2nd Place prize is granted.

name: 3rd Place Treasure Sack
description: When double-clicked, a random 3rd Place prize is granted.

name: 4th Place Treasure Sack
description: When double-clicked, a random 4th Place prize is granted.

name: 5th Place Treasure Sack
description: When double-clicked, a random 5th Place prize is granted.

name: 6th Place Treasure Sack
description: When double-clicked, a random 6th Place prize is granted.

name: Blue Talisman of Power
description: Increases P. Atk. when in use. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. Shadow Item that cannot be traded or dropped.

name: Blue Talisman of Wild Magic
description: Increases Critical Rate of magic attacks temporarily. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be traded or dropped.

name: Blue Talisman of Defense
description: Temporarily decreases P. Def./M. Def./Evasion and increases P. Atk./M. Atk./Atk. Spd./Casting Spd./speed. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be traded or dropped.

name: Red Talisman of Minimum Clarity
description: Decreases skill MP consumption when used. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be traded or dropped.

name: Red Talisman of Maximum Clarity
description: Temporarily greatly decreases skill MP consumption when used. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be traded or dropped.

name: Blue Talisman of Reflection
description: When used, grants a skill whereby any physical melee damage received will be reflected back onto your attacker. Effect does not stack with additional talismans of the same type. This item cannot be traded or dropped.

name: Blue Talisman of Invisibility
description: Makes you invisible for a while, so you cannot be attacked by enemies. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be traded or dropped.

name: Blue Talisman - Shield Protection
description: When used, increases the protection power of a shield. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be traded or dropped.

name: Black Talisman - Mending
description: When used, it cures bleeding. Effect does not stack with additional Talismans of the same type. This item cannot be traded or dropped.

name: Black Talisman - Escape

name: Knight's Cloak
description: Cloak with luxurious embroidery. Dark Attribute Defense +30. Can be worn by Barons or higher ranks of the clan that owns a castle. When an armor set above the Dynasty level is worn, the Sealed Cloak Slot will be open so that the cloak can be equipped. Enchantment, attribute, and smelting are impossible. Cannot be exchnaged or dropped.

name: Knight's Cloak - Light Armor exclusive
description: Cloak with luxurious embroidery. Dark Attribute Defense +30, and Cannot be exchnaged or dropped. Can be worn by Barons or higher ranks of the clan that owns a castle. When the entire Vesper Noble or Dynasty set is worn, the Sealed Cloak Slot will be open and one can now wear the cloak. The cloak is exclusively for Bow Masters and Dagger Masters excluding Kamaels. Enchantment, special abilities and augmentation are not possible. Cannot be exchnaged or dropped.

description: Cloak with luxurious embroidery. Dark Attribute Defense +30, and Cannot be exchnaged or dropped. Can be worn by Barons or higher ranks of the clan that owns a castle. The cloak is exclusively for Healer, Enchanter, Summoner and Wizard excluding Kamaels. Enchantment, special abilities and augmentation are not possible. Cannot be exchnaged or dropped.

name: Elegia Breastplate {PvP}
set_bonus_desc: STR +3; CON -2; P. Atk. +6.59% when equipped; Critical Rate +127; resistance to Bleed/Hold/Sleep attacks +50%; Resistance to Magic Damage +2%; Max HP +550; Resistance to Fire/Water/Wind/Earth attributes +5; Recover some of the damage incurred by the enemy as HP. Can equip a cloak. During PvP, incurred damage decreases and all of the attacker's speeds decrease at a fixed rate. Can equip a cloak.
special_enchant_desc: Increases P. Def. and MP Recovery Rate when all set items are enchanted to 6 or above.

name: Elegia Leather Breastplate {PvP}
set_bonus_desc: STR +1; DEX +2; CON -2; P. Atk. +6.59% when equipped; Atk. Spd. +6%, Critical Rate +171, Resistance to Paralysis +50%, Speed +3%, and Resistance to Fire/Water/Wind/Earth attributes +5. Can equip a cloak. During PvP, damage incurred upon attack decreases and a target's target is cancelled at a fixed rate. Can equip a cloak.
special_enchant_desc: M. Def. and Evasion increase when a set item is reinforced by 6 or more.

name: Elegia Tunic {PvP}
set_bonus_desc: WIT +2; MEN -2; INT +1; M. Atk. +10% when equipped; Casting Spd. +15%; Speed +7; Max MP +97; MP Consumption -3% upon skill use; MP Recovery Bonus 5%; Resistance to Stun +50%; Resistance to Fire/Water/Wind/Earth +5. Decreases damage received during PvP and has a chance to decrease Critical Rate/Damage when attacked. Opens cloak slot.
special_enchant_desc: Increases P. Def. and Weight Limit when all set items are enchanted to 6 or above.

name: Zinenze Agathion Bracelet (3 day)
description:
Bracelet skill that let's you summon Zinenze for 3 days.
Upon using the skill name, instantly recovers Exp, HP, MP, and CP, and makes you invincible for 5 seconds. (But can only be used when HP is below 30%.)
Cool time is 12 hour(s).
Can be stored in a private warehouse. But cannot be exchange, dropped, or sold in shops.

Bracelet skill that let's you summon Zinenze for 3 days.
Upon using the skill name, instantly recovers Exp, HP, MP, and CP, and makes you invincible for 5 seconds. (But can only be used when HP is below 31%.)
Cool time is 12 hour(s).
Can be stored in a private warehouse. But cannot be exchange, dropped, or sold in shops.

description:
Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Vesper Cutter Conversion
<Soul Crystal Enhancement>
Increases Atk. Spd. by about 11%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP.
When enchanted to 4 or more, there is a chance that party members including yourself will get increased P. Atk., M. Atk. and the amount of recieved heal, and decreased MP consumption per skill during a critical attack.

name: Vesper Pincer- Thunder {PvP}
description:
Masterwork Item that increases Critical Rate. Kamael Exclusive Weapon: Vesper Cutter Conversion 
<Soul Crystal Enhancement>
Increases Atk. Spd. by about 11%. Increases damage inflicted during PvP. Improves the chance of CP recovery during an attack.
When enchanted to 4 or more, there is a chance that party members including yourself will get increased P. Atk., M. Atk., and the amount of recieved heal, and decreased MP consumption during skill use.
